original: zhes so // de la grangs can pa'i yod par lta ba bzlog pa'i don du med ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de la grangs can pa'i yod par lta ba bzlog pa'i don du med ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Thus, in order to refute the Sāṃkhya view of existence, one should say “nonexistent.”

original: med ces bya bas ji srid du shin tu med par bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: med ces bya bas ji srid du shin tu med par bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: By saying “nonexistent,” one should establish that it is utterly nonexistent.

original: rang gi sde pa dang / gzhan grangs can gzhan de dag gi don du med ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi sde pa dang / gzhan grangs can gzhan de dag gi don du med ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: In order to refute the other Buddhist schools and the Sāṃkhyas, one should say “nonexistent.”

original: phyogs kyi gos can rnams gyi don du yod pa dang / med pa'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi gos can rnams gyi don du yod pa dang / med pa'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: In order to refute the Vaiśeṣikas, one should say “both existent and nonexistent.”

original: tshu rol mdzes pa pa rnams kyi don du brtag pa med pa nyid kyis med pa ma yin no zhes brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: tshu rol mdzes pa pa rnams kyi don du brtag pa med pa nyid kyis med pa ma yin no zhes brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: In order to refute the Cārvākas, one should not say “it does not exist because it is not an object of knowledge.”

original: 'di rnams kyi don byas par 'gyur ba ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi don byas par 'gyur ba ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Because it is not the case that they will understand the meaning of this.

original: gang dang gang 'di dag thog mar de dang de la mtshungs par spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: gang dang gang 'di dag thog mar de dang de la mtshungs par spyad par bya'o //
translated: Whatever is the case, one should first practice that.

original: gad dam pa'i chos kyi snod phyir gzhil bar byed pa ma yin no zhes so //
analyzed: gad dam pa'i chos kyi snod phyir gzhil bar byed pa ma yin no zhes so //
translated: One should not reject those who are vessels of the true Dharma.”

original: de'i phyir de nyid mngon par mthong ba rnams kyis spangs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid mngon par mthong ba rnams kyis spangs so //
translated: Therefore, it is abandoned by those who see reality.

original: gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ni //
analyzed: gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ni //
translated: The name of the stage called “nonabiding” is

original: 'ga' zhig tu yang brjod pa dang // rjes su brjod pa mthong ba la chags pa med pa nyid kyi phyir mi gnas pa'i bdag nyid du gnas so zhes pa 'di'i ming ngo //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu yang brjod pa dang // rjes su brjod pa mthong ba la chags pa med pa nyid kyi phyir mi gnas pa'i bdag nyid du gnas so zhes pa 'di'i ming ngo //
translated: because of the absence of attachment to the perception of expression and the expressed.

original: dpe gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpe gsungs pa /
translated: The example is stated:

original: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “like space,” and so on.

original: nam mkha'i rang bzhin gcig po 'di de de bzhin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rang bzhin gcig po 'di de de bzhin no //
translated: This one nature of space is just like that.

original: sangs rgyas pa'i mdo las //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa'i mdo las //
translated: In the Buddha’s sūtras,

original: nam mkha' nyid dpe nyid kyis brjod pa /
analyzed: nam mkha' nyid dpe nyid kyis brjod pa /
translated: space is expressed by means of an example:

original: ji ltar nam mkha' de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha' de bzhin nyid //
translated: “Just as space is suchness,

original: shin tu rnam dag ye shes so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam dag ye shes so //
translated: it is utterly pure pristine consciousness.”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: And so on.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes pa ni /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes pa ni /
translated: The pristine consciousness of omniscience🔽is that which has the meditation of the unification of migrating🔽beings.

original: zung 'jug 'gro ba'i rnams par sgom par byed pa de gang la yod pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: zung 'jug 'gro ba'i rnams par sgom par byed pa de gang la yod pa de de bzhin no //
translated: That is just like that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: 'gro zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'gro zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Migrating beings,” and so on.

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi snying @45a * //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi snying @45a * //
translated: The essence of beings is the essence of the Buddha.

original: po de dang de nyid du bskyed pa ni 'gro ba'o //🔽nges par dngos po thams cad kyi //
analyzed: po de dang de nyid du bskyed pa ni 'gro ba'o // nges par dngos po thams cad kyi //
translated: The beings are generated from that very essence.

original: rnam dag de bzhin nyid du brjod //
analyzed: rnam dag de bzhin nyid du brjod //
translated: It is said to be the pure suchness of all things.

original: ces gsungs pa'i phyir rnam dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa'i phyir rnam dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, it is called pure.

original: bzhugs pa ni sku gnyis kyis de'i bdag nyid du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bzhugs pa ni sku gnyis kyis de'i bdag nyid du gnas pa'o //
translated: The abiding is the abiding in the nature of the two bodies.

original: thub pa chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: thub pa chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The great sage is the great Vajradhara.

original: mthar thug pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: mthar thug pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: The ultimate is twofold.

original: slob ma la bshad pa'o zhes pa ni rigs dang mthun par bshad pa la phyi ma gsum yang sbyar bar bya'o zhes pa /
analyzed: slob ma la bshad pa'o zhes pa ni rigs dang mthun par bshad pa la phyi ma gsum yang sbyar bar bya'o zhes pa /
translated: The explanation to the disciple is the explanation in accordance with the lineage. The latter three should be applied.

original: slob par byed pa'i don du gsungs so //
analyzed: slob par byed pa'i don du gsungs so //
translated: Thus, it is said for the purpose of teaching.

original: de ltar bzhugs pa'i zhes bya ba ni sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: de ltar bzhugs pa'i zhes bya ba ni sngar bzhin no //
translated: Thus abiding is as before.

original: bstan nas zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa'i mu tshig phreng bar de la bshad pa la /
analyzed: bstan nas zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa'i mu tshig phreng bar de la bshad pa la /
translated: Having taught, in the garland of verses composed by Ratnasaṃbhavaśānti, it is explained there.

original: dang po'i dag nyid kyis rgyud ma lus pa'i don rnam par bshad pa gang yin pa zhes 'chang bar ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: dang po'i dag nyid kyis rgyud ma lus pa'i don rnam par bshad pa gang yin pa zhes 'chang bar ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable to explain the meaning of the entire tantra by the purity of the first [line],

original: rgyud phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyud phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the tantra would be distorted.

original: dang po'i ngag nyid kyis rgyud ma lus pa'i dgongs pa bshad pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: dang po'i ngag nyid kyis rgyud ma lus pa'i dgongs pa bshad pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable to explain the intention of the entire tantra by the first line itself,

original: rgyud rgyas par rnam par 'chad pa na so sor bstan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyud rgyas par rnam par 'chad pa na so sor bstan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it would have to be taught separately when explaining the extensive tantra.

original: de bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa /
translated: Desiring to teach that, he said:

original: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: After that... and so forth.

original: brjod kyis mi lang bzhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhal du med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod kyis mi lang bzhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhal du med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Inconceivable... and so forth is because it is immeasurable.

original: dpe gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpe gsungs pa /
translated: The example is stated:

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Buddha fields... and so forth.

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul phra rab kyi grangs kyis bsgyur bas brjod par mi nus pa de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don sogs pa mngon par rjod par byed do zhes gsungs pa //
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul phra rab kyi grangs kyis bsgyur bas brjod par mi nus pa de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don sogs pa mngon par rjod par byed do zhes gsungs pa //
translated: The etc. refers to the statement:

original: sa zhes du gtogs pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: sa zhes du gtogs pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: The etc. refers to the statement:

original: de rnams las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de nyid kyi phyir /🔽'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de rnams las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de nyid kyi phyir / 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor brjod par bya ste /
translated: The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:

original: lha'i 'khor lo yang phung po la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can rigs brgya'i dbye bas shes par bya ba rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'dus pa'i phyir 'dus pa ste /🔽rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sbrul ba'i sku'o //
analyzed: lha'i 'khor lo yang phung po la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can rigs brgya'i dbye bas shes par bya ba rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'dus pa'i phyir 'dus pa ste / rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sbrul ba'i sku'o //
translated: The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:

original: gang gi dbang du byas nas rigs brgya'i rim pa so sor rtogs par bya bar mngon par brjod do //🔽'gro ba 'di kun sangs rgyas lnga bdag nyid //
analyzed: gang gi dbang du byas nas rigs brgya'i rim pa so sor rtogs par bya bar mngon par brjod do //🔽'gro ba 'di kun sangs rgyas lnga bdag nyid //
translated: The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:🔽 The etc. refers to the statement:

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa nges pa'i don du 'chad par 'gyur pa brjod kyis mi lang ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa nges pa'i don du 'chad par 'gyur pa brjod kyis mi lang ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
translated: The inconceivable and so on are explained as having the definitive meaning of inexpressible and so on.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra @45b rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi yan lag gi cha shas yin pa'i phyir zhes so //🔽da ltar rim pa gnyis pa la sogs pa bsdus pa'i don du yang 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra @45b rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi yan lag gi cha shas yin pa'i phyir zhes so // da ltar rim pa gnyis pa la sogs pa bsdus pa'i don du yang 'dus pa'o //
translated: The tathāgatas, bodhisattvas, and buddhafields equal to the particles of the buddhafields are the parts of the limbs of Great Vajradhara himself.

original: 'di ltar ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Now, the second chapter and so on are also included in the meaning of the summary.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nye bar ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nye bar ston par byed pa'o //
translated: Thus and so on indicates the maṇḍala wheel.

original: thugs rdo rje phyag na rdo rje'o zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje nag po nyid kyi phyir phyag na rdo rje kha dog nag po la mi bskyod pas dbu la mtshan par 'chad par byed pa de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thugs rdo rje phyag na rdo rje'o zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje nag po nyid kyi phyir phyag na rdo rje kha dog nag po la mi bskyod pas dbu la mtshan par 'chad par byed pa de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Cittavajra is Vajrapāṇi, because he is black Cittavajra. It is explained that Vajrapāṇi is black in color and marked on the head by Akṣobhya. That is also unreasonable.

original: 'phags pa'i dgongs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa mang po rnams dang chen po'i mthar thug pa klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis rnam par sbyar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi yan lag gi mtshan ma dgod pa ma mthong ba ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i dgongs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa mang po rnams dang chen po'i mthar thug pa klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis rnam par sbyar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi yan lag gi mtshan ma dgod pa ma mthong ba ste /
translated: and the great final one, the foot-print of the Naga-mind, which is not seen by many who follow the intention of the Arya, and which is the arrangement of the signs of the limbs of the mandala.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is said:

original: de bzhin rin chen rin chen ser //
analyzed: de bzhin rin chen rin chen ser //
translated: Likewise, the jewel is yellow,

original: brtul zhugs can gyis lho ru dgod //
analyzed: brtul zhugs can gyis lho ru dgod //
translated: and the one who is vowed should place it in the south.

original: ces bya'o // gang gi tshe m'a ma ka'i rin po che'i rigs 'dzin par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: ces bya'o // gang gi tshe m'a ma ka'i rin po che'i rigs 'dzin par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: When Mamaki holds the jewel family, then

original: ser po ji lta ba bzhin du phyag na rdo rje yang 'dir rin po che'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ser po ji lta ba bzhin du phyag na rdo rje yang 'dir rin po che'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: like the yellow, Vajrapani also becomes the jewel family here.

original: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rdo rje ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rdo rje ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
translated: Likewise, the samadhi-vajra is Amitabha,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya 'chang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya 'chang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because he holds the seal of samadhi.

original: rnam par gzhag pa gsum pa /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa gsum pa /
translated: The third arrangement:

original: nam mkha'i snying po padma'i rigs 'od gsal du 'jug par mngon par brjod pa'i phyir padma'i rigs can nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po padma'i rigs 'od gsal du 'jug par mngon par brjod pa'i phyir padma'i rigs can nyid do //
translated: because it is stated that Avalokitesvara enters the clear light of the lotus family, he is the one who has the lotus family.

original: rin po che dbang po'i sa la bzhugs pas na /
analyzed: rin po che dbang po'i sa la bzhugs pas na /
translated: Since he abides on the stage of the lord of jewels,

original: 'dir rin chen dbang po'i kha dog dang mtshan ma byas pa'i phyir gsungs pa'i rim pa rin po che'i rigs nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir rin chen dbang po'i kha dog dang mtshan ma byas pa'i phyir gsungs pa'i rim pa rin po che'i rigs nyid do //
translated: here the stage of the jewel is taught by the color and sign of the lord of jewels.

original: rgyal ba'i rdo rje ni drug pa ste /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i rdo rje ni drug pa ste /
translated: The victor-vajra is the sixth.

original: de'i rigs can byams pa yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can no zhes /
analyzed: de'i rigs can byams pa yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can no zhes /
translated: Since its clan is Maitreya, he also has the clan of Vairochana.

original: 'dir mdor byas kyi rim par rnam par bshad pa gsum po rnams kha cig sgrub par mi byed do //
analyzed: 'dir mdor byas kyi rim par rnam par bshad pa gsum po rnams kha cig sgrub par mi byed do //
translated: Here, some do not establish the three explanations in the order of the Compendium of Principles.

original: de bzhin du rim pa gsum par gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de'i rigs can de dang des /
analyzed: de bzhin du rim pa gsum par gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de'i rigs can de dang des /
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata who abides in the third stage and that one of that clan,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming du mngon par brjod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming du mngon par brjod do //
translated: that one is expressed by the name of the Tathāgata.

original: da ni snying po'i rim par gnas pas rab tu grags pa'i sa la sogs pa'i sgras spyan ma la sogs pa mngon par rjod par byed do zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni snying po'i rim par gnas pas rab tu grags pa'i sa la sogs pa'i sgras spyan ma la sogs pa mngon par rjod par byed do zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Now, it is said that by abiding in the stage of the essence, Locanā and so on are expressed by the terms of the well-known stages such as earth and so on.

original: sa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The root text] says, “Earth,” and so on.

original: nam mkha'i rdor rje zhes pa ni ci'i ming zhes bsam par bya ba 'jam @46a * //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rdor rje zhes pa ni ci'i ming zhes bsam par bya ba 'jam @46a * //
translated: The vajra of space is the object of thought.

original: dpal gang yin pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs can no zhes so //
analyzed: dpal gang yin pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs can no zhes so //
translated: The Glorious is the family of Akshobhya.

original: phyis 'chad par byed pa dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma ru ni 'od dpag med kyi rigs can nyid du bri ste /
analyzed: phyis 'chad par byed pa dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma ru ni 'od dpag med kyi rigs can nyid du bri ste /
translated: Later, the one who explains is drawn as the family of Amitabha in the sign of the mandala,

original: de bzhin padma padma gnas //🔽brtul zhugs can gyis nub tu dgod //
analyzed: de bzhin padma padma gnas // brtul zhugs can gyis nub tu dgod //
translated: likewise the lotus in the lotus abode,

original: ces te drug pa'o //
analyzed: ces te drug pa'o //
translated: the one with observances places in the west.

original: gzugs rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyi rim pa gnyis par ro //
analyzed: gzugs rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyi rim pa gnyis par ro //
translated: The four beginning with vajra of form are in the second stage.

original: reg bya zhes pa 'dis snying po'i rim pa'i nang du gtso bo dang rol par byed pa'i yul du mngon par brjod do zhes pa yul lnga'o //
analyzed: reg bya zhes pa 'dis snying po'i rim pa'i nang du gtso bo dang rol par byed pa'i yul du mngon par brjod do zhes pa yul lnga'o //
translated: By this touch in the inner stage of the essence, the object of the play of the principal one is expressed.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje zhes pa ni bsam par bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje zhes pa ni bsam par bya ba'o //
translated: The vajra of the realm of phenomena is the object of thought.

original: kun du bzang po yang rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs can nam /
analyzed: kun du bzang po yang rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs can nam /
translated: The Samantabhadra is said to be the family of Vajrasattva,

original: mi bskyod pa'i rigs can du rjod par byed do //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i rigs can du rjod par byed do //
translated: or the family of Akshobhya.

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te //
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te //
translated: That also is not correct,

original: de bzhin ral gri ral gri ljang //
analyzed: de bzhin ral gri ral gri ljang //
translated: so also the sword, the sword is green,

original: de ni de bzhin byang phyogs dgod //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin byang phyogs dgod //
translated: that is placed in the north.

original: ces dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma ru gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad do //
analyzed: ces dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma ru gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad do //
translated: Thus, the eight bodhisattvas are mentioned.

original: nam mkha'i khams zhes pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gzhal du med pa nyid du gsungs te sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams zhes pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gzhal du med pa nyid du gsungs te sngar bzhin no //
translated: With the realm of space and so forth, the tathāgatas are also said to be immeasurable, as before.

original: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pas gang gis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa de srid rtsam gyi mi bskyod pa la sogs pa lnga rnams sngar gsungs pa rnams mchog tu 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pas gang gis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa de srid rtsam gyi mi bskyod pa la sogs pa lnga rnams sngar gsungs pa rnams mchog tu 'dzin pa'o //
translated: With thus and so forth, he who completes the maṇḍala wheel, to that extent, the five beginning with Akṣobhya, previously mentioned, are the supreme holders.

original: la sogs pa zhes pa ni 'dir gtso bo yang rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: la sogs pa zhes pa ni 'dir gtso bo yang rtogs par bya'o //
translated: And so forth means that the principal one should also be understood here.

original: gtso bo ni gang 'jig rten du blta bar bya ba dang / dang po nyid du 'dul ba ste //
analyzed: gtso bo ni gang 'jig rten du blta bar bya ba dang / dang po nyid du 'dul ba ste //
translated: The principal one is that which is to be seen in the world, and is the first to be disciplined.

original: bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa'i tshogs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa'i tshogs so //
translated: The assembly of the Bhagavān and so forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bskor ba'i 'od srungs la sogs pa'i dge 'dun zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bskor ba'i 'od srungs la sogs pa'i dge 'dun zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should also say the Saṅgha of Kāśyapa and so forth, who are circumambulating the Bhagavān.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la sogs par 'dus pa brjod pa ma yin nam de lnga po 'di rnams kyi gtso bo ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la sogs par 'dus pa brjod pa ma yin nam de lnga po 'di rnams kyi gtso bo ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: Aren’t all the Tathāgatas included in the Mahāyāna sūtras and so forth? How are these five principal?

original: gsungs pa / lnga zhes bya bas phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can du gsungs pa'i phyogs bcu dang dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mi bskyod pa la sogs pa lnga po nyid kyis bsdus pas so //
analyzed: gsungs pa / lnga zhes bya bas phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can du gsungs pa'i phyogs bcu dang dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mi bskyod pa la sogs pa lnga po nyid kyis bsdus pas so //
translated: It is said: By the five, the Buddhas dwelling in the ten directions and three times, who are said to have the nature of the five aggregates, are included by Akṣobhya and so forth.

original: ji srid nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dpag tu med pa'i nam mkha' khyab pa nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: ji srid nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dpag tu med pa'i nam mkha' khyab pa nyid du gsungs so //
translated: As much as space, and so forth, it is said that the Tathāgatas pervade immeasurable space.

original: 'di rnams thams cad kyi sems can gyi don phul @46b du dbyung du med pa'i rgyun nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams thams cad kyi sems can gyi don phul @46b du dbyung du med pa'i rgyun nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di bstan pa'o //
translated: Since all of these are the very continuum of the unsurpassed benefit of sentient beings, this is taught.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rnam pa de lta bu'i dpes don brjod pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnam pa de lta bu'i dpes don brjod pa gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, the meaning is stated with an example of that kind.

original: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is like this, etc.

original: drang ba'i don to zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i nges don 'di gsungs pas drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i nges don 'di gsungs pas drang ba'i don to //
translated: The statement it is of provisional meaning is of provisional meaning because of the statement of this definitive meaning to be explained.

original: de ltar gzhan du yang bshad pa 'di rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar gzhan du yang bshad pa 'di rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Thus, this explanation should be understood in other places as well.

original: nges pa'i don gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: nges pa'i don gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: With regard to the definitive meaning, it is stated:

original: brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: inexpressible, etc.

original: 'dir rigs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dir rigs pa gsungs pa /
translated: Here, the reasoning is stated:

original: lnga zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lnga zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Five, etc.

original: de lta mod kyi gnas dang 'khor la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi gnas dang 'khor la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: However, how is the arrangement of the abode, retinue, etc.? It is stated:

original: de pas na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de pas na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, etc.

original: de nyid kyi phyir nges pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir nges pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, with regard to the definitive meaning, it is stated:

original: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus, etc.

original: ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di rnams slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig gnas par byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di rnams slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig gnas par byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: How is it that these Tathāgatas, who are like Bodhisattvas, do not again dwell together with the Tathāgatas?

original: sems can rnams kyi don du rang gi sgrub thabs gsungs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don du rang gi sgrub thabs gsungs pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not that they teach their own sādhanas for the sake of sentient beings?

original: bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs pa yang ci byed pa nyid du 'gyur /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs pa yang ci byed pa nyid du 'gyur /
translated: What would be the point of accomplishing the Blessed One?

original: de'i phyir brgal bar bya ba 'di dag yod do zhe na /🔽rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ram /
analyzed: de'i phyir brgal bar bya ba 'di dag yod do zhe na / rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ram /
translated: Therefore, these objections exist.🔽It is said that the Great Vajradhara, who is the embodiment of the five aggregates,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas dang / 'khor lo'i dbus su bzhugs pas ston par byed pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas dang / 'khor lo'i dbus su bzhugs pas ston par byed pa gsungs so //
translated: or the Tathāgatas, who dwell in the center of the maṇḍala, teach.

original: da ni zhes pa la sogs pa 'dod pa'i khams zhes pa ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ces pa rnam pa drug ni 'dod pa'i khams zhes pa 'dir mchog tu 'dod pa la sogs pa rnams ni ngan pa thob pas 'dod pa'i khams dang mthun pa nyid do //
analyzed: da ni zhes pa la sogs pa 'dod pa'i khams zhes pa ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ces pa rnam pa drug ni 'dod pa'i khams zhes pa 'dir mchog tu 'dod pa la sogs pa rnams ni ngan pa thob pas 'dod pa'i khams dang mthun pa nyid do //
translated: The desire realm is so called because it is concordant with the desire realm due to obtaining the worst of the supreme desires and so on.

original: de rnams rten par byed pa'i phyir rten yang 'dod pa'i khams so //
analyzed: de rnams rten par byed pa'i phyir rten yang 'dod pa'i khams so //
translated: Because they support those, the support is also the desire realm.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: 'dod pa'i khams ni gnas pa yi //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams ni gnas pa yi //
translated: The desire realm is the abode.

original: zhes so // yul la chags pa'i sems can rnam ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa dbang pos gzhung bar bya ba la mngon par zhen pa rnams so //
analyzed: zhes so // yul la chags pa'i sems can rnam ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa dbang pos gzhung bar bya ba la mngon par zhen pa rnams so //
translated: Sentient beings attached to objects are those who are attached to form, sound, and so on that are to be experienced by the sense faculties.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga zhes pa ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga zhes pa ni /
translated: The five qualities of desire are

original: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa lnga ni 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa lnga ni 'dod pa ste /
translated: the five such as form, sound, and so on that are desired.

original: 'dod par bya bas na 'dod pa khams dang mthun pas mngon par brjod par bya'o zhes pas 'dod @47a * //
analyzed: 'dod par bya bas na 'dod pa khams dang mthun pas mngon par brjod par bya'o zhes pas 'dod @47a * //
translated: Since it is to be desired, it is the desire realm, and since it is to be expressed, it is the realm of expression.

original: pa'o // bgrang bar bya grangs su bya zhes pas yon tan no //
analyzed: pa'o // bgrang bar bya grangs su bya zhes pas yon tan no //
translated: Since it is to be counted and enumerated, it is the realm of qualities.

original: sgo nas ni de la nye bar longs spyod pa'i bde bas so //
analyzed: sgo nas ni de la nye bar longs spyod pa'i bde bas so //
translated: Since it is the door to the enjoyment of bliss, it is the realm of enjoyment.

original: grol ba zhes pa ni lnga po de rnams nyid la rang bzhin yongs su shes pas mngon par zhen pa med pa'o //
analyzed: grol ba zhes pa ni lnga po de rnams nyid la rang bzhin yongs su shes pas mngon par zhen pa med pa'o //
translated: Liberation is the non-attachment to those five through the complete knowledge of their nature.

original: gsungs pa yang /🔽yul 'ga' zhig rnams btang byas shing ;
analyzed: gsungs pa yang / yul 'ga' zhig rnams btang byas shing ;
translated: It is also said:🔽Having abandoned some objects

original: / yul 'ga' zhig la gnod byas nas //
analyzed: / yul 'ga' zhig la gnod byas nas //
translated: and harmed some objects,

original: mi yi khyu mchog 'ga' zhig ni //
analyzed: mi yi khyu mchog 'ga' zhig ni //
translated: some supreme men

original: yul rnams nyid kyis byang chub byed //
analyzed: yul rnams nyid kyis byang chub byed //
translated: attain enlightenment through objects themselves.

original: rgyal po'i rin chen phreng bar yang //
analyzed: rgyal po'i rin chen phreng bar yang //
translated: In the Ratnavali of Nagarjuna it is said:

original: rtsa ba srid pa'i rnam par shes //
analyzed: rtsa ba srid pa'i rnam par shes //
translated: The root is the consciousness of existence.

original: yul ni de yi spyod yul min //
analyzed: yul ni de yi spyod yul min //
translated: The object is not its domain.

original: yul la bdag med du mthong ba //
analyzed: yul la bdag med du mthong ba //
translated: Seeing the selflessness of the object

original: srid pa'i sa bon 'gag par byed //
analyzed: srid pa'i sa bon 'gag par byed //
translated: stops the seed of existence.

original: ces so // yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: ces so // yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: gang gis yongs su 'ching 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang gis yongs su 'ching 'gyur ba //
translated: By whom one is completely bound,

original: mkhas pa de yis rnam par grol //
analyzed: mkhas pa de yis rnam par grol //
translated: that wise one is liberated.

original: rnam grangs ma lus pa 'di ni //
analyzed: rnam grangs ma lus pa 'di ni //
translated: This entire enumeration

original: byang chub 'byor ba'i tshul yin no //
analyzed: byang chub 'byor ba'i tshul yin no //
translated: is the method of the perfection of enlightenment.

original: de ma thag pa'o zhes pa ni gnas dang 'khor la sogs pa gsungs pa la ltos nas so //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'o zhes pa ni gnas dang 'khor la sogs pa gsungs pa la ltos nas so //
translated: The immediate is in dependence on the statement of the abode, retinue, and so forth.

original: yon tan brgyad ces pa ni grangs brgyad kyang yin la yon tan gyi dbang phyug kyang yin pa ste /
analyzed: yon tan brgyad ces pa ni grangs brgyad kyang yin la yon tan gyi dbang phyug kyang yin pa ste /
translated: The eight qualities are the eight numbers and the lord of qualities.

original: sku'i dbang phyug la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sku'i dbang phyug la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The lord of body and so forth will be explained.

original: 'bad par 'gyur ba'i chen po nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir chen po zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'bad par 'gyur ba'i chen po nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir chen po zhes pa'o //
translated: It is called great because it possesses the greatness of effort.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam pas sems can gyi don du snang bar byed do //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam pas sems can gyi don du snang bar byed do //
translated: The Great Vajradhara appears for the benefit of sentient beings in various aspects.

original: gsal bar byed de zhes pas rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: gsal bar byed de zhes pas rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: He shines and illuminates with Vairocana.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs rnam pa sna tshegs pa'i gzugs kyis gti mug la sogs pa la mngon bar dga' ba'i sems can rnams kyis 'di nyid mthong ba'i phyir ro//
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs rnam pa sna tshegs pa'i gzugs kyis gti mug la sogs pa la mngon bar dga' ba'i sems can rnams kyis 'di nyid mthong ba'i phyir ro//
translated: Because beings who delight in delusion and so on see this very [Buddha] in various forms such as Vairocana and so on.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sku spangs nas zhes pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs kyi sems can rnams 'chos par byed pa'i don du sh'akya thub pa'i gzugs su sprul pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sku spangs nas zhes pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs kyi sems can rnams 'chos par byed pa'i don du sh'akya thub pa'i gzugs su sprul pa'o //
translated: Having abandoned the body of one free from passion, he emanates in the form of Shakyamuni in order to discipline beings of the lineage free from passion.

original: spangs te zhes pa 'khor los sgyur pa'i gzugs bzung nas snga ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spangs te zhes pa 'khor los sgyur pa'i gzugs bzung nas snga ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Having abandoned means having taken on the form of a universal monarch, he abandons the previous [form].

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: chen po'o zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: chen po'o zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Great, and so on.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pas drang bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pas drang bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would not be led by the teaching of the perfect Buddha.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rgyud la sogs pa sngar gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rgyud la sogs pa sngar gsungs so //
translated: For that very reason, the tantra and so on were taught previously.

original: 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i gzugs sprul pa'i dgongs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i gzugs sprul pa'i dgongs pa gsungs pa /
translated: The intention of emanating a passionate form is stated:

original: 'dod chags @47b kyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags @47b kyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “By attachment, etc.”

original: 'dod chags kyis zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyis zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: “By attachment, etc.”

original: 'dod chags kyis ni yul la zhen pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyis ni yul la zhen pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
translated: means by the characteristic of clinging to objects through attachment.

original: 'dod chags rab tu spangs pa'i don ni /
analyzed: 'dod chags rab tu spangs pa'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of “completely abandoning attachment”

original: thog ma med pa'i 'khor bar goms pa'i yul la mngon par zhen pa rab tu nyams pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i 'khor bar goms pa'i yul la mngon par zhen pa rab tu nyams pa'i don du'o //
translated: is the meaning of the complete destruction of the manifest clinging to objects that has been habituated since beginningless cyclic existence.

original: sems can rnams smin par byed pa dang / grol bar byed pa nyid yul lo //
analyzed: sems can rnams smin par byed pa dang / grol bar byed pa nyid yul lo //
translated: The object is the very ripening of sentient beings and the liberation of sentient beings.🔽Clinging to those

original: de rnams las mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams las mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: is the clinging to those objects.

original: de rnams 'dul bar byas nas chags pa nyid kyis nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams 'dul bar byas nas chags pa nyid kyis nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Having disciplined them, one observes them with attachment.

original: de nyid ces pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba la ltos pas so //
analyzed: de nyid ces pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba la ltos pas so //
translated: “That very” refers to what is to be explained.

original: tshul zhes pa ni 'dis nges par bya /
analyzed: tshul zhes pa ni 'dis nges par bya /
translated: “Method” is that by which one is certain.

original: gdul bya mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong du 'khrid par byed do zhes pas tshul lo //
analyzed: gdul bya mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong du 'khrid par byed do zhes pas tshul lo //
translated: It is a method because it leads trainees to the city of nirvana.

original: de gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: That samādhi which is of that nature is the characteristic of the one-pointed mind.

original: snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Having entered into union, etc.

original: sngar gsungs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo mchog tu 'dzin no //
analyzed: sngar gsungs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo mchog tu 'dzin no //
translated: It is the supreme retention of the previously mentioned divine wheel.

original: zhugs par mdzad do zhes pa ni dkyil gyi dbang phyug ces pas lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhugs par mdzad do zhes pa ni dkyil gyi dbang phyug ces pas lhag ma'o //
translated: Having entered into union, he is the lord of the maṇḍala, as stated by the remainder.

original: de'i sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can las so //
analyzed: de'i sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can las so //
translated: From his three-being nature.

original: gsungs pa rang gis bon zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa rang gis bon zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The statement “his own seed” and so forth.

original: phung po khams la sogs pa ni ste /
analyzed: phung po khams la sogs pa ni ste /
translated: The aggregates, constituents, etc.

original: phung po khams la sogs pa zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgras las skye mched dang yul gyi cha shas kyi rang bzhin rnams kyang zhugs so zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: phung po khams la sogs pa zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgras las skye mched dang yul gyi cha shas kyi rang bzhin rnams kyang zhugs so zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The aggregates, constituents, etc. The word “etc.” in “aggregates, constituents, etc.” includes the sense bases and the parts of the object.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde pas ni mthar thug pa'i bde bas tshim par byed pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde pas ni mthar thug pa'i bde bas tshim par byed pa'i don du'o //
translated: With the bliss of supreme joy, he is satisfied with ultimate bliss.

original: nyid kyi sku ni rang gi phung po'o //
analyzed: nyid kyi sku ni rang gi phung po'o //
translated: His own body is his own aggregates.

original: gnas skabs snga ma zhes pa na bud med dang / skyes pa'i rnam par gnas pa'i gnas skabs su rab tu zhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rab tu zhugs pa las sngar gyi rnam snang la sogs pa /
analyzed: gnas skabs snga ma zhes pa na bud med dang / skyes pa'i rnam par gnas pa'i gnas skabs su rab tu zhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rab tu zhugs pa las sngar gyi rnam snang la sogs pa /
translated: The “previous state” is the state of abiding in the form of a woman or a man.

original: spyan ma la sogs pa nyid kyis gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: spyan ma la sogs pa nyid kyis gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The previous state of abiding in the mandala is prior to the state of abiding in the form of Vairochana, etc.,🔽and Lochana, etc.

original: bud med kyi gzugs zhes pa ni bud med kyi gzugs nyid du de rnams nyid phyung ba'o zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bud med kyi gzugs zhes pa ni bud med kyi gzugs nyid du de rnams nyid phyung ba'o zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The “female form” is the extraction of those very [deities] in the form of women.

original: sku las zhes pa ni dngos las phyir rol yul gyi dngos po med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sku las zhes pa ni dngos las phyir rol yul gyi dngos po med pa'i phyir /
translated: “From the body” means from the actual, because there is no external object.

original: 'byung ba yang lus la brten pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'byung ba yang lus la brten pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Since the elements are also based on the body,

original: bud med kyi dbang po'i lus la lhag par 'dus byas pa'i bud med kyi gsang ba mngon par kun nas byung bar gyur to zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bud med kyi dbang po'i lus la lhag par 'dus byas pa'i bud med kyi gsang ba mngon par kun nas byung bar gyur to zhes pa ni /
translated: the secret of a woman, which is formed in excess in the body of a woman, arises.

original: 'das pa la 'jug pa'i bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa la 'jug pa'i bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the past.

original: de nyid ces pa @48a * //
analyzed: de nyid ces pa @48a * //
translated: “That very”

original: ni slar gleng gzhir gsungs pa'i gzugs yongs su gyur pa ste /
analyzed: ni slar gleng gzhir gsungs pa'i gzugs yongs su gyur pa ste /
translated: The form mentioned in the nidana is the transformation.

original: mi bskyod pa ni reg bya'i ngo bo lta bu'o zhes pa'i gsung las so //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa ni reg bya'i ngo bo lta bu'o zhes pa'i gsung las so //
translated: Akshobhya is like the essence of touch.

original: sngar gyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa gang yin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug kyang rdo rje 'chang lta bu'i sku la zhugs so zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: sngar gyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa gang yin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug kyang rdo rje 'chang lta bu'i sku la zhugs so zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the lord of the mandala, who is the one who enters the mandala as before, enters the body of Vajradhara.

original: drang ba'i don la dmigs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i nges pa'i don gsungs pa chen po zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: drang ba'i don la dmigs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i nges pa'i don gsungs pa chen po zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The great declaration of the definitive meaning, preceded by the interpretation of the provisional meaning, is great passion, etc.

original: 'dod chags chen po ni mthar thug pa'i yul la chags pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po ni mthar thug pa'i yul la chags pa'o //
translated: Great passion is attachment to the ultimate object.

original: de nyid sems can gyi don gyi rgyur rtag tu de 'dzin par byed pa bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir chos so //
analyzed: de nyid sems can gyi don gyi rgyur rtag tu de 'dzin par byed pa bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir chos so //
translated: That itself is the Dharma, because it always holds that as the cause of the benefit of sentient beings, like a mother.

original: de'i tshul ni yongs su shes pa ste ;
analyzed: de'i tshul ni yongs su shes pa ste ;
translated: The method of that is complete knowledge.

original: de'i rim pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i rim pa gsungs pa /
translated: The stages of that are declared:

original: 'dod chags zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: passion, etc.

original: 'dod chags ni snang pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni snang pa'o //
translated: Passion is appearance.

original: de skye ba ni 'dod chags rab tu 'jug pa las kyang skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de skye ba ni 'dod chags rab tu 'jug pa las kyang skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It arises from the arising of passion.

original: de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba nye bar thob pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba nye bar thob pa'o //
translated: Similarly, it is said to be the attainment of freedom from passion.

original: 'dod chags par ma ni gnyis ka'i cha shas can du gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags par ma ni gnyis ka'i cha shas can du gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The mother of passion is said to be the part of both.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: gang chen snang ba nyer thob pa //
analyzed: gang chen snang ba nyer thob pa //
translated: The attainment of the light of the great

original: gnyid ka'i cha shas can nyid 'di /
analyzed: gnyid ka'i cha shas can nyid 'di /
translated: is this part of sleep.

original: thog mar 'od gsal bar 'jug nyid //
analyzed: thog mar 'od gsal bar 'jug nyid //
translated: First, it enters into clear light.

original: ces so // rim gyis zhes pa ni ye shes skye ba'i rim pa 'di yis so //
analyzed: ces so // rim gyis zhes pa ni ye shes skye ba'i rim pa 'di yis so //
translated: The gradual process is the process of the arising of gnosis.

original: rnam par dag pa ni 'od gsal ba rtogs pa'o//
analyzed: rnam par dag pa ni 'od gsal ba rtogs pa'o//
translated: Purification is the realization of clear light.

original: mngon du 'byin pa'i thabs zhes pa ni zung 'jug mngon du 'byin pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: mngon du 'byin pa'i thabs zhes pa ni zung 'jug mngon du 'byin pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: The method of manifestation is the cause of manifesting union.

original: de nyid ces pa ni 'dod chags chen po'i tshul nyid brjod pa'i don du ming rab tu gsal ba gang yin pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces pa ni 'dod chags chen po'i tshul nyid brjod pa'i don du ming rab tu gsal ba gang yin pa zhes pa'o //
translated: That itself is the name of the clear light that is expressed for the sake of expressing the method of great passion.

original: ci ltar byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci ltar byas nas she na /
translated: How is it done?

original: de la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes gsungs so /
analyzed: de la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes gsungs so /
translated: It is said, “having entered into union with it. ”

original: de dag ces pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de dag ces pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: The those and so forth are

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor / sku'i dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor / sku'i dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa'o //
translated: the external mandala, the mandala of the body, and the mandala of the mind.

original: sku'i dkyil 'khor ni ye shes kyi sku la'o //
analyzed: sku'i dkyil 'khor ni ye shes kyi sku la'o //
translated: The mandala of the body is the body of pristine consciousness.

original: de ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rim gyis rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: de ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rim gyis rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: That is the purification by the sequence of passion and so on.

original: de nas ldang bar byed do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de nas ldang bar byed do zhes pa'o //
translated: Then, one should arise.

original: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis rnam par bshad ba snga ma'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis rnam par bshad ba snga ma'o //
translated: The method of great passion is the previous explanation.

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas sprul pa'i sku la ltos pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas sprul pa'i sku la ltos pa'i tshig ste /
translated: The words one's own and so on are the words that depend on the nirmāṇakāya.

original: mdo dang bsres par gnas skabs 'dir sbyar ba'i phyir ro /
analyzed: mdo dang bsres par gnas skabs 'dir sbyar ba'i phyir ro /
translated: Since it is applied in this context, it is mixed with the sūtras.

original: kun du 'dzin par byed pa yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: kun du 'dzin par byed pa yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Since it is the nature of all buddhas, it is grasped.

original: kun du 'dzin par byed pa yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: kun du 'dzin par byed pa yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Since it is the nature of all buddhas, it is grasped.

original: dpa' bo nyid dam mchod 'os nyid dang mkhas pa nyid do //
analyzed: dpa' bo nyid dam mchod 'os nyid dang mkhas pa nyid do //
translated: It is heroism, worthiness of worship, and skillfulness.

original: de nas zhes @48b bya ba la sogs pa la snga ma bzhin zhes bya ba ni drang ba'i don gyi bshad par lha mo rnams byung ba sngar bzhin du 'dir khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes @48b bya ba la sogs pa la snga ma bzhin zhes bya ba ni drang ba'i don gyi bshad par lha mo rnams byung ba sngar bzhin du 'dir khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Then and so on. As before means that the goddesses should be understood here as they were in the explanation of the interpretable meaning.

original: drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi brjod du med pa'i yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa nyid gnas dang / 'khor nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi brjod du med pa'i yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa nyid gnas dang / 'khor nas brtsams nas /
translated: The explanation of the also of the interpretable and definitive meanings, inexpressible and so on, is based on the abode and retinue, and so on, up to the thus.

original: 'dir de bzhin gyi mthar thug pa'i bshad pa la brten nas /
analyzed: 'dir de bzhin gyi mthar thug pa'i bshad pa la brten nas /
translated: Here, based on the explanation of the ultimate,

original: slar yang drang ba dang nges pa'i don dag la kun du 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: slar yang drang ba dang nges pa'i don dag la kun du 'jug par byed do //
translated: one again engages in the interpretable and definitive meanings.

original: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni lha mo'i 'khor la'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni lha mo'i 'khor la'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī maṇḍala is the retinue of goddesses.

original: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ces pa ni 'khor lo'i gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa 'dod pa lnga'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir de la dbang phyug ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ces pa ni 'khor lo'i gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa 'dod pa lnga'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir de la dbang phyug ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed pa nyid do //
translated: The lord of desire is the lord of the maṇḍala, because it is the nature of the five desires such as form, sound, and so on. Lord means acting as one wishes.

original: bstan nas zhes pa ni yul la nye bar longs spyod pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi don du'o //
analyzed: bstan nas zhes pa ni yul la nye bar longs spyod pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi don du'o //
translated: Having taught, for the sake of those disciples who enjoy the object.

original: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Now, etc.

original: lha mo'i bha gar dbang bskur ba la sogs pas bsdu bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: lha mo'i bha gar dbang bskur ba la sogs pas bsdu bar bya ba'am /
translated: One should gather by means of the consecration in the bhaga of the goddess, etc.,

original: 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi rim pa las 'das pa bskyed par bya'o zhes pas bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi rim pa las 'das pa bskyed par bya'o zhes pas bsdus pa'o //
translated: or one should generate the transcendence of the stages of the continuum of migrating beings.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa'o //
translated: That is why it is said.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: That is why it is said.

original: sprul pa'i bya ba ni sprul par byed pa'i bya ba'o //
analyzed: sprul pa'i bya ba ni sprul par byed pa'i bya ba'o //
translated: The activity of emanation is the activity of emanating.

original: mi bskyod pa'i zhes pa dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir zhes sbrel lo //🔽byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad do zhes pa ni bskyed par byas pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i zhes pa dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir zhes sbrel lo // byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad do zhes pa ni bskyed par byas pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Of Akshobhya, etc.

original: snga ma bzhin te zhes pa tshig dang po'i rnam par bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin te zhes pa tshig dang po'i rnam par bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: Having blessed, i.e., having generated, as before, i.e., as explained in the first verse.

original: shes rab ni btsun mo'o //
analyzed: shes rab ni btsun mo'o //
translated: Wisdom is the queen.

original: gnas ni bha ga la'o /
analyzed: gnas ni bha ga la'o /
translated: The abode is the bhaga.

original: der chud pa ni gnas der son pa'o //
analyzed: der chud pa ni gnas der son pa'o //
translated: Having entered there, i.e., having gone to that abode.

original: grub bzhi la sogs pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: grub bzhi la sogs pa zhes pa ni /
translated: The four-cornered and so on are

original: khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par brjod pa'o //
analyzed: khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par brjod pa'o //
translated: the description of the palace.

original: dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The great commitment and so on are🔽the mandala of that.

original: de'i dkyil 'khor ni mi bskyod pa'i sprul pa'i bya ba'o zhes sngar gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i dkyil 'khor ni mi bskyod pa'i sprul pa'i bya ba'o zhes sngar gsungs so //
translated: The emanation and so on are the activities of Akshobhya's emanation, as previously stated.

original: gsal ba zhes pa la sogs pa yang khang pa brtsegs pa'i ngo bo ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ba zhes pa la sogs pa yang khang pa brtsegs pa'i ngo bo ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The clear and so on also show the nature of the palace.

original: bdag nyid ces pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The self is the nature of Akshobhya.

original: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i'o //
translated: The vajra of enlightenment mind is that of Great Vajradhara.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: rigs lnga zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs lnga zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five families and so on.

original: 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel is the wheel of deities of the emanated mandala.

original: slar yang zhes pa ni sngar rab tu zhugs par brjod pa la ltos nas so //
analyzed: slar yang zhes pa ni sngar rab tu zhugs par brjod pa la ltos nas so //
translated: The again is in reference to the previously mentioned entry.

original: bzhugs pa'i gnas su mdzad pa de'i bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: bzhugs pa'i gnas su mdzad pa de'i bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: The abode is the place of dwelling, which is of that nature.

original: bha ga ni ye shes te ye shes ni gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi @49a * //
analyzed: bha ga ni ye shes te ye shes ni gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi @49a * //
translated: The bhaga is intuition, because intuition is the very essence of the innate nature.

original: phyir ro // sar gyur zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: phyir ro // sar gyur zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: The ten stages, etc.

original: rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g-yo ba dang / legs ma'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba'i sa bcu po rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g-yo ba dang / legs ma'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba'i sa bcu po rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
translated: The ten stages of the bodhisattvas are called the Joyful, the Immaculate, the Illuminating, the Radiant, the Hardto-Conquer, the Realized, the Far-Reaching, the Unshakable, the Excellent Intelligence, and the Cloud of Dharma.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni kun du 'od ces bya ba 'dis bcu gcig par theg pa chen po las gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni kun du 'od ces bya ba 'dis bcu gcig par theg pa chen po las gsungs so //
translated: The stage of the transcendent lords is called the All-Light. Thus, the eleven are taught in the Mahayana.

original: thams cad dag cing rnam par dag pa'i rim pa yang /
analyzed: thams cad dag cing rnam par dag pa'i rim pa yang /
translated: The stages of complete purity and total purity are as follows:

original: dang po las kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dang po las kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the first application of action,

original: sa brgyad pa ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa brgyad pa ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: one attains the eighth stage.

original: snang ba gsum po mthong pa yis //
analyzed: snang ba gsum po mthong pa yis //
translated: By seeing the three lights,

original: sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas //
analyzed: sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas //
translated: one is well-established in the ten stages.

original: mngon par byang chub legs thob nas //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub legs thob nas //
translated: Having attained manifest enlightenment,

original: gtsang ma'i gnas su nye bar 'gro //
analyzed: gtsang ma'i gnas su nye bar 'gro //
translated: One goes to the pure abodes.

original: sang rgyas zhing nas mi ldog pa'i //
analyzed: sang rgyas zhing nas mi ldog pa'i //
translated: One does not turn back from the Buddha-fields.

original: tshe 'di nyid la thams cad mkhyen //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la thams cad mkhyen //
translated: In this very life, one becomes omniscient.

original: zhes so // spyod bsdus su yang /
analyzed: zhes so // spyod bsdus su yang /
translated: The Compendium of Practice also says:

original: rdo rje theg pa 'di la bskyed pa'i rim pa la goms pas /
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa 'di la bskyed pa'i rim pa la goms pas /
translated: By being familiar with the generation stage of this Vajrayāna,

original: sa brgyad pa thob pa nas slar yang bde bar gshegs pa nye bar bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: sa brgyad pa thob pa nas slar yang bde bar gshegs pa nye bar bskyed par bya ste /
translated: one attains the eighth level and then again generates the sugata.

original: ji srid du rdzogs pa'i rim pa thob par ma gyur pa de srid du dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus par bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid du rdzogs pa'i rim pa thob par ma gyur pa de srid du dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus par bya'o //
translated: Until one attains the completion stage, one should respect the spiritual master.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs lhag par rtogs shing sa bcu pa thob nas /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs lhag par rtogs shing sa bcu pa thob nas /
translated: Having realized the superior body, speech, and mind and attained the tenth level,

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin lhag par rtogs te /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin lhag par rtogs te /
translated: one realizes the superior illusion-like meditative stabilization.

original: snang ba rnam par dag pa thob par bya'o zhes rtogs te sa bcu gcig par mngon par brjod do //
analyzed: snang ba rnam par dag pa thob par bya'o zhes rtogs te sa bcu gcig par mngon par brjod do //
translated: One should attain the pure appearance and thus attain the eleventh level.🔽The first chapter of the Compendium of Practice also says:

original: spyod bsdus le'u dang por yang gang gi tshe skyu ma lta bu'i ring nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: spyod bsdus le'u dang por yang gang gi tshe skyu ma lta bu'i ring nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de'i tshe /
translated: When one enters into the meditative stabilization of the illusion-like,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob po //🔽de bu ma la 'jug par yang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob po // de bu ma la 'jug par yang /
translated: He has received the empowerment of all the buddhas.🔽In the Tantra Requested by Subahu,

original: kun nas sangs rgyas rnam la dbang bskur dam pa de thob ste //🔽bcu po zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / sa bcu gcig pa nyid ces pa ni /
analyzed: kun nas sangs rgyas rnam la dbang bskur dam pa de thob ste // bcu po zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / sa bcu gcig pa nyid ces pa ni /
translated: he has attained the sublime empowerment of all the buddhas.

original: rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud du yang /
analyzed: rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud du yang /
translated: The ten stages and so forth are mentioned in the Vajra Essence Ornament Tantra:

original: de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te //
analyzed: de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te //
translated: The Bhagavat is the yoga,

original: byang chub sems ni 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni 'od gsal ba //
translated: the clear light of bodhicitta,

original: kun du 'od kyis chen po //
analyzed: kun du 'od kyis chen po //
translated: the great all-illuminating light,

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan //
translated: the mandala of the sun with its splendor,

original: gnyis pa bdud rtsi 'od ces pa //
analyzed: gnyis pa bdud rtsi 'od ces pa //
translated: the second is the light of nectar,

original: shin tu 'od gsal zla ba 'dra //
analyzed: shin tu 'od gsal zla ba 'dra //
translated: the very clear light like the moon,

original: gsum pa nam mkha' 'od ces pa //
analyzed: gsum pa nam mkha' 'od ces pa //
translated: the third is the light of space,

original: mkha' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas //
analyzed: mkha' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas //
translated: well-established like space.

original: sa bzhi pa ni gang yin te //
analyzed: sa bzhi pa ni gang yin te //
translated: The fourth is the stage

original: rdo rje 'od mtha' yid du 'ong //
analyzed: rdo rje 'od mtha' yid du 'ong //
translated: of the vajra light that is pleasing,

original: bsam ba brtan pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: bsam ba brtan pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: the application of a firm intention,

original: rdo rje zhes ni yongs su @49b bsgrags //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes ni yongs su @49b bsgrags //
translated: renowned as the vajra.

original: lnga pa rin chen 'od ces bya //
analyzed: lnga pa rin chen 'od ces bya //
translated: The fifth is called the jewel light,

original: dbang bskur ba la rab tu gnas //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba la rab tu gnas //
translated: And the consecration.🔽

original: drug po padma 'chang zhes bya //
analyzed: drug po padma 'chang zhes bya //
translated: The sixth is called the Holder of the Lotus,

original: pad bzhin rab tu rnam par snang //
analyzed: pad bzhin rab tu rnam par snang //
translated: Illuminating like a lotus.

original: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid de //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid de //
translated: The nature of phenomena is pure

original: dri ma med cing yongs bzung med //
analyzed: dri ma med cing yongs bzung med //
translated: and stainless, without any grasping.

original: bdun pa las kyi 'od ces bya //
analyzed: bdun pa las kyi 'od ces bya //
translated: The seventh is called the Light of Action,

original: sangs rgyas phrin las byed par 'dod//
analyzed: sangs rgyas phrin las byed par 'dod//
translated: the activity of the buddhas.

original: brgyad pa dpe med pa zhes bya //
analyzed: brgyad pa dpe med pa zhes bya //
translated: The eighth is called the Incomparable,

original: 'di la dpe ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'di la dpe ni yod ma yin //
translated: incomparable to anything else.

original: dgu pa dpe bral zhes bya ste //
analyzed: dgu pa dpe bral zhes bya ste //
translated: The ninth is called the Absence of Examples,

original: thams cad dpe ni so se rtogs //
analyzed: thams cad dpe ni so se rtogs //
translated: realizing all examples individually.

original: bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya //
analyzed: bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya //
translated: The tenth is called the Light of Wisdom,

original: sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med //
translated: the unsurpassed stage of buddhahood.

original: bcu gcig thams cad mkhyen zhes bya //
analyzed: bcu gcig thams cad mkhyen zhes bya //
translated: The eleventh is called Omniscience,

original: sa chen po ni 'dod gsal ba //
analyzed: sa chen po ni 'dod gsal ba //
translated: the stage of the great illumination of all.🔽The twelfth is the stage of the individual knowledge

original: bcu gnyis so so'i bdag nyid rig / rnal 'byor ye shes rab rdzogs pa //
analyzed: bcu gnyis so so'i bdag nyid rig / rnal 'byor ye shes rab rdzogs pa //
translated: of the perfection of the wisdom of yoga.

original: sa chen po ni 'di dag ldan //🔽sangs rgyas rnams ni don dam las //
analyzed: sa chen po ni 'di dag ldan // sangs rgyas rnams ni don dam las //
translated: These are the great stages🔽of the buddhas, who are beyond the ultimate.

original: sangs rgyas chos //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos //
translated: The buddhas are the qualities of the buddhas.

original: rnal 'byor pa yang ye shes spyod //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yang ye shes spyod //
translated: The yogins are the conduct of wisdom.

original: ces so // de bzhin du dgongs pa lung ston du yang //
analyzed: ces so // de bzhin du dgongs pa lung ston du yang //
translated: And in the Sandhivyākaraṇa:

original: sar 'gyur de ni bcu gsum pa //
analyzed: sar 'gyur de ni bcu gsum pa //
translated: That stage is the thirteenth.

original: zhes so // de yang zhes pa ni de dag kyang nu ma dang skrar ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes so // de yang zhes pa ni de dag kyang nu ma dang skrar ldan pa ma yin no //
translated: And that is not endowed with breasts and hair.

original: de chos zhes pa ni de'i chos te nyon mongs 'joms par byed pa de las bzlog pa ma yin yang /
analyzed: de chos zhes pa ni de'i chos te nyon mongs 'joms par byed pa de las bzlog pa ma yin yang /
translated: That Dharma is the Dharma of that, which is the destruction of afflictions, and is not opposed to that.

original: de'i rang bzhin de nyid bha ga'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de nyid bha ga'o //
translated: That nature of that is the bhaga.

original: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa na //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa na //
translated: When one focuses on suchness,

original: sngar bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa ma lus pa 'jig pa'i phyir dang / da ltar dngos po rnams kyi skye bar ba 'byam 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa ma lus pa 'jig pa'i phyir dang / da ltar dngos po rnams kyi skye bar ba 'byam 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: all previously accumulated afflictions are destroyed, and the arising of things in the present is destroyed.

original: dri ma med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i rdul ma lus pa dang / kun du 'dris pa ma yin pa'i //
analyzed: dri ma med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i rdul ma lus pa dang / kun du 'dris pa ma yin pa'i //
translated: Stainless means that it is not mixed with any remaining afflictions.

original: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku'o //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku'o //
translated: The maṇḍala of the great commitment is the body of Mahāvajradhara.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ston par byed pa gsal ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ston par byed pa gsal ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The illumination that reveals its nature is “clear” and so forth.

original: gsal ba chogs bsags pa'i 'gro ba rnam pa shel lta bu'o //
analyzed: gsal ba chogs bsags pa'i 'gro ba rnam pa shel lta bu'o //
translated: The beings who have accumulated the collections are clear, like crystal.

original: snang pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: snang pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de /
translated: The nature of appearance is the nature of suchness,

original: de bzhin nyid las longs pa snang ba gsum gyis bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid las longs pa snang ba gsum gyis bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the appearance that is other than suchness is generated by the three appearances.

original: 'od zer lnga ni dkar po la sogs pa'i 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga ni dkar po la sogs pa'i 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It has five lights, because it possesses the five lights of white and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: All tathāgatas are Akṣhobhya and so on.

original: de'i bdag nyid can yin pas na de rnams de'i bdag tu byed pas de'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can yin pas na de rnams de'i bdag tu byed pas de'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Since they have the nature of that, they are the nature of those, because they are made into the nature of those.

original: sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab pa'o //🔽rab tu zhugs par gyur to ni de @50a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab pa'o // rab tu zhugs par gyur to ni de @50a * //
translated: It is pervaded by clouds of buddhas.

original: bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid 'dzin par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid 'dzin par gyur pa'o //
translated: It has entered means it has taken on the nature of suchness.

original: snying rje'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir dang / lta ba dang bcas pa'i dri ma lus pa dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: snying rje'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir dang / lta ba dang bcas pa'i dri ma lus pa dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it has the nature of compassion and because it is completely pure of the stains of views.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa la phyir phyogs pa las so //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa la phyir phyogs pa las so //
translated: From turning away from the afflictions such as passion, etc.🔽Compassion, etc.

original: snying rje zhes pa la sogs pa ni de'i phyir me lta bu'i 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrugs ni sgyu ma'i sprul pa ni me'i phyung po chen po bzhin no //
analyzed: snying rje zhes pa la sogs pa ni de'i phyir me lta bu'i 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrugs ni sgyu ma'i sprul pa ni me'i phyung po chen po bzhin no //
translated: Thus, the many rays of light like fire are disturbed, the magical emanations are like a great mass of fire.🔽Illumination, etc.

original: snang ba zhis pa la sogs pa ni gsal pa ni gsal ba zhes pa snang ba gsum po rnams te zla ba la sogs pa bzhin du gsal ba'i phyir ro /
analyzed: snang ba zhis pa la sogs pa ni gsal pa ni gsal ba zhes pa snang ba gsum po rnams te zla ba la sogs pa bzhin du gsal ba'i phyir ro /
translated: Illumination is the three illuminations, because they are clear like the moon, etc.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dkyil 'khor rnams kyis zhes pa mang po'i tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dkyil 'khor rnams kyis zhes pa mang po'i tshig go //
translated: Therefore, the maṇḍalas, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'di de rnams kyi gnas ni rten no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'di de rnams kyi gnas ni rten no //
translated: The abode of all the tathāgatas is the support of all the tathāgatas such as Akṣhobhya, etc.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes pa ni de rnam par 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes pa ni de rnam par 'byed pa'o //
translated: Great Vajradhara is the one who distinguishes them.

original: rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid can zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rigs lnga'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid can zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rigs lnga'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of all the families is the nature of the five families such as Akṣhobhya, etc.

original: bdag nyid ces pa ni 'di gzhag par gyur to zhes pa ni bya ba la ltos pa med pa las nyid do //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces pa ni 'di gzhag par gyur to zhes pa ni bya ba la ltos pa med pa las nyid do //
translated: The himself is the one who has been placed, and from is from the non-dependence on action.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa las ni 'od gsal ba las so //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa las ni 'od gsal ba las so //
translated: From the ultimate truth, from the clear light.

original: bzhengs nas zhes pa sngar gyi rtogs pa'i nus pa las so //🔽srid pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: bzhengs nas zhes pa sngar gyi rtogs pa'i nus pa las so // srid pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: Having arisen, from the power of the previous realization.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: Existence is the conventional truth, and nirvana is the ultimate truth.

original: de dag ro gcig pa ni aa ru ra'i phye ma dang / sbyar ba ro gzhan la zhugs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de dag ro gcig pa ni aa ru ra'i phye ma dang / sbyar ba ro gzhan la zhugs pa bzhin no //
translated: Their single taste is like the mixture of the powder of asafetida and the other ingredients, which has entered into another taste.

original: 'dis ni rang bzhin gcig pa nyid kyis gzhag par gyur to zhes brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis ni rang bzhin gcig pa nyid kyis gzhag par gyur to zhes brjod do //
translated: This is said to be placed by the single nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: 'jig rten gsum zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The three worlds and so forth.

original: 'dod pa la sogs pa'i khams gsum du yang sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa la sogs pas sems can ma lus pa yongs su smin pa dang / grol ba dang / snod kyi 'jug rten rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mnga' bdag yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa la sogs pa'i khams gsum du yang sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa la sogs pas sems can ma lus pa yongs su smin pa dang / grol ba dang / snod kyi 'jug rten rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mnga' bdag yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the three realms of desire and so forth, he is the master of the various emanations and so forth, because he completely matures and liberates all sentient beings, and because he is the master of the various world systems.

original: nam mkha' kun zhes pa la sogs pa ni /🔽kun kyang de yin la /
analyzed: nam mkha' kun zhes pa la sogs pa ni / kun kyang de yin la /
translated: The space of all, and so forth.🔽All is that, and the space of opportunity is that.

original: go skabs su gyur pa'i nam mkha' yang de yin no zhes pas nam mkha' kun gyi skabs ni 'jug pa'i dus su skyes pa'o //
analyzed: go skabs su gyur pa'i nam mkha' yang de yin no zhes pas nam mkha' kun gyi skabs ni 'jug pa'i dus su skyes pa'o //
translated: Thus, the space of all is the time of entry.

original: de'i phyir rdzogs pa nyid las khams bzhi po rnams nam mkha'i kun gyi skabs der nam mkha'i kun gyi skabs der nam mkha'i go skabs kun stong pa bzhi po der ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdzogs pa nyid las khams bzhi po rnams nam mkha'i kun gyi skabs der nam mkha'i kun gyi skabs der nam mkha'i go skabs kun stong pa bzhi po der ro //
translated: Therefore, from the state of perfection, the four elements are in the space of all, in the space of all, in the space of all space.

original: bde mchog ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam @50b par sbyor ba ma mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog tu'o //
analyzed: bde mchog ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam @50b par sbyor ba ma mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog tu'o //
translated: Supreme bliss is the union of all buddhas in the supreme bliss of the illusory dakini.

original: phung po la sogs pa rjes su zhugs pas zhes pa ni shin tu rnal tu rnal 'byor gyi rim pas so //
analyzed: phung po la sogs pa rjes su zhugs pas zhes pa ni shin tu rnal tu rnal 'byor gyi rim pas so //
translated: By entering into the aggregates, etc. refers to the stage of the very unelaborate yoga.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: don 'di zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: don 'di zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: This meaning, etc.

original: gsal ba nyid kyi phyir yi ge'i don ni ma bris so //
analyzed: gsal ba nyid kyi phyir yi ge'i don ni ma bris so //
