translated: Since it is clear, the meaning of the syllables is not written.

original: 'das pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba la sogs pa rtsam nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'das pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba la sogs pa rtsam nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The past, etc. refers to the Tathagatas dwelling in the three times, because they are the very essence of the moon, etc.

original: zil gyis gnon pa ni aa bhi bha ba nam ste /
analyzed: zil gyis gnon pa ni aa bhi bha ba nam ste /
translated: Subjugation is abhibhava.

original: aa bhi kun nas bha ba ni 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: aa bhi kun nas bha ba ni 'byung ba'o //
translated: Abhi means all around, and bhava means arising.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: don de nyid ni rdo rje las rdo rje 'chang du bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: don de nyid ni rdo rje las rdo rje 'chang du bskyed pa'o //
translated: That very meaning is the generation of Vajradhara from the vajra.

original: 'dis rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor las rdzogs pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor las rdzogs pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku gsungs so //
translated: By this, the body of the perfect Vajradhara is spoken of in the yoga and subsequent yoga.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bya ba la sogs pas rdzogs pa'i shin tu rnal 'byor ro /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bya ba la sogs pas rdzogs pa'i shin tu rnal 'byor ro /
translated: The very unelaborate yoga is the performance of all the Tathagatas, etc.

original: spyi'i don gyi rgyu can gyis sbas pa'i don gsungs so //
analyzed: spyi'i don gyi rgyu can gyis sbas pa'i don gsungs so //
translated: The hidden meaning is stated on the basis of the general meaning.

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi rnam pas ni kun rdzob tu rnam par 'jug pa'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi rnam pas ni kun rdzob tu rnam par 'jug pa'i ngo bos so //
translated: The term all and so forth refers to the relative awakening mind, which is the relative aspect of the mind of awakening.

original: gcig tu mdzad de ni de'i dbus su phyung po la sogs pa rnams de rtsam nyid kyi phyir ro /
analyzed: gcig tu mdzad de ni de'i dbus su phyung po la sogs pa rnams de rtsam nyid kyi phyir ro /
translated: The term unites refers to the fact that the aggregates and so forth are based on it.

original: de nyid ni ting nge 'dzin nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ni ting nge 'dzin nyid do //
translated: The term concentration refers to the very nature of the mind.

original: de lta ni de'i dus su bzhugs pa'i sems nyid dbye bar dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ni de'i dus su bzhugs pa'i sems nyid dbye bar dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The term abides refers to the fact that the mind at that time is difficult to divide.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni de lta bur gyur pa'i sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni de lta bur gyur pa'i sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
translated: The term concentration refers to the one-pointedness of the mind.

original: snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems de'i rnam pa'i snod pa'i snod yin pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems de'i rnam pa'i snod pa'i snod yin pa'i phyir ro /
translated: The term equipoise refers to the fact that the mind is the basis for the experience of that state.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: This entire realm of space and so forth.

original: thabs kyi ye shes ni snang ba mched pa'o //
analyzed: thabs kyi ye shes ni snang ba mched pa'o //
translated: The term wisdom of method refers to the increase of appearances.

original: nang du gyur par rab tu zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: nang du gyur par rab tu zhugs pa'o //
translated: The term enters refers to the inner transformation.

original: sems can thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa rnams so zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa rnams so zhes pa ni /
translated: “All sentient beings” means the aggregates, etc.

original: sems can thams cad kyi phung po la sogs pa rtsam nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi phung po la sogs pa rtsam nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the aggregates, etc. of all sentient beings are just the aggregates, etc. of the Bodhisattva.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: “By the blessing of Vajrasattva” means Vajrasattva, because he is of the nature of Vajrasattva.

original: de'i byin gyis brlabs pa ni shar ba'o //
analyzed: de'i byin gyis brlabs pa ni shar ba'o //
translated: His blessing is his arising.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: “All Tathagatas” means Akshobhya, etc., who are of the nature of the aggregates, etc.

original: bde ba zhes pa la sogs pa la zhu par gyur nas zhes pa thabs kyi ye shes dang lhan cig gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba zhes pa la sogs pa la zhu par gyur nas zhes pa thabs kyi ye shes dang lhan cig gyur pa'o //
translated: “Bliss” etc. means that he became one with the gnosis of the means.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /🔽mchog tu dga' @51a * //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa / mchog tu dga' @51a * //
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: ba'i bde ba nyams su myong bar gyur to zhes so //
analyzed: ba'i bde ba nyams su myong bar gyur to zhes so //
translated: “He experienced the bliss of supreme joy.”

original: pas pa'i bshad pa'i rgyu can mthar thug pa gsungs so //
analyzed: pas pa'i bshad pa'i rgyu can mthar thug pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus he spoke the ultimate, which is the cause of the explanation.

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “All” etc.

original: phung po lnga ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: phung po lnga ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: The five aggregates are of the nature of the conventional truth.

original: don dam pa'i bden pas gcig tu mdzad nas ni don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pas gcig tu mdzad nas ni don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: Having made them one with the ultimate truth, by the nature of the ultimate truth.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: stong pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “emptiness” and so forth.

original: bshad pa'i rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: The four modes of explanation.

original: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa la lhag par mos par byed pas na lhag par mos pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa la lhag par mos par byed pas na lhag par mos pa'o //
translated: Thus, and so forth. Since one has superior devotion, it is superior devotion.

original: phung po la sogs pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub la lha la sogs pa'i rnam pa mchog tu 'dzin to //
analyzed: phung po la sogs pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub la lha la sogs pa'i rnam pa mchog tu 'dzin to //
translated: One holds the aggregates and so forth, which are the dependent origination, as the supreme form of the deity and so forth for the mundane powers.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen por bskyed nas zhes pa ni skabs su bab pa gsungs pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen por bskyed nas zhes pa ni skabs su bab pa gsungs pa'i rim pas so //
translated: Having generated as Great Vajradhara, by the stage of the teaching at this time.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Since he is of the nature of the vajra body, speech, and mind of all the Ones-Gone-Thus,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni yi ge gsum ste de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni yi ge gsum ste de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The vajra of the body, speech, and mind of all the Tathagatas is the three syllables.

original: 'da' bar mi bya ba nyid kyi phyir dam tshig go //
analyzed: 'da' bar mi bya ba nyid kyi phyir dam tshig go //
translated: Because they are not to be transgressed, they are pledges.

original: de nyid ces pa yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: de nyid ces pa yi ge gsum mo //
translated: The three syllables are called “just that.”

original: skyes pa zhes pa ni byung bar gsungs so //
analyzed: skyes pa zhes pa ni byung bar gsungs so //
translated: “Arisen” means “come forth.”

original: de nyid ni rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje ste /
translated: That is the vajra,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of Great Vajradhara.

original: ting nge 'dzin de la ni rnam pa de lta bu'i sems rtsi gcig pa la'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la ni rnam pa de lta bu'i sems rtsi gcig pa la'o //
translated: That samadhi is the single-pointed mind of that kind.

original: rig pa chen po zhes pa la rig pa chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
analyzed: rig pa chen po zhes pa la rig pa chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
translated: “Great knowledge” is Great Vajradhara,

original: de skyed par byed pa po nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de skyed par byed pa po nyid kyis so //
translated: because he is the producer of that.

original: rig pa chen po ni gsang sngags kyi yi ge rnams ni yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: rig pa chen po ni gsang sngags kyi yi ge rnams ni yi ge gsum mo //
translated: The great knowledge is the three syllables, the letters of the mantra.

original: des zhes pa ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: des zhes pa ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'o //
translated: “By that” refers to the creation and completion stages.

original: skyes bu'i gzugs ni skyes bu'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu'i gzugs ni skyes bu'i rnam pa'o //
translated: “The form of a person” is the appearance of a person.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The Tathagatas are Vairochana, etc.

original: sngags ni bskyed pa'i rgyu sum cu so gnyis kyi grangs so //
analyzed: sngags ni bskyed pa'i rgyu sum cu so gnyis kyi grangs so //
translated: The Mantras are the thirty-two causes of generation.

original: sgrub pa'i thabs las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis ni /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i thabs las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis ni /
translated: By the method taught in the Sadhana,

original: mdor byas can gyi rim pa'i sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i rim pas /
analyzed: mdor byas can gyi rim pa'i sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i rim pas /
translated: by the method taught in the Sadhana of the Condensed Process,

original: rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dag gis rdzogs pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la /
analyzed: rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dag gis rdzogs pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la /
translated: in the perfect Sambhogakaya of the Yoga and Anuyoga,

original: aom yig la sogs bkod pas shin tu rnal 'byor rdzogs pa la dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug par byas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i mthar thug pa ji srid du skyed par @51b gyur pa'o //
analyzed: aom yig la sogs bkod pas shin tu rnal 'byor rdzogs pa la dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug par byas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i mthar thug pa ji srid du skyed par @51b gyur pa'o //
translated: by the arrangement of the syllable OM, etc., the perfection of Atiyoga is generated, as far as the culmination of the Great Yoga, which is the three-faced, six-armed white form.

original: gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhal gsum pa'i rnam pas zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhal gsum pa'i rnam pas zhes pa ni /
translated: In the transformation, etc., the three-faced aspect

original: 'dir rnal 'byor bzhi mthar thug par zhal gsum pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir rnal 'byor bzhi mthar thug par zhal gsum pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: means that here, at the culmination of the four Yogas, one should realize the three-faced form.

original: rnam par gzhag pa dang / mdo dang bsre ba gnyis su shin tu rnal 'byor gyi mthar thug par zhal gsum pa nyid la 'di nyid du zhugs pa'i lung du bshad do //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa dang / mdo dang bsre ba gnyis su shin tu rnal 'byor gyi mthar thug par zhal gsum pa nyid la 'di nyid du zhugs pa'i lung du bshad do //
translated: The three-faced one is explained in the scriptures as entering into the ultimate of the very yoga of the presentation and the mixing with the sutras.

original: ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa'i dang por bshad pa de nyid du 'dir yang 'chad par byed pa rnal 'byor bzhi'i mthar thug pa zhes 'dir gsungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa'i dang por bshad pa de nyid du 'dir yang 'chad par byed pa rnal 'byor bzhi'i mthar thug pa zhes 'dir gsungs pa'i phyir /
translated: Just as it is explained in the first presentation, here also it is explained as the ultimate of the four yogas, because it is stated here as “the ultimate of the four yogas.”

original: rnal 'byor bzhi'i mthar thug par rdo rje 'chang chen po gsal bar rjes su 'jug par bshad par bya'o zhes pa ni mi 'gal lo //🔽gal te rnam pa gzhan du ni rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor gyi mthar ram /
analyzed: rnal 'byor bzhi'i mthar thug par rdo rje 'chang chen po gsal bar rjes su 'jug par bshad par bya'o zhes pa ni mi 'gal lo // gal te rnam pa gzhan du ni rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor gyi mthar ram /
translated: Therefore, it is not contradictory to explain that one enters into the clear manifestation of Great Vajradhara at the ultimate of the four yogas.🔽If it is otherwise, then one would enter into one’s desired deity, Akṣobhya, and so on, at the ultimate of the subsequent yoga and the very yoga,

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i mthar rang gi 'dod pa'i lha mi bskyod pa la sogs par rab tu 'jug par 'gyur na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i mthar rang gi 'dod pa'i lha mi bskyod pa la sogs par rab tu 'jug par 'gyur na /
translated: or at the ultimate of the great yoga.

original: de'i tshe drang ba'i don du gsungs pa dag gsung par 'gyur ba'i nges pa'i don dag gis rnam par gzhag pa la sogs pa rnams dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe drang ba'i don du gsungs pa dag gsung par 'gyur ba'i nges pa'i don dag gis rnam par gzhag pa la sogs pa rnams dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, it would contradict the statements of the definitive meaning that are to be spoken by the statements of the interpretable meaning, such as “the establishment of the world, etc.”

original: gdul bya rnams kyis mthong bar gyur to zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gdul bya rnams kyis mthong bar gyur to zhes pa ni /
translated: “The disciples saw”

original: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i sku ni gdul bya ma yin pas kyang mthong bar ci ltar 'gyur te sh'akya seng ge bzhin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i sku ni gdul bya ma yin pas kyang mthong bar ci ltar 'gyur te sh'akya seng ge bzhin no //
translated: means that since the disciples are not the disciples of the Emanation Body, how could they see the Emanation Body, just as they do not see the Lion of the Shakyas?

original: yongs su smin dang grol ba'i snod kyi gdul bya'i dbang du byas nas bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa las gdul bya rnams kyi zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su smin dang grol ba'i snod kyi gdul bya'i dbang du byas nas bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa las gdul bya rnams kyi zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: In terms of the disciples who are the vessels of complete maturation and liberation, it should be said that the disciples saw the Bhagavat who was born.

original: slar yang gzhan gyis mthong ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: slar yang gzhan gyis mthong ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that they saw the other.

original: yang na dngos dang brgyud pas thams cad kho nas gdul byas de bzhin du mthong ba dang ; reg pa dang / thos pa dang dran pas bcom ldan 'das rnams dga' bas yid kyi rigs yang dag par shes par byed do //
analyzed: yang na dngos dang brgyud pas thams cad kho nas gdul byas de bzhin du mthong ba dang ; reg pa dang / thos pa dang dran pas bcom ldan 'das rnams dga' bas yid kyi rigs yang dag par shes par byed do //
translated: Or else, by direct and indirect means, all of them, by seeing, touching, hearing, and remembering the Blessed Ones, cause the mind-family to be perfectly known.

original: rdzogs pa'i rigs rnams kyis de dag 'phel bar byed do //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rigs rnams kyis de dag 'phel bar byed do //
translated: The perfect families increase them.

original: so sor 'joms pa rnams kyi yang bdun la sogs pa so sor 'joms par nus pa rnams kyi 'jigs pas 'jigs par gyur pa rnams de la skyabs su 'gro ba'i phyir drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: so sor 'joms pa rnams kyi yang bdun la sogs pa so sor 'joms par nus pa rnams kyi 'jigs pas 'jigs par gyur pa rnams de la skyabs su 'gro ba'i phyir drang ba'i don to //
translated: The families that are destroyed individually are able to destroy the seven, etc. , and those who are frightened by fear go for refuge to them.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /🔽dam tshig gis ni yang dag par 'gro bar byed do //
analyzed: thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste / dam tshig gis ni yang dag par 'gro bar byed do //
translated: “All” and so forth.🔽By the pledge, one causes them to go perfectly.

original: rnam par thim par byed do zhes pas dam tshig go //
analyzed: rnam par thim par byed do zhes pas dam tshig go //
translated: By the pledge, one causes them to dissolve.

original: de las byung ba ni ye shes kyi rim pas zhes @52a * //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni ye shes kyi rim pas zhes @52a * //
translated: From that, by the process of intuition,

original: drang ba'i don las khyad par ro //
analyzed: drang ba'i don las khyad par ro //
translated: one distinguishes the interpretable meaning.

original: chen po zhes pa la sogs pa la mchog ces pa ni /
analyzed: chen po zhes pa la sogs pa la mchog ces pa ni /
translated: The word “great” in the verse means:

original: 'gro ba'i mchog nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i mchog nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Supreme, because of being the best of beings.

original: tshad med dang zhes pa ni yon tan dang / ye shes dang / gzugs dang / sems can gyi don la sogs pa rnams kyis yongs su gcad par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad med dang zhes pa ni yon tan dang / ye shes dang / gzugs dang / sems can gyi don la sogs pa rnams kyis yongs su gcad par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Immeasurable, because of being beyond measure in terms of qualities, knowledge, form, and the benefit of sentient beings.

original: mkhas zhes pa ni rig pa'i gnas ma lus pa thams cad las so //
analyzed: mkhas zhes pa ni rig pa'i gnas ma lus pa thams cad las so //
translated: Skilled, in all the branches of knowledge.

original: brtson ni bya ba rnams thams cad la kun tu zhum pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: brtson ni bya ba rnams thams cad la kun tu zhum pa med pa nyid do //
translated: Diligent, never discouraged in any activity.

original: spro ba ni lhag par spro ba'o //
analyzed: spro ba ni lhag par spro ba'o //
translated: Enthusiastic, with a special enthusiasm.

original: las bdag nyid ni sems can gyi don la sogs pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las bdag nyid ni sems can gyi don la sogs pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The work is the engagement in the benefit of sentient beings and so forth.

original: de dang de ni shin tu rmad du byung ste shin tu ngo mtshar ba'o //
analyzed: de dang de ni shin tu rmad du byung ste shin tu ngo mtshar ba'o //
translated: That is very marvelous, very wonderful.

original: de dag las bskyed pa ni de'i bdag nyid du yongs su shes pas dmigs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de dag las bskyed pa ni de'i bdag nyid du yongs su shes pas dmigs par gyur pa'o //
translated: The generation of that is the observation of the object of knowledge in the form of that.

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog ni lag pa la sogs pa 'khor lo la sogs pa dang rgyan gyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog ni lag pa la sogs pa 'khor lo la sogs pa dang rgyan gyi rnam pa'o //
translated: The supreme of all aspects is the aspect of the wheel, etc. , of the hands, etc. , and of the ornaments.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa nyid ni sngags so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa nyid ni sngags so //
translated: All the Tathagatas are Akshobhya, etc. , and the mantras are their natures.

original: de rnams kyis byin gyis rlob pa ni de'i rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyis byin gyis rlob pa ni de'i rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: The consecration is their nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: All the Tathagatas, etc.

original: drang ba dang nges pa'i don dag las yongs su ma dag ba dang / yongs su dag pa'i lha rnams dag bstan to //
analyzed: drang ba dang nges pa'i don dag las yongs su ma dag ba dang / yongs su dag pa'i lha rnams dag bstan to //
translated: The impure and pure deities are taught from the provisional and definitive meanings.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: The definitive meaning is:

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas yongs su ma dag pa dang yongs su dag pa'i rim pas bskyed pa dang / sems can gyi sprul pa'i sems can gyi don du so sor mi bskyod pa la sogs pa spro ba ston par byed do //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas yongs su ma dag pa dang yongs su dag pa'i rim pas bskyed pa dang / sems can gyi sprul pa'i sems can gyi don du so sor mi bskyod pa la sogs pa spro ba ston par byed do //
translated: Then, etc. , teaches the emanation of Akshobhya, etc. , for the sake of sentient beings, by the stages of the impure and the pure, and the creation.

original: dga' ba'i thugs kyis ni mchog tu dga' ba tshim par gyur pa'i thugs kyis so //
analyzed: dga' ba'i thugs kyis ni mchog tu dga' ba tshim par gyur pa'i thugs kyis so //
translated: With a delighted mind means with a mind satisfied by supreme delight.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /🔽sngar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa / sngar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Therefore it is said:🔽From the heart previously mentioned,

original: sngar gsungs pa'i thugs ka las ni lha mo'i padma las so //
analyzed: sngar gsungs pa'i thugs ka las ni lha mo'i padma las so //
translated: from the lotus of the goddess.

original: ched du brjod pa ni dga' bas tshig la ched du brjod pa zhes brdar byas so //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa ni dga' bas tshig la ched du brjod pa zhes brdar byas so //
translated: Intentional utterance is the utterance of words with delight.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: ae ma'o gang zhes ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ae ma'o gang zhes ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Amazing! That which is called

original: rnam pa gnyis zhes pa ni lha'i gzugs rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis zhes pa ni lha'i gzugs rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: two aspects refers to the two aspects of the form of the deity.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: All the Tathagatas are of its very nature.

original: sba bar bya bas na gsang ba'o ni snod ma yin pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: sba bar bya bas na gsang ba'o ni snod ma yin pa rnams la'o //
translated: It is secret because it is to be concealed from those who are not vessels.

original: rtog pa dang bar ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa ni rang bzhin nyid las 'di'i rnam par rtog par byed mi nus @52b pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bar ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa ni rang bzhin nyid las 'di'i rnam par rtog par byed mi nus @52b pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is beyond imagination means that it is not possible to imagine it by its very nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: rab tu mi rtog go //
analyzed: rab tu mi rtog go //
translated: It is not imagined.

original: khams gsum pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa la mi gnas pa'i phyir gnas pa zhes so //
analyzed: khams gsum pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa la mi gnas pa'i phyir gnas pa zhes so //
translated: The three realms and so on are the desire, form, and formless realms.  Because he does not abide in them, he is unabiding.

original: slob dpon dang slob ma'i 'brel pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: slob dpon dang slob ma'i 'brel pa zhes pa ni /
translated: The relationship of master and disciple is

original: ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i gdul bya rnams bcom ldan 'das ston par byed pa'i dus su mi gnas pa rnams dang slob ma rnams kyis ji ltar slob dpon dang bla ma la ji ltar bya ba de bstan par bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i gdul bya rnams bcom ldan 'das ston par byed pa'i dus su mi gnas pa rnams dang slob ma rnams kyis ji ltar slob dpon dang bla ma la ji ltar bya ba de bstan par bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: in order to show how future disciples should act toward their master and guru when the Blessed One, the teacher, is no longer present.

original: 'dus pa mdzad nas zhes pa slob ma rnams kyi 'dus ba nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dus pa mdzad nas zhes pa slob ma rnams kyi 'dus ba nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Having gathered together means that the disciples themselves have gathered together.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: All the Tathagatas are Akshobhya and so on.

original: de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir bla ma yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir bla ma yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
translated: Because he is their very nature, the guru is all the Tathagatas.

original: de'i mchod pa spros pa ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir dam tshig go //
analyzed: de'i mchod pa spros pa ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir dam tshig go //
translated: His worship is unwavering because it cannot be transgressed, and so it is a commitment.🔽 🔽The great seal is the great seal of all the Tathagatas.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de kho na nyid rin po che'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de kho na nyid rin po che'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the jewel of reality.

original: 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das ston par byed pa'i dus la ltos pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das ston par byed pa'i dus la ltos pa'i tshig go //
translated: Thus he said means that the Bhagavān spoke in dependence on the time of teaching.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams zhes pa ni /
translated: All tathāgatas are forms and so on.

original: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rnams rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rnams rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because forms, sounds, and so on are the nature of Vairocana and so on.

original: de rnams zhes pa ni 'dod pa lnga gsungs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de rnams zhes pa ni 'dod pa lnga gsungs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: Those are the five desired objects that were mentioned.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
translated: All tathāgatas are Mahāvajradhara.

original: de'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because he is their nature.

original: bla ma yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: bla ma yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
translated: The guru is also all tathāgatas.

original: de'i mchod pa spros pa ni /
analyzed: de'i mchod pa spros pa ni /
translated: His worship is elaborate.

original: dngos dang bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: dngos dang bsgoms pas so //
translated: It is done with things and meditation.

original: dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis kyang 'da' ba bya ba ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis kyang 'da' ba bya ba ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: The pledge is that even the gnosis of the tathāgatas should not transgress it.

original: yul lnga la reg bya'i mchod pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: yul lnga la reg bya'i mchod pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: The five objects are stated in terms of the offering of touch.

original: de nyid ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The word “that” and so forth.

original: bud med rin po che rnams zhes mang po'i tshig ni slob ma rnams mang ba nyed la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: bud med rin po che rnams zhes mang po'i tshig ni slob ma rnams mang ba nyed la ltos pa'o //
translated: The precious women are stated in the plural because of the many disciples.

original: gang yang lha mo thams cad kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir mang po'i tshig tu brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang yang lha mo thams cad kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir mang po'i tshig tu brjod par bya'o //
translated: And because of the nature of all goddesses, the plural should be stated.

original: de rnams zhes pa la sogs pa mang po'i tshig tu yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams zhes pa la sogs pa mang po'i tshig tu yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The word “those” and so forth should also be stated in the plural.

original: de ltar mchod pa byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar mchod pa byas nas /
translated: Having made such offerings,

original: slob ma rnams kyi bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir bshad du gsol zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba 'debs te /🔽byung ba zhes pa ni yang dag pa ma nor bde bzhin du byung ba'i @53a * //
analyzed: slob ma rnams kyi bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir bshad du gsol zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba 'debs te / byung ba zhes pa ni yang dag pa ma nor bde bzhin du byung ba'i @53a * //
translated: in order to teach the disciples’ activities, the request is made with “please explain” and so forth.🔽“Arisen” means the nature of the mode of being of the unerring, perfect, and just-as-it-is

original: tshul gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: tshul gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: nature.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i snying po'i stobs gang yin pa de rnams rdo rje snying po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i snying po'i stobs gang yin pa de rnams rdo rje snying po'o //
translated: Those who have the power of the vajra essence are vajra essence beings.

original: 'dus pa zhes pa ni yang dag par bsdu bar bya ba dang / bsdus pa'i phyir de'i bdag tu byed pas 'gro bar byed pa gang du byung ba'i tshul gyis bdag nyid can du 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa zhes pa ni yang dag par bsdu bar bya ba dang / bsdus pa'i phyir de'i bdag tu byed pas 'gro bar byed pa gang du byung ba'i tshul gyis bdag nyid can du 'dus pa'o //
translated: The word “assembly” means that which is collected together, and that which is collected together is the self of that, because it is the agent of going, by the manner of arising in the self-nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: gcig tu gyur zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gcig tu gyur zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “becoming one” and so forth.

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa de nyid do //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa de nyid do //
translated: “All” and so forth is just that.

original: gsang ba zhes pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid can yongs su dag pa dang / yongs sum dag pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku'o //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid can yongs su dag pa dang / yongs sum dag pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku'o //
translated: “Secret” means the body, speech, and mind nature of the totally pure and totally impure Great Vajradhara.

original: sba bar bya ba ni skal med rnams la'o //
analyzed: sba bar bya ba ni skal med rnams la'o //
translated: “To be hidden” is from those who are not worthy.

original: 'dus pa phyi mar gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dus pa phyi mar gsungs pa /
translated: In the Later Assembly Tantra it is said:

original: gsang ba zhes 'di ci la brjod //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes 'di ci la brjod //
translated: What is this called “secret”?

original: 'di ru gsung dang sku dang gsung //
analyzed: 'di ru gsung dang sku dang gsung //
translated: Here it is the body, speech, and mind

original: thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum //🔽gsang ba zhes ni mngon brjod bya //
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum // gsang ba zhes ni mngon brjod bya //
translated: Of the three kinds of Vajra.🔽It is called “secret.”

original: zhes so // gsang chen las zhes pa 'od gsal las so //
analyzed: zhes so // gsang chen las zhes pa 'od gsal las so //
translated: “From the great secret” means from clear light.

original: lha'i sku 'od gsal ba las byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lha'i sku 'od gsal ba las byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the divine body arises from clear light.

original: gnyis zhes pa ni brjod par bya ba shes rab dang thabs dag go //
analyzed: gnyis zhes pa ni brjod par bya ba shes rab dang thabs dag go //
translated: The “two” are the objects of expression, wisdom and method.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is said:

original: 'dus pa zhes pa ci zhig brjod //🔽ces pa la /
analyzed: 'dus pa zhes pa ci zhig brjod // ces pa la /
translated: What is called “gathering”?

original: 'dus pa sbyor bar rab gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dus pa sbyor bar rab gsungs te /
translated: It is said that “gathering” is the union,

original: shes rab dang thabs gnyis ka'i 'khor lo'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs gnyis ka'i 'khor lo'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because it has the nature of the wheel of both wisdom and method.

original: 'dus pa phyi mar /
analyzed: 'dus pa phyi mar /
translated: In the Later Guhyasamāja,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon rjod byed //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon rjod byed //
translated: it is said, “All buddhas are expressed.”

original: ces so // yi ge'i don ni yi ge'i don la brten nas spyi'i don gsungs so //
analyzed: ces so // yi ge'i don ni yi ge'i don la brten nas spyi'i don gsungs so //
translated: The meaning of the syllables is the general meaning stated in dependence on the meaning of the syllables.

original: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa la rdo rje dang padma ni skyes pa dang bud med kyi dbang po dag yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa la rdo rje dang padma ni skyes pa dang bud med kyi dbang po dag yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
translated: In “vajra” and so on, the vajra and lotus are the male and female organs in union.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas nas spyi'i don te /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas nas spyi'i don te /
translated: In terms of the stage of generation, it is the general meaning.

original: spyi'i don la brten nas sbas pa'i don gsungs so //
analyzed: spyi'i don la brten nas sbas pa'i don gsungs so //
translated: In dependence on the general meaning, the hidden meaning is stated.

original: zhes rab dang thabs ni nang gi bdag nyid can gyi snang ba mched pa dag go //
analyzed: zhes rab dang thabs ni nang gi bdag nyid can gyi snang ba mched pa dag go //
translated: The “means” and “insight” are the light and the spreading light, which are of the nature of the inner self.

original: yang dag par sbyor ba ni snang ba nye bar thob pa ste 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par sbyor ba ni snang ba nye bar thob pa ste 'dus pa'o //
translated: The “perfect union” is the attainment of the light, the union.

original: sbas pa'i don la brten nas mthar thug pa gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: sbas pa'i don la brten nas mthar thug pa gsungs pa'o //
translated: The ultimate is taught in dependence on the hidden meaning.

original: kun rdzob ni sgyu ma'i sku'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob ni sgyu ma'i sku'o //
translated: The “relative” is the illusory body.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa ni dngos po'o //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa ni dngos po'o //
translated: The “ultimate truth” is the real thing.

original: de dag 'dres pa ni de'i bdag nyid yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: de dag 'dres pa ni de'i bdag nyid yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: Their “mixture” is the thorough knowledge of their identity.

original: gsang ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni gsang ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni gsang ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The explanation of “secret” and so forth is “secret” and so forth.

original: mthar thug pa'o zhes pa rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: mthar thug pa'o zhes pa rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: The “ultimate” is twofold.

original: mngon par 'dod pa zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i mngon par bzhed par @53b gyur pa nyid las so //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i mngon par bzhed par @53b gyur pa nyid las so //
translated: “Desired” means that it is the very desire of Great Vajradhara.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa 'di'i bshad pa ni 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa la sogs pas gzhan las khyad par du byed pa'i den du gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa 'di'i bshad pa ni 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa la sogs pas gzhan las khyad par du byed pa'i den du gsungs so //
translated: The explanation of “all tathāgatas” here is that it is said to be the truth that distinguishes it from others by “tathāgata” and so forth.

original: lta ci smos zhes pa la sogs pa ni sems can thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i don du rim pa gnyis la brten nas /
analyzed: lta ci smos zhes pa la sogs pa ni sems can thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i don du rim pa gnyis la brten nas /
translated: What need is there to mention...🔽...🔽

original: 'di bstan par sgrub par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'di bstan par sgrub par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: “What need is there to speak” and so forth is because of the desire to establish the teaching of this tantra in order to take care of all sentient beings.

original: rin po che dang tsandan la sogs pa gnyis ka mngon par brjod do //
analyzed: rin po che dang tsandan la sogs pa gnyis ka mngon par brjod do //
translated: “Both” refers to the jewels and sandalwood and so forth.

original: spro ba med pa ni 'dus pa'i don la gus pa med pa nyid du ston par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: spro ba med pa ni 'dus pa'i don la gus pa med pa nyid du ston par 'dod pa'o //
translated: “Lack of enthusiasm” is taught as the lack of respect for the meaning of the tantra.

original: brda spong bar byed do ni gsol ba 'debs pa bo rnams kyi rgyud la'o //
analyzed: brda spong bar byed do ni gsol ba 'debs pa bo rnams kyi rgyud la'o //
translated: “Rejecting the hint” is in the mindstreams of those who request.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ang yul ma yin zhes pa ni 'gal ba'i tshig yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ang yul ma yin zhes pa ni 'gal ba'i tshig yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “Intentional explanation” is because the words are contradictory, “not even the domain of all the tathāgatas.”

original: thams cad ces pa la sogs pas slar yang gsol ba 'debs par byed de //
analyzed: thams cad ces pa la sogs pas slar yang gsol ba 'debs par byed de //
translated: Again, requesting with “all” and so forth,

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa las sku la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa las sku la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The secret of body, speech, and mind is the pledge and vow, etc. , because they are the cause of the transformation into body, etc.

original: dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa la sku dang thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa la sku dang thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
translated: The secret of body, speech, and mind is in the pledge and vow, etc.

original: de la dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therein, the pledge is the vow to protect, etc.🔽The vow is the vow of the Vajra Vehicle, such as the vow of entering the mandala, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.

original: sdom pa ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa rdo rje theg pa'i sdom pa'o //
analyzed: sdom pa ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa rdo rje theg pa'i sdom pa'o //
translated: The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.

original: sogs pa'i sgra las sbom po dang // rtsa ba'i ltung ba la sogs pa dang / de las ldang ba'o //🔽thabs gsungs pa dang ldan pa bzung ngo //🔽de sngon du gro ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rigs gsum yongs su gyur pa skyed pa ste /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgra las sbom po dang // rtsa ba'i ltung ba la sogs pa dang / de las ldang ba'o // thabs gsungs pa dang ldan pa bzung ngo // de sngon du gro ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rigs gsum yongs su gyur pa skyed pa ste /
translated: The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams dang / de'i rigs can rnams kyang sku la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams dang / de'i rigs can rnams kyang sku la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The vow of the pledge is the vow of the great seal, etc.🔽The vow of the pledge is the vow

original: yi ge'i don to zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mthar thug gi bar du phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pas da ltar gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge'i don to zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mthar thug gi bar du phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pas da ltar gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the syllables, etc., up to the end, should be understood by following the present explanation, through their mutual dependence.

original: sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni yi ge gsum ni de bskyed pa'i sa bon nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni yi ge gsum ni de bskyed pa'i sa bon nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The secret of body, speech, and mind is the three syllables, because they are the seed of their generation.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ye shes gsum ni 'gro ba'i rgyud ni sku la sogs pa rnams kyi ye shes gsum gyi lta bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ye shes gsum ni 'gro ba'i rgyud ni sku la sogs pa rnams kyi ye shes gsum gyi lta bskyed pa'o //
translated: The secret of body, speech, and mind is the three intuitions, because the three intuitions of body, etc., generate the three intuitions in the life-streams of beings.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni ye shes kyi rang @54a * //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni ye shes kyi rang @54a * //
translated: The secret of body, speech, and mind is the body which is the nature of intuition,

original: bzhin gyi sku ni yongs su dag pa dang yongs su ma dag pa'i sku dag ste /
analyzed: bzhin gyi sku ni yongs su dag pa dang yongs su ma dag pa'i sku dag ste /
translated: because it is the body of perfect purity and the body of imperfect impurity,

original: sku la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: and because it is the nature of body, etc.

original: 'dir 'od gsal dang zung 'jug tu mngon par dgongs nas bstan ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'dir 'od gsal dang zung 'jug tu mngon par dgongs nas bstan ba nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Here, the ultimate is taught with the intention of clearlight transparency and union,

original: mthar thug pa zhes te rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: mthar thug pa zhes te rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: and so it is twofold.

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
translated: The phrase all of them and so forth refers to the consecration.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la sogs pa gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la sogs pa gnas pa ste /
translated: The consecration is the abiding of the body and so forth of all the Tathagatas.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: sku la sogs par zhugs par mdzad do //
analyzed: sku la sogs par zhugs par mdzad do //
translated: He enters into the body and so forth.

original: 'dir sogs pa'i sgra las ngag dang yid la yang zhugs shing rab tu zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir sogs pa'i sgra las ngag dang yid la yang zhugs shing rab tu zhugs pa'o //
translated: Here, the word and so forth refers to speech and mind, which are also entered into and fully entered into.

original: rab tu zhugs pa rnams kyang rnam par rtog pa la sogs pas bya ba la bskyod pa ji srid du kun du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu zhugs pa rnams kyang rnam par rtog pa la sogs pas bya ba la bskyod pa ji srid du kun du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Those who are fully entered into are also fully entered into by the activity of conceptualization and so forth, because they abide everywhere.

original: byin gyis rlob pa de mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol zhes sbrel lo //
analyzed: byin gyis rlob pa de mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol zhes sbrel lo //
translated: Having performed that consecration, the Blessed One is requested to teach.

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa ste ni lnga po de bskyed pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge aom yig la sogs pa de rnams kyi sku la sogs pa bskyed par mdzad nas zhes sngar gsungs pa la sbrel lo //
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa ste ni lnga po de bskyed pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge aom yig la sogs pa de rnams kyi sku la sogs pa bskyed par mdzad nas zhes sngar gsungs pa la sbrel lo //
translated: The body vajra and so forth, that is, the seed syllables of those five, the syllable Om and so forth, having generated the body and so forth, as previously stated.

original: dbang po gnyis ni bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: The two organs are the female and male organs.

original: de snyoms par zhugs pa ni bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: de snyoms par zhugs pa ni bskyod pa'o //
translated: His entry into union is the shaking.

original: byang chub sems kyi thig le ni kun rdzob bo //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi thig le ni kun rdzob bo //
translated: The drop of the Thought of Enlightenment is the superficial.

original: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnams kyis so //
analyzed: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnams kyis so //
translated: By that, of all the Tathagatas, by their natures.

original: dbang bskur pa ni ji ltar rigs par bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur pa ni ji ltar rigs par bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The consecration is the consecration of the vase and the secret consecration, as is appropriate.

original: kun rdzob ba byang chub kyi sems ye shes gsum po de rnams kyi dbang bskur ba ni yid kyi dri ma 'khrud par byed pa ste /
analyzed: kun rdzob ba byang chub kyi sems ye shes gsum po de rnams kyi dbang bskur ba ni yid kyi dri ma 'khrud par byed pa ste /
translated: The consecration of the three intuitions of the superficial Thought of Enlightenment cleanses the mental stains.

original: de mdzad nas bstan du gsol zhes so //
analyzed: de mdzad nas bstan du gsol zhes so //
translated: Having done that, he requests the teaching.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: rdo rje dam tshig ni 'od gsal ba'o zhes pa ni mthar thug rab tu zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dam tshig ni 'od gsal ba'o zhes pa ni mthar thug rab tu zhugs pa'o //
translated: The pledge of the vajra is the clearlight transparency, which is the ultimate entry.

original: ldang bar byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: ldang bar byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: The arising is stated:

original: de las byung ba'i tshig ces pa ni /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i tshig ces pa ni /
translated: The words that arise from that🔽are the two aspects in the continuum of the disciples.

original: gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la rnam pa gnyis zhes pa'i sku rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la rnam pa gnyis zhes pa'i sku rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The two aspects are the two bodies.

original: yongs su dag pa dang yongs su ma dag pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa dang yongs su ma dag pa'i sku'o //
translated: The body is pure and impure.

original: gsal bar mdzad pa ni rang gis yang dag par rig par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gsal bar mdzad pa ni rang gis yang dag par rig par byed pa'o //
translated: The manifestation is the self-realization.

original: mthar thug pa'o zhes pa ni mthar thug pa gzhan no //
analyzed: mthar thug pa'o zhes pa ni mthar thug pa gzhan no //
translated: The ultimate is the other ultimate.

original: yang na bshad pa ni mthar thug pa ji ltar yin /
analyzed: yang na bshad pa ni mthar thug pa ji ltar yin /
translated: Or else, the explanation is the ultimate.

original: ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
translated: As the Lord has said:

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la @54b sogs pa rnams kyi mthar thug pa ni stong pa gsum mo //
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la @54b sogs pa rnams kyi mthar thug pa ni stong pa gsum mo //
translated: The ultimate of the aggregates, elements, sense-fields, etc. is the three voids.

original: stong pa gsum gyi mthar thug pa ni 'od gsal lo zhes so //
analyzed: stong pa gsum gyi mthar thug pa ni 'od gsal lo zhes so //
translated: The ultimate of the three voids is clearlight transparency.

original: yang na rgyud 'di nyid du gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang na rgyud 'di nyid du gsungs pa /
translated: Or else, it is stated in this very Tantra:

original: mtha' ni mtha' drug 'od gsal ba ste /
analyzed: mtha' ni mtha' drug 'od gsal ba ste /
translated: The ultimate is the six ultimates, clearlight transparency,🔽the perfect reality.

original: yang dag pa'i tshul lo zhes pa dang 'gal ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i tshul lo zhes pa dang 'gal ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Isn’t this contradictory to the statement that the ultimate is the perfect reality?

original: 'od gsal ba de'i bdag nyid du 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag pa'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba de'i bdag nyid du 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag pa'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: It is not contradictory, because the perfect reality is the nature of clearlight transparency, and it is the nature of the ultimate.

original: gal te de ltar rnam par ma dag pa'i lha nyid ji ltar mthar thug pa'i bshad pas bshad par bya ba ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar rnam par ma dag pa'i lha nyid ji ltar mthar thug pa'i bshad pas bshad par bya ba ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: If the deity is not pure in this way, how can it be explained as the ultimate?

original: 'di 'od gsal ba las yang dag par byung ba sa bon dang / mtshan ma la sogs pa'i rim pas bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro ;
analyzed: 'di 'od gsal ba las yang dag par byung ba sa bon dang / mtshan ma la sogs pa'i rim pas bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro ;
translated: Because it arises from clear light, and is generated by the stages of seed, sign, and so on.

original: / rin po che dang tsandan la sogs pa'i dbye bas gdul bya gnyis dang bya ba las bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: / rin po che dang tsandan la sogs pa'i dbye bas gdul bya gnyis dang bya ba las bshad par bya'o //
translated: It should be explained as the activity of the two disciples, by the divisions of jewel, sandalwood, and so on.

original: slar yang rang gi ngo bo nyid yongs su ma dag pa'i lha zhes bya bar yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: slar yang rang gi ngo bo nyid yongs su ma dag pa'i lha zhes bya bar yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, the deity is not existent as something impure in its own nature.

original: 'od gsal ba las yang dag par byung ba ye shes gsum po ro gcig pa'i rang bzhin sa bon dang mtshan ma la sogs pa rnams kyis bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba las yang dag par byung ba ye shes gsum po ro gcig pa'i rang bzhin sa bon dang mtshan ma la sogs pa rnams kyis bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because it arises from clear light, and is generated by the stages of seed, sign, and so on, which have the nature of the three wisdoms of one taste.

original: lha nyid kyi mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su myong ba /
analyzed: lha nyid kyi mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su myong ba /
translated: The deity is the experience of the bliss of supreme joy.

original: thig le'i gzugs kyis skye gnas kyi dbus su nges par byed do zhes pa'i gsung las rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo na 'gro ba yang brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can gyi 'od gsal ba las byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽rnam gzhag rim par gsungs pa'i rim pas /
analyzed: thig le'i gzugs kyis skye gnas kyi dbus su nges par byed do zhes pa'i gsung las rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo na 'gro ba yang brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can gyi 'od gsal ba las byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro // rnam gzhag rim par gsungs pa'i rim pas /
translated: By the statement “determining the form of the bindu in the middle of the birthplace,” the circle of deities such as Vairocana and so on are also born from the clear light that has the nature of the animate and inanimate.

original: rigs brgya'i rim pa'i lha'i gzugs nyid kyang yongs su dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: rigs brgya'i rim pa'i lha'i gzugs nyid kyang yongs su dag pa nyid do //
translated: The form of the deities of the one hundred families, which is taught in the sequence of the presentation, is also pure.

original: gzhan du yang /🔽slang yang dngos po thams cad kyi //
analyzed: gzhan du yang / slang yang dngos po thams cad kyi //
translated: Moreover:

original: rnam dag de bzhin nyid du brjod //🔽phyi nas re re'i dbye ba yis //
analyzed: rnam dag de bzhin nyid du brjod // phyi nas re re'i dbye ba yis //
translated: The perfect suchness of all things

original: lha rnams kyis ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: lha rnams kyis ni brjod par bya //
translated: is taught by the deities🔽through the divisions of each one.

original: zhes so // de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni rnam shes kyi phung po'i bdag nyid can yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zhes so // de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni rnam shes kyi phung po'i bdag nyid can yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Thus, the circle of wisdom is the nature of the aggregate of consciousness.

original: mi bskyod pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor te mi bskyod pa gtso por yod pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor te mi bskyod pa gtso por yod pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The maṇḍala of the gnosis of Akṣobhya is that in which Akṣobhya is the principal figure.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /🔽ye shes zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa / ye shes zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said:🔽“The gnosis lamp” and so forth.

original: sgron ma zhes pa la sgron ma lta bu ni sgron ma'o //
analyzed: sgron ma zhes pa la sgron ma lta bu ni sgron ma'o //
translated: The lamp is like a lamp.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: The Blessed One’s gnosis is the remainder.

original: bag chags dang bcas pa'i mi shes pa'i mun pa rnam par 'joms par byed pa la rang gi dang gis rab tu 'jug par byed pa nyid las rang gi ngo bor ston par byed do //🔽bsgoms @55a * //
analyzed: bag chags dang bcas pa'i mi shes pa'i mun pa rnam par 'joms par byed pa la rang gi dang gis rab tu 'jug par byed pa nyid las rang gi ngo bor ston par byed do // bsgoms @55a * //
translated: It is shown to be its own nature because it is engaged by itself in the destruction of the darkness of ignorance together with its imprints.

original: pas shes pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa po slob dpon gyi ye shes kyang rdo rje lta bu'i lam gyi bdag nyid can gyis mi shes pa'i kun du sbyor ba las mi shes pa'i mun pa rnams de'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: pas shes pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa po slob dpon gyi ye shes kyang rdo rje lta bu'i lam gyi bdag nyid can gyis mi shes pa'i kun du sbyor ba las mi shes pa'i mun pa rnams de'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The gnosis of the master who is the apprehender is also like a vajra because it is the path that destroys the darkness of ignorance that is the fetter of ignorance by its very nature.

original: de bzhin du de lta bur gyur pa'i don gzhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du de lta bur gyur pa'i don gzhan gsungs pa /
translated: In the same way, he states another meaning that is like that:

original: ye shes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The wisdom and so forth.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: rgyud la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the continuum and so forth.

original: spyi'i don to zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i bskyed pa 'dir rnam par 'chad par mngon par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i don to zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i bskyed pa 'dir rnam par 'chad par mngon par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The general meaning is because the generation of Akṣobhya is clearly intended here.

original: ye shes bya ba la sogs pas gang zhig gsungs pa /
analyzed: ye shes bya ba la sogs pas gang zhig gsungs pa /
translated: By wisdom and so forth, it is said:

original: 'dus pa phyi ma ru /
analyzed: 'dus pa phyi ma ru /
translated: In the later assembly,

original: zhe sdang sdang ba'i bdag nyid sbyor //
analyzed: zhe sdang sdang ba'i bdag nyid sbyor //
translated: one should apply the nature of hatred.

original: zhe sdang dga' dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: zhe sdang dga' dang yang dag ldan //
translated: Hatred is truly endowed with joy.

original: zhe sdang rgyun gyi dbang bskur nas //
analyzed: zhe sdang rgyun gyi dbang bskur nas //
translated: Having conferred the empowerment of the stream of hatred,

original: zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur //
translated: one becomes the very essence of Hatred Vajra.

original: zhes so // yi ge'i don dang / spyi'i don gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // yi ge'i don dang / spyi'i don gsungs pa /
translated: The meaning of the syllables and the general meaning are stated.

original: zhe sdang rdo rje sku la sogs par gzugs pa la sogs pa'i rim pas /
analyzed: zhe sdang rdo rje sku la sogs par gzugs pa la sogs pa'i rim pas /
translated: The form and so forth of Hatred Vajra and so forth,

original: rab tu zhugs pa'i slob ma dbang bskur ba'i don du snang ba 'char bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu zhugs pa'i slob ma dbang bskur ba'i don du snang ba 'char bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: the disciple who has entered by the stage of creation should appear for the purpose of empowerment.

original: de ston par byed pa phyogs bcur snang bar mdzad pas te shes kyi gzugs nyid do //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa phyogs bcur snang bar mdzad pas te shes kyi gzugs nyid do //
translated: It is the form of consciousness itself that illuminates the ten directions by revealing that.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: sgron ma dang 'dra bas na zhes pa ni rab tu snang ba tsam gyi chos des so //🔽rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu snang bar byed pa po dang / rab tu snang ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis ye shes gsum po nyid kyi gnas skabs su rab tu gsal bar byed pas rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu snang bar byed pa po dang /
analyzed: sgron ma dang 'dra bas na zhes pa ni rab tu snang ba tsam gyi chos des so // rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu snang bar byed pa po dang / rab tu snang ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis ye shes gsum po nyid kyi gnas skabs su rab tu gsal bar byed pas rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu snang bar byed pa po dang /
translated: Because it is like a lamp, by that Dharma which is mere illumination,🔽the three wisdoms are clearly revealed in the state of the object of illumination, the illuminator, and the nature of illumination.

original: rab tu snang ba'i ngo bo rnams kyis dbye bar 'dod do //
analyzed: rab tu snang ba'i ngo bo rnams kyis dbye bar 'dod do //
translated: Therefore, it is asserted that they are distinguished by the object of illumination, the illuminator, and the nature of illumination.

original: de'i bdag nyid can gyi sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can gyi sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: One-pointedness of mind that has that nature is samādhi.

original: da ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gang yin pa 'di so so rang gis rig par bya ba nyid du ston par byed pa dzny'a ni rtogs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gang yin pa 'di so so rang gis rig par bya ba nyid du ston par byed pa dzny'a ni rtogs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, in order to show that this which is the nature of suchness is to be realized by oneself, it is said: “jñāna” and so on.

original: gzhan du na byang chub kyi sems 'di yongs su ma dag pa'i phyir dbang bskur ba mi 'os so //
analyzed: gzhan du na byang chub kyi sems 'di yongs su ma dag pa'i phyir dbang bskur ba mi 'os so //
translated: Otherwise, because this enlightenment mind is not completely pure, it is not suitable for empowerment.

original: 'dis ni rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i cha shas rnam par gzhag pa las phyir gyur pa'am /
analyzed: 'dis ni rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i cha shas rnam par gzhag pa las phyir gyur pa'am /
translated: By this, it is said that the disciple is not fit for empowerment because of being outside the arrangement of the parts of the circle of the perfect mandala,

original: nang du yongs su ma dag pa'i phyir //🔽slob mi dbang bskur bar yang brjod par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: nang du yongs su ma dag pa'i phyir // slob mi dbang bskur bar yang brjod par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: or because of being impure inside.

original: ye shes gsum gyi snang ba nyis snang ba ste zil gyis mnan pa ni /
analyzed: ye shes gsum gyi snang ba nyis snang ba ste zil gyis mnan pa ni /
translated: The illumination of the three intuitions is the illumination that overpowers

original: phyogs bcur snang bar byas @55b pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcur snang bar byas @55b pa'o //
translated: the ten directions.

original: gzhan du nyi ma la sogs pa'i snang ba rnams kyi 'ong so sor nges pa'i lus kun du snang bar byed nus par mthong ba nyid yin na /
analyzed: gzhan du nyi ma la sogs pa'i snang ba rnams kyi 'ong so sor nges pa'i lus kun du snang bar byed nus par mthong ba nyid yin na /
translated: Otherwise, if the illumination of the sun and so forth were seen to be able to illuminate the entire body with a definite individual illumination,

original: slar yang don dam pa'i bden pa la snang ba ma lus pa zil gyis gnod pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun du snang bar byed par ci ltar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: slar yang don dam pa'i bden pa la snang ba ma lus pa zil gyis gnod pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun du snang bar byed par ci ltar mi 'gyur /
translated: then again, why would it not be the case that the illumination of the ultimate truth, which overpowers all illumination, would illuminate the entire world?

original: sgron ma zhes pa ni sngar bzhin du sgron ma dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: sgron ma zhes pa ni sngar bzhin du sgron ma dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: The lamp is like the lamp as before.

original: rdo rje zhes pa ni rtag pa nyid de 'jig rten gang gis kyang gnod par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa ni rtag pa nyid de 'jig rten gang gis kyang gnod par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The vajra is the eternal, because it cannot be destroyed by anyone in the world.

original: mthar thug pa'o zhes pa ni rab tu dbye ba gcig go //
analyzed: mthar thug pa'o zhes pa ni rab tu dbye ba gcig go //
translated: The ultimate is the one division.

original: gnyis pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gnyis pa gsungs pa /
translated: The second is stated:

original: 'od gsal ba dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: radiance, etc.

original: bzhengs nas zhes pa ni ye shes kyi rim pas sam /
analyzed: bzhengs nas zhes pa ni ye shes kyi rim pas sam /
translated: Having arisen means by the stage of intuition,

original: sa bon dang mtshan ma la sogs pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: sa bon dang mtshan ma la sogs pa'i rim pas so //
translated: or by the stage of seed, sign, etc.

original: nyon mongs pa lnga ni /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa lnga ni /
translated: The five afflictions

original: zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / 'dod chags dang / phrag dog gi mtshan nyid rnams so //
analyzed: zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / 'dod chags dang / phrag dog gi mtshan nyid rnams so //
translated: are the characteristics of hatred, delusion, pride, desire, and envy.

original: de rnams kyis khyab pa ni bkab pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis khyab pa ni bkab pa'o //
translated: They are covered by the obscuration of those.

original: sems can gyi khams ni sems can gyi 'jig rten no //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ni sems can gyi 'jig rten no //
translated: The realm of sentient beings is the world of sentient beings.

original: nyon mongs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa gsungs pa /
translated: The afflictions are stated:

original: de rnams gyi rang bzhin yongs su shes pa nyid ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid kyi rnam pa'i rgyun phyin ci ma log par yongs su shes pa nyid kyi de nyid byang chub ste mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams gyi rang bzhin yongs su shes pa nyid ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid kyi rnam pa'i rgyun phyin ci ma log par yongs su shes pa nyid kyi de nyid byang chub ste mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
translated: The full knowledge of the nature of those is the full knowledge of the unmistaken continuum of the aspects of dependent origination itself. That is enlightenment, the state of Vajradhara, perfect buddhahood.

original: gsungs pa yang /🔽rten cing 'brel 'byung gang yin pa ;
analyzed: gsungs pa yang / rten cing 'brel 'byung gang yin pa ;
translated: It is also said:🔽You assert that whatever is dependently originated

original: / de nyid khyod ni stong par bzhed //
analyzed: / de nyid khyod ni stong par bzhed //
translated: is empty.

original: de bzhin sna tshogs dam pa'i chos //
analyzed: de bzhin sna tshogs dam pa'i chos //
translated: Likewise, the various excellent teachings

original: de dang mnyam pa de bzhin gshegs //🔽de nyid dam pa'i don du yang //
analyzed: de dang mnyam pa de bzhin gshegs // de nyid dam pa'i don du yang //
translated: are the same as the Tathagata.🔽That itself is also asserted as the substance of suchness

original: de bzhin nyid kyi rdzas su 'dod //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi rdzas su 'dod //
translated: in the ultimate sense.

original: de ni yang dag mi bslu ba //
analyzed: de ni yang dag mi bslu ba //
translated: That is the truth, the nondeceptive,

original: de rtogs pa las sangs rgyas brjod //
analyzed: de rtogs pa las sangs rgyas brjod //
translated: and from realizing that, one is called a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas rnams dang sems can khams //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams dang sems can khams //
translated: The realms of buddhas and sentient beings

original: de yis tha dad min nyid do //
analyzed: de yis tha dad min nyid do //
translated: are not different from that.

original: zhes so // de'i rang bzhin ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes so // de'i rang bzhin ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Its nature is the nature of enlightenment.

original: gdul bya rnams ni nyon mongs pa lngas khyab pa'o //
analyzed: gdul bya rnams ni nyon mongs pa lngas khyab pa'o //
translated: The disciples are pervaded by the five afflictions.

original: zhes sdang zhes pa nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: zhes sdang zhes pa nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: “ Hatred” is a mere illustration.

original: rgyud 'di la sems gtso bo yin pa'i phyir thog mar mi bskyod pa ston par byed do //
analyzed: rgyud 'di la sems gtso bo yin pa'i phyir thog mar mi bskyod pa ston par byed do //
translated: Since the mind is primary in this tantra, it is taught first as Akṣobhya.

original: sbyang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa nying kyis zhe sdang gi rigs rnams so //
analyzed: sbyang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa nying kyis zhe sdang gi rigs rnams so //
translated: “ For the sake of purification” means that the families of hatred are the forms, etc., of Akṣobhya.

original: de nyid kyi gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi gsungs pa /
translated: He himself says that:

original: 'di zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “This” and so forth.

original: thugs ni de skul bar byed pa po nyid kyis rang gi sku las nges par byung bas so //
analyzed: thugs ni de skul bar byed pa po nyid kyis rang gi sku las nges par byung bas so //
translated: The mind is the one who impels that, and so it definitely arises from his body.

original: gsung rdo rje las badzra dhri ka ces bya ba'i sgo nas phyung bas so //🔽blo la bzhag nas zhes pa ni blos dmigs @56a * //
analyzed: gsung rdo rje las badzra dhri ka ces bya ba'i sgo nas phyung bas so // blo la bzhag nas zhes pa ni blos dmigs @56a * //
translated: It is produced from the vajra speech by means of “vajra-dhṛk.”

original: par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: par gyur pa'o //
translated: “ Placed in the mind” means that it is visualized by the mind.🔽“ Great compassion” is the method that will be explained.

original: thugs rje chen po ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i thabs gang yin pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po de de bzhin no //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i thabs gang yin pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po de de bzhin no //
translated: That Vajradhara is just so.

original: de'i khro bo ni 'di'i don gyi sa zhe sdang ste /
analyzed: de'i khro bo ni 'di'i don gyi sa zhe sdang ste /
translated: His wrath is the hatred of this meaning.

original: zhe sdang can rnams zhe sdang la phyir phyogs ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhe sdang can rnams zhe sdang la phyir phyogs ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because those who are hateful are by nature averse to hatred.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po de'i rigs ni mi bskyod pa ste ;
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po de'i rigs ni mi bskyod pa ste ;
translated: The family of that Great Vajradhara is Akṣobhya,🔽who is Vajradhara in the bhaga of the goddess, the nature of the body.

original: lha mo'i bha gar lus kyi bdag nyid can rdo rje 'dzin par byed do zhes pas badzra dhri ka ces byas nas so //
analyzed: lha mo'i bha gar lus kyi bdag nyid can rdo rje 'dzin par byed do zhes pas badzra dhri ka ces byas nas so //
translated: Thus, it is called vajradhārika.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “having entered into union,” and so forth.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is just the literal meaning.

original: lnga zhes pa la sogs pa la rnam pa lnga zhes pa ni /
analyzed: lnga zhes pa la sogs pa la rnam pa lnga zhes pa ni /
translated: In “five,” and so forth, the five aspects are

original: me long la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas nyid kyi tshul 'di'o //
analyzed: me long la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas nyid kyi tshul 'di'o //
translated: the nature of the five gnoses, mirror-like and so forth, the nature of the five Tathagatas, Vairochana and so forth, the nature of Great Vajradhara and so forth. This is the method of Buddhahood.

original: de ston par byed pa'i rdo rje ni mtshan ma'i lus la 'chad par byed do zhes pa badzra dhrika go //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i rdo rje ni mtshan ma'i lus la 'chad par byed do zhes pa badzra dhrika go //
translated: The vajra that teaches that is explained in the body of the sign, thus it is vajradhārika.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de'i phyir mi bskyod pa yang ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de'i phyir mi bskyod pa yang ngo //
translated: Because he is the very essence of that Great Vajradhara, Akshobhya is also [Vajrasattva].

original: da ltar dzi na dzi ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyang rnam gzhag rim pa dang / rnam bshad las bshad pa'i phyir rang bzhin gnyis nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: da ltar dzi na dzi ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyang rnam gzhag rim pa dang / rnam bshad las bshad pa'i phyir rang bzhin gnyis nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: And the mantras beginning with jinajñana should be understood as having a double nature, because they are explained in the Vajra-dhatu-mandala-vidhi-vistara and in the commentary.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning explanation.

original: bden pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'jin  par byed do zhes bya ba ni mngon du bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: bden pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'jin  par byed do zhes bya ba ni mngon du bya ba nyid do //
translated: The phrase the truth, etc., is the agent of the grasping, and the object of the grasping is the very manifestation of the truth.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po de'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyi phyir mi bskyod pa yang ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po de'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyi phyir mi bskyod pa yang ngo //
translated: Because he is the very essence of that Great Vajradhara, Akshobhya is also [Vajrasattva].

original: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa yang bshad pa 'di'o nges pa'i don te //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa yang bshad pa 'di'o nges pa'i don te //
translated: In the same way, Vairochana, etc., are also explained. This is the definitive meaning explanation.

original: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas /
translated: The phrase that very, etc.,

original: drug pas mngon par brjod de drug pa'i rnam grangs yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: drug pas mngon par brjod de drug pa'i rnam grangs yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: is expressed by the sixth [syllable], because it is a synonym of the sixth [syllable].

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes pa 'di'i zhes spyod bsdus su gsungs pa /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes pa 'di'i zhes spyod bsdus su gsungs pa /
translated: The term great Vajradhara is used in the Compendium of Practice.

original: sprul pa'i bdag nyid kyang rdo rje 'chang chen po ste bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: sprul pa'i bdag nyid kyang rdo rje 'chang chen po ste bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The emanation nature is also great Vajradhara because it is the cause of the enjoyment body, which is the nature of the two truths.

original: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: It is the nature of the two truths.

original: mi bskyod ba zhes pa ni lnga pa'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod ba zhes pa ni lnga pa'o //
translated: Akṣobhya is the fifth.

original: zhal nag po la sogs pa'i bdag nying can zhes pa ni /
