analyzed: zhal nag po la sogs pa'i bdag nying can zhes pa ni /
translated: The line having a nature of a black face and so on refers to🔽the sixth.

original: drug pa ni zhal dkar po la sogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: drug pa ni zhal dkar po la sogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the sixth because it has a white face and so on.

original: de rnams zhes pa ni zhal nag po la sogs pa bdag nyid can mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams zhes pa ni zhal nag po la sogs pa bdag nyid can mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya rnams so //
translated: Those refers to the mudras of Akṣobhya, which have a nature of a black face and so on.

original: gcig tu gyur nas zhes pa ni drug pa'i phyag rgya chen po rnams so //
analyzed: gcig tu gyur nas zhes pa ni drug pa'i phyag rgya chen po rnams so //
translated: Becoming one refers to the great mudras of the sixth.

original: nag po zhes bya ba la @56b sogs pa la snga ma bzhin no zhes pa thog ma dang / gzhan du zhal nag po la sogs pa mngon par brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nag po zhes bya ba la @56b sogs pa la snga ma bzhin no zhes pa thog ma dang / gzhan du zhal nag po la sogs pa mngon par brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Black and so on is as before, referring to the first, because it is the expression of a black face and so on.

original: drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po la bzhugs so zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po la bzhugs so zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The phrase “he abides as Great Vajradhara” refers to Akṣhobhya.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa drug pa las dbyung ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' dbyung ba'o /🔽rdo rje sems dpa' 'am /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa drug pa las dbyung ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' dbyung ba'o / rdo rje sems dpa' 'am /
translated: The “emergence of Vajrasattva and the sixth Tathāgata” is the emergence of Vajrasattva.🔽Vajrasattva or Akṣhobhya is the emergence.

original: mi bskyod pa dbyung ba la rdo rje sems dpa' dbyung ba'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa dbyung ba la rdo rje sems dpa' dbyung ba'o //
translated: The “emergence of Vajrasattva” is the emergence of Vajrasattva or Akṣhobhya.

original: dang po'o zhes pa ni gnyis po la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po'o zhes pa ni gnyis po la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The phrase “the first” refers to the second and so on, which will be explained.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is the literal reading.

original: dang po sbyor bzhes pa ni dang po'i sgra ni thog ma'i rnam grangs te /
analyzed: dang po sbyor bzhes pa ni dang po'i sgra ni thog ma'i rnam grangs te /
translated: The phrase “first yoga” is as follows. The word “first” is a synonym for “initial.”

original: dang po sangs rgyas drug pa nyid kyis lhan cig tu sbyor ba ni dang po'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: dang po sangs rgyas drug pa nyid kyis lhan cig tu sbyor ba ni dang po'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: The “first yoga” is the initial union with the sixth Buddha.

original: mdo dang bsre bar byed par yang dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes rnal 'byor bzhi de ma thag gsungs so //
analyzed: mdo dang bsre bar byed par yang dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes rnal 'byor bzhi de ma thag gsungs so //
translated: The Sūtra that Combines the Meanings says, “The samādhi called ‘first yoga’ is just after the four yogas are taught.”

original: dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor ston par byed pas zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor ston par byed pas zhes pa ni /
translated: The first, etc. , is the one who shows the mandala that has been brought forth.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gnas //
analyzed: zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gnas //
translated: Dwelling in the concentration of Hatred Vajra,

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad rab dbyung bya /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad rab dbyung bya /
translated: one should bring forth all mandalas.

original: zhes so // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
analyzed: zhes so // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
translated: For that very reason it is said:

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa drug pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa drug pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One, etc.

original: thugs las zhes pa lha mo'i bha ga las so //
analyzed: thugs las zhes pa lha mo'i bha ga las so //
translated: From the heart, i.e. from the bhaga of the goddess.

original: don ni bshad zin to zhes pa ni thog mar ro //
analyzed: don ni bshad zin to zhes pa ni thog mar ro //
translated: The meaning has been explained, i.e. at the beginning.

original: sems can rmongs pa ni gzugs la chags pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rmongs pa ni gzugs la chags pa'o //
translated: Deluded beings are attached to form.

original: zhi ba'i tshul ni yid pa de ba skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba'i tshul ni yid pa de ba skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: The method of pacification is the production of mental bliss.

original: rdzi na rdzi ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: rdzi na rdzi ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of “the end of the end, etc. ” has been explained.

original: rnam pa gcig gnyis zhes pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: rnam pa gcig gnyis zhes pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
translated: One aspect, two, etc. , is suffering.

original: yongs su shes so //
analyzed: yongs su shes so //
translated: One fully understands.

original: slar yang yongs su shes par byar med do //
analyzed: slar yang yongs su shes par byar med do //
translated: One does not fully understand again.

original: kun 'byung ngo //
analyzed: kun 'byung ngo //
translated: Origination.

original: spangs so // spang par bya'o //
analyzed: spangs so // spang par bya'o //
translated: One abandons. One should abandon.

original: slar yang spang bar byar med do //
analyzed: slar yang spang bar byar med do //
translated: One does not abandon again.

original: 'gog pa'o // mngon du bya'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa'o // mngon du bya'o //
translated: is to be realized.

original: mngon du byas so //
analyzed: mngon du byas so //
translated: has been realized.

original: slar yang mngon du byar med do //
analyzed: slar yang mngon du byar med do //
translated: is not to be realized again.

original: lam mo // bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: lam mo // bsgom par bya'o //
translated: the path. is to be cultivated.

original: bsgoms so // slar yang sgom par byar med do zhes pa rnam par gcig gnyis so //
analyzed: bsgoms so // slar yang sgom par byar med do zhes pa rnam par gcig gnyis so //
translated: has been cultivated. is not to be cultivated again.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can gyi sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dag gis dbye bar bya bar dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can gyi sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dag gis dbye bar bya bar dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The vajra-like concentration is so called because the mind which has the nature of clear light is difficult to be differentiated by the defilements and the purities.

original: 'dir phung po dang nyon mongs pa dang 'chi ba dang / lha'i bu zhes bya ba rnams zil gyis gnon par bshad do //
analyzed: 'dir phung po dang nyon mongs pa dang 'chi ba dang / lha'i bu zhes bya ba rnams zil gyis gnon par bshad do //
translated: Here, the aggregates, the defilements, death, and the son of god are explained as being overcome.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: has a definitive meaning.

original: de nyid ces pa rig pa'i skyes bu nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces pa rig pa'i skyes bu nyid do //
translated: That itself is the person of knowledge.

original: rnam par @57a * //🔽snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya ni /
analyzed: rnam par @57a * // snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya ni /
translated: is the form of Vairochana.

original: dkar po nag po dmar po'i zhal la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: dkar po nag po dmar po'i zhal la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: The seal of Vairochana is the nature of the faces white, black, and red, and so forth.

original: de'i lhan cig tu gyur pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de'i lhan cig tu gyur pa zhes pa ni /
translated: The one who is born together with that is the person of knowledge.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyi phung po'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyi phung po'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: He is Vairocana because he is the nature of the form aggregate of the Lord.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The Lord, etc.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is literal.

original: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems ni 'dzag pa'i bdag nyid can rnam par shes pa'i stobs can no //
analyzed: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems ni 'dzag pa'i bdag nyid can rnam par shes pa'i stobs can no //
translated: The conventional awakening mind is the power of consciousness, which has the nature of emission.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: de nyid ces pa la sogs pa ste //
analyzed: de nyid ces pa la sogs pa ste //
translated: That itself, etc.

original: phyag rgya chen po mnyam pa nyid ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid can rin chen 'byung ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po mnyam pa nyid ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid can rin chen 'byung ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The equality of the great seal is the nature of the gnosis of equality, which is the nature of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: de'i phun sum tshogs pa ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phun sum tshogs pa ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: Its perfection is its generation.

original: gang yin zhes pa la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: gang yin zhes pa la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: What is it? It is explained.

original: drang ba'i don la brten nas nges pa'i don gsungs so //
analyzed: drang ba'i don la brten nas nges pa'i don gsungs so //
translated: The definitive meaning is stated in dependence on the interpretable meaning.

original: thams cad ces pa la sogs pa la don dam pa byang chub kyi sems kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: thams cad ces pa la sogs pa la don dam pa byang chub kyi sems kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: All and so forth. The reality of the ultimate mind of enlightenment is the nature of reality.

original: de las byung ba zhes pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan yang bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de las byung ba zhes pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan yang bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The arisen from that is also the nature of the two realities of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: vajra-śrī and so forth.

original: des pa'i don to //
analyzed: des pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of śrī is auspicious.

original: ratna zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gcig tu gyur pa ni drug pa'i tshor ba'i phung po'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir rin chen gyi'o //
analyzed: ratna zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gcig tu gyur pa ni drug pa'i tshor ba'i phung po'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir rin chen gyi'o //
translated: The one-gone-to-bliss is the nature of the sixth aggregate of feeling, because of being the nature of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: gos pa med pa zhes pa ni mi mnyam pa med pas so //
analyzed: gos pa med pa zhes pa ni mi mnyam pa med pas so //
translated: The unstained is because of being without inequality.

original: gal te gang gi phyir mi mnyam pa'i shes pas gos par gyur na mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid dor par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te gang gi phyir mi mnyam pa'i shes pas gos par gyur na mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid dor par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were stained by unequal cognition, it would be abandoned as the pristine wisdom of equality.

original: nam mkha'i gnas zhes pa ni nam mkha' gnas lta bu yin pas nam mkha' gnas zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i gnas zhes pa ni nam mkha' gnas lta bu yin pas nam mkha' gnas zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: The space-abode is called space-abode because it is like the abode of space.

original: nor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can rnams ni yid can rnams so //
analyzed: nor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can rnams ni yid can rnams so //
translated: In wealth and so forth, sentient beings are those who have minds.

original: dul ba ni nga rgyal 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: dul ba ni nga rgyal 'jig pa'o //
translated: Discipline is the destruction of pride.

original: nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas ni rin chen dbang po ste de la'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas ni rin chen dbang po ste de la'o //
translated: The abode of the purification of pride is the jewel crest, that is, on that.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is the literal meaning.

original: 'dod chags kyis ni yul la chags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyis ni yul la chags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
translated: By passion is meant the characteristic of attachment to objects.

original: 'dod chags spang pa'i don ni 'khor ba skyed par byed pa'i yul la chags pa bzlog pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags spang pa'i don ni 'khor ba skyed par byed pa'i yul la chags pa bzlog pa'i don du'o //
translated: The meaning of the abandonment of passion is for the purpose of turning away from attachment to objects that give rise to cyclic existence.

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la mchog tu dga' ba ni mchog tu ba de ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir snang ba gsum mo //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la mchog tu dga' ba ni mchog tu ba de ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir snang ba gsum mo //
translated: In supreme joy and so forth, the three illuminations are the cause of supreme bliss because of being the cause of supreme joy.

original: byang chub sems zhes pa ni byang chub ye shes kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa nyid can no //
analyzed: byang chub sems zhes pa ni byang chub ye shes kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa nyid can no //
translated: The bodhicitta is the bodhicitta that is the cause of the gnosis of enlightenment because of being the cause of the gnosis of enlightenment.

original: de 'byung ba ni byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba aa yig go //
analyzed: de 'byung ba ni byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba aa yig go //
translated: Its arising is the arising of bodhicitta, the syllable a.🔽From that means from that.

original: de las byung @57b ba ni 'de dpag tu med pa ste /
analyzed: de las byung @57b ba ni 'de dpag tu med pa ste /
translated: It is immeasurable.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: It is the interpretable meaning.

original: 'dod chags chen po ni 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral pa dang / 'dod chags bar ma la ltos nas /
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po ni 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral pa dang / 'dod chags bar ma la ltos nas /
translated: Great passion is passion in relation to passion, passionlessness, and middling passion,

original: 'od gsal ba sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags la 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags la 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the passion of the great being who is the clear light.

original: drang ba dang nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba dang nges pa'i don to //
translated: It is the interpretable and the definitive meaning.

original: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes la kun du chags pa ni rtag tu de rjes su 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes la kun du chags pa ni rtag tu de rjes su 'brel ba'o //
translated: Passion for the individually discriminating intuition is the constant association with it.

original: rdo rje 'dod chags zhes pa ni drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyis so sor kun du rtog pa ni //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dod chags zhes pa ni drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyis so sor kun du rtog pa ni //
translated: The vajra passion is the individually discriminating intuition in its interpretable and definitive meanings.

original: dbye bar bya bar dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dbye bar bya bar dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is difficult to divide it.

original: de bzhin du me long la sogs pa'i ye shes bzhi po rnams la ji ltar 'byung ba bshad pa 'di'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du me long la sogs pa'i ye shes bzhi po rnams la ji ltar 'byung ba bshad pa 'di'o //
translated: Similarly, the four intuitions, mirror intuition, etc., are explained as they occur.

original: a'a zhes bya 'di'i bshad pa ni kun nas so //
analyzed: a'a zhes bya 'di'i bshad pa ni kun nas so //
translated: The explanation of this “a” is “all around.”

original: ro zhes bya ba 'di'ang 'khor ba ste /
analyzed: ro zhes bya ba 'di'ang 'khor ba ste /
translated: This “taste” is also the life-cycle,

original: phung po dang khams la sogs pa lha nyid du nga rgyal byed pa'o //
analyzed: phung po dang khams la sogs pa lha nyid du nga rgyal byed pa'o //
translated: and the pride in the aggregates, elements, etc., as deities.

original: li ka ces ba ni 'di'i bshad pa ni de las 'gro bar byed do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: li ka ces ba ni 'di'i bshad pa ni de las 'gro bar byed do zhes pa'o //
translated: The explanation of lika is from that, one goes.

original: ye shes gsum mo zhes pa lhag ma ste de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
analyzed: ye shes gsum mo zhes pa lhag ma ste de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
translated: The three knowledges is the remainder. For that very reason, it is said:

original: ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: taste, and so on.

original: drang ba dang nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba dang nges pa'i don to //
translated: The provisional and definitive meanings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: All tathāgatas are Vairocana and so on.

original: don yod pa ni gdon mi za bar grub pa gang yin pa de la di bzhin no //
analyzed: don yod pa ni gdon mi za bar grub pa gang yin pa de la di bzhin no //
translated: The inexhaustible is that which is definitely accomplished. That is so.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: The provisional meaning.

original: mtshan med pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa ni rgyu med pa yin te /
analyzed: mtshan med pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa ni rgyu med pa yin te /
translated: The signless is signlessness, which is causeless.

original: gang de bzhin nyid ni kha cig gis rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang de bzhin nyid ni kha cig gis rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: It is said that some do not ascertain suchness as the cause or non-cause.

original: nges ba'i don to //
analyzed: nges ba'i don to //
translated: The definitive meaning.

original: phrag dog ni bud med dang skyes pa dag gis phan tshun mi bzod pa byed pa'o //
analyzed: phrag dog ni bud med dang skyes pa dag gis phan tshun mi bzod pa byed pa'o //
translated: Jealousy is when women and men act intolerantly towards each other.

original: de nyid nyon mongs pa ste nyon mongs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid nyon mongs pa ste nyon mongs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: That is the affliction, because it is the cause of the afflictions.

original: de sbyor bar byed pas don yod pa'i gzugs so//
analyzed: de sbyor bar byed pas don yod pa'i gzugs so//
translated: It is Amoghasiddhi, because it causes the accomplishment of the aim.

original: 'gugs pa zhes pa ni mi bzod cing chags pa'o //
analyzed: 'gugs pa zhes pa ni mi bzod cing chags pa'o //
translated: Attraction is the impatience and attachment.

original: dam tshig ni phrag dog mi bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: dam tshig ni phrag dog mi bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'i dam tshig go //
translated: The pledge is not to be jealous, which is the pledge of the word of the Tathagata.

original: de las nyams pa de'i bka' las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las nyams pa de'i bka' las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The transgression of that is the transgression of his word.

original: sogs pa'i sgra las brdzun du smra ba la sogs ba gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgra las brdzun du smra ba la sogs ba gzung ngo //
translated: The word “etc.” includes lying and so forth.

original: nyes pa sel bar byed pa'i don ni gsungs pa'i nyes pa las nye bar 'da' bar byed pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: nyes pa sel bar byed pa'i don ni gsungs pa'i nyes pa las nye bar 'da' bar byed pa'i don du'o //
translated: The meaning of removing faults is the meaning of not transgressing the faults that are taught.

original: rigs ni rigs gyi gtso bo ste /
analyzed: rigs ni rigs gyi gtso bo ste /
translated: The family is the chief of the families.

original: dam tshig nyams pas don yod pa'i bdag nyid la dmigs pa las de sel bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dam tshig nyams pas don yod pa'i bdag nyid la dmigs pa las de sel bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: The transgression of the pledge is the observation of Amoghasiddhi.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: That is the interpretable meaning.

original: gzhan de sel bar byed pa'i don du nges pa'i don gsungs @58a * //
analyzed: gzhan de sel bar byed pa'i don du nges pa'i don gsungs @58a * //
translated: The definitive meaning is stated in the other, which is for the purpose of removing that, as follows.

original: pa ; dam tshig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: pa ; dam tshig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The pledge of the family is stated by “pledge,” and so forth.

original: 'di nye bar bya'o gzung bar bya'o zhes pa dam tshig go //
analyzed: 'di nye bar bya'o gzung bar bya'o zhes pa dam tshig go //
translated: This is the pledge: “I will take up and hold this.”

original: khams phra ba ni rlung gis so //
analyzed: khams phra ba ni rlung gis so //
translated: The subtle constituent is the wind.

original: des zhes pa rlung gis so //
analyzed: des zhes pa rlung gis so //
translated: “By that” means by the wind.

original: thabs kyi ye shes ni 'od gsal thob pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs kyi ye shes ni 'od gsal thob pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The gnosis of the means is the cause of attaining the clear light.

original: 'gugs pa zhes pa 'di'i bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'gugs pa zhes pa 'di'i bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of “attracting” is as follows.

original: mchog tu zhes pa la sogs pa ste snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes pa la sogs pa ste snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The supreme, etc., is as before.

original: yongs su sbyong bar byed pa zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba nyid du ltung ba yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su sbyong bar byed pa zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba nyid du ltung ba yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: The purification is the recognition of the clear light.

original: bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin ni rigs te rigs su bya ba shes par bya'o zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin ni rigs te rigs su bya ba shes par bya'o zhes byas nas so //
translated: The nature of the unsurpassed worship is the family, which is to be known as the family to be purified.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning.

original: rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par dpyod pa'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par dpyod pa'i rnam pa ste /
translated: The characteristic of thorough differentiation is the aspect of analysis.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas skabs na yang 'di lhun grub tu yod bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas skabs na yang 'di lhun grub tu yod bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Even in the state of a tathāgata, this exists spontaneously.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i skabs su ni sgom par byed pa'i ye shes nyid rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i skabs su ni sgom par byed pa'i ye shes nyid rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: In the context of the yogi, the gnosis that is meditated upon is the nature of thorough analysis.

original: de'i phyir de yang pradzy'a dzhri ka go ;
analyzed: de'i phyir de yang pradzy'a dzhri ka go ;
translated: Therefore, that is prajñā-jñāna.

original: / drang don no //
analyzed: / drang don no //
translated: This is the provisional meaning.

original: zla bar snang ba zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon par byed pa ste //
analyzed: zla bar snang ba zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon par byed pa ste //
translated: The appearance as the moon is the illustration.

original: snang ba mched pa dang // snang ba nye bar thob pa dag nye bar mtshon par byed de //
analyzed: snang ba mched pa dang // snang ba nye bar thob pa dag nye bar mtshon par byed de //
translated: It illustrates the appearance, the increase of appearance, and the attainment of appearance.

original: de khams phra bas ni rlung gis so //
analyzed: de khams phra bas ni rlung gis so //
translated: That is subtle because of the wind.

original: mkha' la zhes pa 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: mkha' la zhes pa 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: In the sky means in the clear light.

original: 'dzin par mdzad do zhes pa sems can gyi rgyud pa ste rnal 'byor pa la yang snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dzin par mdzad do zhes pa sems can gyi rgyud pa ste rnal 'byor pa la yang snga ma bzhin no //
translated: It is held means in the continuum of sentient beings, and also in the yogi as before.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning.

original: zag pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i zag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zag pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i zag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Uncontaminated means because of the absence of the contamination of afflictions.

original: 'dod pa la nye bar longs spyod pa ni 'dod pa la yongs su she pas nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa la nye bar longs spyod pa ni 'dod pa la yongs su she pas nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
translated: Enjoyment of desire means enjoyment through the complete enjoyment of desire.

original: thar pa rab tu bsgrub pa ni 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod pa'i skye pa pa'o //
analyzed: thar pa rab tu bsgrub pa ni 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod pa'i skye pa pa'o //
translated: The attainment of liberation is the birth of one who enjoys the five objects of desire.

original: yul la mngon bar zhen pa med pas slar yang skye ba med par lnga po la rtogs pas 'khor pa las thar pa'o //
analyzed: yul la mngon bar zhen pa med pas slar yang skye ba med par lnga po la rtogs pas 'khor pa las thar pa'o //
translated: Since there is no attachment to objects, there is no further birth. By realizing the five objects, one is liberated from cyclic existence.

original: yang na zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //
analyzed: yang na zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //
translated: Or, “another position” is stated.

original: 'dod pa ni mngon par 'dod pa ste bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don la sogs ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni mngon par 'dod pa ste bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don la sogs ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Desire is the wish for one’s own aim, the aim of others, and so on.

original: thar pa ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: thar pa ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Liberation is the characteristic of undefiled bliss.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud la ni dgongs pa lung ston du'o //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud la ni dgongs pa lung ston du'o //
translated: In the explanatory tantra, it is taught in the Sandhivyākaraṇa.

original: phung po zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phung po zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
translated: The “aggregates” are form and so on.

original: 'di dag ces pa ni 'di nyid du thog mar mngon par brjod pa la ltos nas so //
analyzed: 'di dag ces pa ni 'di nyid du thog mar mngon par brjod pa la ltos nas so //
translated: “These” refers to the aggregates, which are the first to be mentioned in this context.

original: sangs rgyas 'gyur ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'gyur ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: “Become buddhas” are Vairocana and so on.

original: byang chub @58b ni 'od gsal ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: byang chub @58b ni 'od gsal ba'i ye shes so //
translated: “Enlightenment” is the luminous gnosis.

original: don ni snang la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: don ni snang la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Meaning” is appearance and so on.

original: de dag ni rkyen dang go //
analyzed: de dag ni rkyen dang go //
translated: They are conditions and means.

original: byang pa skyes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: byang pa skyes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: That is the arising of the bodhicitta.

original: de yang zhes pa ni sngar gsungs pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes pa ni sngar gsungs pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: And that, as previously stated, is the certainty.

original: de bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: Thus, etc.

original: sngar gsungs pa'i dmigs pa'i nus pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: sngar gsungs pa'i dmigs pa'i nus pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: is the result of the power of the previously stated objective.

original: de bzhin gshegs ba lnga po dbyung ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ba lnga po dbyung ba'o //
translated: The five Tathagatas are the emitters.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning.

original: slar yang zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa dbyung ba la ltos nas so //
analyzed: slar yang zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa dbyung ba la ltos nas so //
translated: Again, in dependence on the emission of the Tathagatas,🔽Vairochana, etc.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyis zhes pa lnga po rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyis zhes pa lnga po rnams kyi'o //
translated: are the five.

original: nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir ni gzugs la sogs pa de dang de nyams su myong bar byed pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir ni gzugs la sogs pa de dang de nyams su myong bar byed pa'i don du'o //
translated: For the sake of enjoyment is for the sake of experiencing those forms, etc.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa sgrub par byed pa mchog tu gyur pa ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa dang // spyan ma la sogs pa'i skur gyur pa gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa sgrub par byed pa mchog tu gyur pa ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa dang // spyan ma la sogs pa'i skur gyur pa gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams te /
translated: The supreme means of accomplishing the purification of forms, etc. are the forms, etc. of Vajra Body, etc. and Lochana, etc.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid me long la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i dpes so //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid me long la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i dpes so //
translated: Its nature is indicated by the example of the mirror, etc.

original: rnam par gzhag pa'i rim bar gsungs pa yang gzugs su bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa'i rim bar gsungs pa yang gzugs su bya'o //
translated: The order of the arrangement is to be made into form.

original: so sor rnam par brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: so sor rnam par brtag par bya'o //
translated: It is to be individually analyzed.

original: gzung bar bya'o zhes pa gzugs so //
analyzed: gzung bar bya'o zhes pa gzugs so //
translated: It is to be grasped.

original: rdo rje'i sgra las gzugs rnam par dag pa ston par byed do //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sgra las gzugs rnam par dag pa ston par byed do //
translated: The vajra sound teaches the purity of form.

original: de bzhin du sgra la sogs pa yang der bshad pa rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra la sogs pa yang der bshad pa rtogs par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, sound, etc. should be understood as explained there.

original: 'o na ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod par bya ba'i lha mo bzhi po yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod par bya ba'i lha mo bzhi po yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, how are the four goddesses to be enjoyed by the five Tathagatas?

original: m'a ma ka'i ni rdo rje'i rigs dang / rin po che'i rigs dag gi thun mongs ba nyid yin pas skyon med do //
analyzed: m'a ma ka'i ni rdo rje'i rigs dang / rin po che'i rigs dag gi thun mongs ba nyid yin pas skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault, because Mamaki is common to both the vajra and jewel lineages.

original: drug pa la ni phung po lnga po ldan pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad kyis 'brel lo //
analyzed: drug pa la ni phung po lnga po ldan pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad kyis 'brel lo //
translated: In the sixth, all are connected because of the possession of the five aggregates.

original: rdo rje 'dzin 'dir mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin 'dir mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Here, the vajra holder is Akshobhya.

original: de'i rjes su mnyes par byed pa ni bde pa sbyin pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i rjes su mnyes par byed pa ni bde pa sbyin pa nyid do //
translated: The one who pleases him is the giver of bliss.

original: dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because a commitment is that which should not be transgressed.

original: zhe sdang ni mi bskyod pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir zhe sdang dang mi bskyod pa'i sgra dag rnams grangs nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang ni mi bskyod pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir zhe sdang dang mi bskyod pa'i sgra dag rnams grangs nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: And because it is said that “hatred is Akṣobhya,” and so on, the terms “hatred” and “Akṣobhya” should be understood to be synonymous.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning explanation.

original: zhe sdang nyid nyon mongs pa ste /
analyzed: zhe sdang nyid nyon mongs pa ste /
translated: Hatred itself is an affliction.

original: de dag ye shes kyi rim pas de bzhin nyid du yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ye shes kyi rim pas de bzhin nyid du yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: It is thoroughly known as suchness by the stages of intuition.

original: de la dga' ba ni kun du chags pa'o //
analyzed: de la dga' ba ni kun du chags pa'o //
translated: Delight in that is attachment.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning explanation.

original: de nyid ces pa ni drug pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces pa ni drug pa'o //
translated: The word “that” is the sixth case.

original: de'i khams yin pa nyid kyi phyir m'a ma ka'i ste /
analyzed: de'i khams yin pa nyid kyi phyir m'a ma ka'i ste /
translated: Because it is the realm of that, it is Māmakī.

original: sems gtso bo yin pa'i phyir tho ga mar m'a ma k'i byung ba'o //🔽rjes su mnyes par @59a * //🔽byed pa ni bde ba rab tu spyin pas yongs su dgyes pa skyed par byed pa ste /
analyzed: sems gtso bo yin pa'i phyir tho ga mar m'a ma k'i byung ba'o // rjes su mnyes par @59a * // byed pa ni bde ba rab tu spyin pas yongs su dgyes pa skyed par byed pa ste /
translated: Because mind is primary, Māmakī arises from the mind.🔽Pleasing is the generation of delight by the bestowal of bliss.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is the literal meaning explanation.

original: mo ha ni shes pa ste sred pa de rnam par dag pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: mo ha ni shes pa ste sred pa de rnam par dag pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The desire is the consciousness, and its purification is as before.

original: 'dod chags ni bud med dang skyes ba dag gi phan tshun bde ba la chags pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni bud med dang skyes ba dag gi phan tshun bde ba la chags pa'o //
translated: Attachment is the attachment to the pleasure of women and men.

original: de'i rnam par dag pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i rnam par dag pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Its purification is as before.

original: drang ba dang nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba dang nges pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is the interpretable meaning and the definitive meaning.

original: sku zhes pa la sogs pa la mi rtag pa'o zhes pa ni 'jig rten du lus la sogs pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis slu bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sku zhes pa la sogs pa la mi rtag pa'o zhes pa ni 'jig rten du lus la sogs pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis slu bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The body, etc. are impermanent, because in the world, the body, etc. are deceptive by their impermanence.

original: de bzhin du yang rang gi sde pa rnams lus la sogs pa'i phung por gnas pa mi rtog par ston par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang rang gi sde pa rnams lus la sogs pa'i phung por gnas pa mi rtog par ston par byed do //
translated: Thus, the Buddhists teach that the body, etc. are impermanent.

original: so so'i skye bo'i lus la sogs pa kun nas 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa dang / mdo sde pa yang phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin grub par brjod pa na /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i lus la sogs pa kun nas 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa dang / mdo sde pa yang phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin grub par brjod pa na /
translated: The body, etc. of the ordinary person are subject to death, and the Sautrantikas also declare the body, etc. to be established by nature,

original: skad cig can nyid du rjod par byed do //
analyzed: skad cig can nyid du rjod par byed do //
translated: and they declare them to be momentary.

original: de la gal te dngos po skad cig ma gcig nyid du grub na //
analyzed: de la gal te dngos po skad cig ma gcig nyid du grub na //
translated: If a thing is established as a single moment,

original: skad cig phyi ma skye ba dang / skad cig snga ma 'gag par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skad cig phyi ma skye ba dang / skad cig snga ma 'gag par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: because the later moment is produced and the earlier moment ceases.

original: dbu ma ru gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: dbu ma ru gsungs pa yang /
translated: And it is said in the Madhyamaka:

original: yod gang rang bzhin bral pa yis //
analyzed: yod gang rang bzhin bral pa yis //
translated: Whatever exists is devoid of intrinsic reality.

original: med de med ces rig par 'gyur //
analyzed: med de med ces rig par 'gyur //
translated: It is known that it does not exist, that it is nonexistent.

original: yod pa da lta ma byung bas //
analyzed: yod pa da lta ma byung bas //
translated: Since what exists does not occur in the present,

original: snga ma chad par thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: snga ma chad par thal bar 'gyur //
translated: it follows that the former is annihilated.

original: zhes so // yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: zhes so // yi ge'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretation of the words.

original: stong pa zhes pa la sogs pa la phung po la sogs pa rnams la stong pa nyid du mngon par zhen pa mchog nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: stong pa zhes pa la sogs pa la phung po la sogs pa rnams la stong pa nyid du mngon par zhen pa mchog nyid kyi phyir //
translated: As for the passage beginning with “emptiness,” etc., it is emptiness because of the supreme nature of the attachment to emptiness in the aggregates, etc.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi lus la sogs pa slu bar byed pa stong ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi lus la sogs pa slu bar byed pa stong ba nyid do //
translated: It is emptiness because it deceives the world, the lord of the world, etc., with its body, etc.

original: spyi'i don no zhes pa stong ba nyid la dmigs pas rang bzhin gyis yod pa gsal ba bskyed par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i don no zhes pa stong ba nyid la dmigs pas rang bzhin gyis yod pa gsal ba bskyed par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is the general meaning, because it is held that the perception of emptiness generates the manifestation of intrinsic reality.

original: snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas sprul pa'i sku la sogs pa snang pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis //
analyzed: snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas sprul pa'i sku la sogs pa snang pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis //
translated: As for the passage beginning with “appearance,” etc., it is appearance because the emanation body, etc., have the nature of manifestation.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid du rlung gi khams kyi dbang gi phyir bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid du rlung gi khams kyi dbang gi phyir bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should accomplish the state of the Enjoyment Body by the power of the wind element.

original: lus la sogs pa snang ba la rab zhugs nas skad cig skad cig la slar yang rang gis yang dag par rig par gyur pa //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa snang ba la rab zhugs nas skad cig skad cig la slar yang rang gis yang dag par rig par gyur pa //
translated: Having entered into the appearance of the body, etc., in each moment, one should again realize it by oneself.

original: snang ba gsum po rang gis yang dag bar rig par byas ni bdag nyid dam slob ma'o //
analyzed: snang ba gsum po rang gis yang dag bar rig par byas ni bdag nyid dam slob ma'o //
translated: Having realized the three appearances by oneself, one should either do it oneself or one should do it for one's disciples.

original: dngos po med par dmigs pa ni 'od gsal ba la dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po med par dmigs pa ni 'od gsal ba la dmigs pa ste /
translated: The observation of non-entity is the observation of clearlight transparency.

original: rtog pa ma yin pa de ni sku la sogs pa slu bar byed pa ste rnam par nyams par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa ma yin pa de ni sku la sogs pa slu bar byed pa ste rnam par nyams par byed pa'o //
translated: That non-imagination deceives the body, etc., and causes them to vanish.

original: sbas pa'o zhes pa dang lhag ma la ltos nas gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sbas pa'o zhes pa dang lhag ma la ltos nas gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is hidden because it is taught in dependence on the remainder.

original: phung bo @59b la sogs pa dang dpa' gcig nyid kyi bla ma'i drin las longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid du rtogs nas //
analyzed: phung bo @59b la sogs pa dang dpa' gcig nyid kyi bla ma'i drin las longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid du rtogs nas //
translated: Having realized the state of the Enjoyment Body by the grace of the guru, who is one's sole hero, etc.,

original: ril bor 'dzin pa la sogs pas snang ba med pa nyid ni slu bar byed pa ste snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ril bor 'dzin pa la sogs pas snang ba med pa nyid ni slu bar byed pa ste snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The non-appearance of the grasping of the ball, etc. is the deception, as before.

original: mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The ultimate.

original: de rnam pa zhes bya ba ni ye ge'i don la sogs pa bshad pa rnam pa bzhi'i bshad pa'i don gyi rnam par dman pa la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i don du sems rtse gcig pa nyid du mdzad par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de rnam pa zhes bya ba ni ye ge'i don la sogs pa bshad pa rnam pa bzhi'i bshad pa'i don gyi rnam par dman pa la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i don du sems rtse gcig pa nyid du mdzad par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The aspect is the four kinds of explanation, such as the explanation of the meaning of the letters, etc. The meaning of the explanation is the single-pointedness of mind for the sake of the disciples who are inferior, etc. in the aspect of the meaning.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: The literal meaning.

original: badzra ra ti zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa nyid kyi don drang ba dang nges pa'i don dag gis bstan par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: badzra ra ti zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa nyid kyi don drang ba dang nges pa'i don dag gis bstan par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the statement beginning with vajra rati is to be taught by the provisional and definitive meanings.

original: 'di rnams ni spyan ma la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: 'di rnams ni spyan ma la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: These are Locanā, etc.

original: lhan cig spyod pa zhes mngon par brjod pa'i phyir gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnams rjes su spyod pa nyid du kun du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: lhan cig spyod pa zhes mngon par brjod pa'i phyir gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnams rjes su spyod pa nyid du kun du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The forms of Vajra Body, etc. should be understood as the followers, because of the expression together with the followers.

original: 'dod pa'i dbang phung ces pa ni 'dod pa'i yul sprul pa dang / de la longs spyod pa la mnga' bdag yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dbang phung ces pa ni 'dod pa'i yul sprul pa dang / de la longs spyod pa la mnga' bdag yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The “mass of desire” is the emission of the object of desire, and the mastery of enjoyment of that.

original: de bzhin du gang gal te 'dod pa la nye bar longs spyod pa'i gdul bya 'byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe gcig dang nye ba'i rim pas rtog pa'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du gang gal te 'dod pa la nye bar longs spyod pa'i gdul bya 'byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe gcig dang nye ba'i rim pas rtog pa'am /
translated: Similarly, if there are disciples who are to be trained by the enjoyment of desire, then the bodhisattva, by the order of the stage of intimacy with one,

original: rtog pa las gzhan 'dod mngon par sprul pa bsten par bya ste /
analyzed: rtog pa las gzhan 'dod mngon par sprul pa bsten par bya ste /
translated: or by the order of the stage of intimacy with another, should manifest the desire god.

original: gdul bya mtha' yas pa rnams la 'dod pa'i bud med 'bum phrag re re sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: gdul bya mtha' yas pa rnams la 'dod pa'i bud med 'bum phrag re re sbyin par byed do //
translated: He gives to each of the disciples, who are infinite in number, a hundred thousand women of desire.

original: skra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: skra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: The hair is just as it is.

original: dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo nyid ces pa ni mngon par 'thor bar byed do //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo nyid ces pa ni mngon par 'thor bar byed do //
translated: The nature of the consecration is the emission of the bodhicitta.

original: lus dang dag gi dri ma 'khrud par byed do zhes pas dbang bskur pa ste /
analyzed: lus dang dag gi dri ma 'khrud par byed do zhes pas dbang bskur pa ste /
translated: The consecration is the washing of the stains of body and speech.

original: bla ma rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: bla ma rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The guru is Vairocana.

original: de'i ngo bo rgyu dang 'bras bu dag dbyer med par nye bar btags pa las rdo rje ste mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo rgyu dang 'bras bu dag dbyer med par nye bar btags pa las rdo rje ste mi phyed pa'o //
translated: Its essence is the vajra, which is indivisible, because it is applied to the inseparability of cause and effect.🔽What? is Yamantaka.

original: gang yin pa zhes pa ni gshin rje gshed do //🔽de zhes pa gshin rje mthar byed do //
analyzed: gang yin pa zhes pa ni gshin rje gshed do // de zhes pa gshin rje mthar byed do //
translated: That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.

original: de la dmigs pa ni gshin rje mthar byed la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa ni gshin rje mthar byed la dmigs pa'o //
translated: That? is Yamantaka.

original: drang ba'i don to //🔽rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam pas snang bar byed /
analyzed: drang ba'i don to // rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam pas snang bar byed /
translated: That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.

original: sgrib pa ma lus pa bsregs pas sems can rnams la snang bar byed de zhes pas rnam par snang mdzad de 'od gsal lo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste //
analyzed: sgrib pa ma lus pa bsregs pas sems can rnams la snang bar byed de zhes pas rnam par snang mdzad de 'od gsal lo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste //
translated: That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.🔽That? is Yamantaka.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin @60a * //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin @60a * //
translated: That? is Yamantaka.

original: gshegs pa lnga po thams cad do //
analyzed: gshegs pa lnga po thams cad do //
translated: That? is Yamantaka.

original: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor na rten pa'i bdag nyid can rnam pa brgyad do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor na rten pa'i bdag nyid can rnam pa brgyad do //
translated: The eight are the nature of the mandala's support.

original: de bskyed pa ni bgegs rab tu 'joms pa po nyid kyis de bskyed pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
analyzed: de bskyed pa ni bgegs rab tu 'joms pa po nyid kyis de bskyed pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
translated: Its generation is said to be the cause of its generation by the complete subjugation of the obstructors.

original: byin gyis rlob pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: byin gyis rlob pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The consecration, etc.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: is literal.

original: gshin rje gshed ni dmyal ba'o ni dmyal ba'i bdag bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir yang na dmyal ba'i las ni gshin rje ste /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed ni dmyal ba'o ni dmyal ba'i bdag bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir yang na dmyal ba'i las ni gshin rje ste /
translated: Yama is hell, and since he is the lord of hell, or the action of hell is Yama,

original: de'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because he is its cause.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin zhugs pa'i drug pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin zhugs pa'i drug pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One is the sixth, who has entered the concentration of Vairochana.

original: chen po yang de yin la khro bo yang yin pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: chen po yang de yin la khro bo yang yin pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: It is a concentration because it is great and wrathful,

original: sems kyi khyad par gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: sems kyi khyad par gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: and that is the special mind.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: It is the interpretable meaning.

original: ma rig pa zhes pa ni ye shes gsum gyis bskyed pa'i rnam par ma dag pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa zhes pa ni ye shes gsum gyis bskyed pa'i rnam par ma dag pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: Ignorance is the impure Enjoyment Body produced by the three intuitions.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning explanation.

original: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so ;
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so ;
translated: Perfect enlightenment is the intuition of equality.

original: / de la dmigs pa zhes pa ni thog mar sbas pa'i don la dmigs nas de la dmigs par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: / de la dmigs pa zhes pa ni thog mar sbas pa'i don la dmigs nas de la dmigs par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Here, “observing” means that one should first observe the hidden meaning and then observe that.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning explanation.

original: shes rab kyis zhes pa ni so sor rtog pa'i bdag nyid can gyis nyon mongs pa rnams la so sor rtog pa las so //
analyzed: shes rab kyis zhes pa ni so sor rtog pa'i bdag nyid can gyis nyon mongs pa rnams la so sor rtog pa las so //
translated: “By wisdom” means that by the wisdom of discernment, one should discern the afflictions.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning explanation.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid can zhes pa ni ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid can zhes pa ni ma rig pa'o //
translated: “The nature of discursive thought” is ignorance.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa //
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa //
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: 'od gsal zhes pa la sogs pa ste //
analyzed: 'od gsal zhes pa la sogs pa ste //
translated: “luminosity” and so on.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning explanation.

original: rdo rje'i dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang gi bka'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang gi bka'o //
translated: The “vajra commitment” is the word of Vajradhara.

original: 'jig rten pa zhes pa'i tshig ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams las bzlog pa gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa zhes pa'i tshig ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams las bzlog pa gzhan pa'o //
translated: The word “mundane” is the opposite of the Vajra dakinis.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is literal.

original: chos rin po che zhes pa ni rin po che thams cad ston par byed pa'i dbang phyug yin pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: chos rin po che zhes pa ni rin po che thams cad ston par byed pa'i dbang phyug yin pa nyid kyis /
translated: The “jewel of the Dharma” is the lord who reveals all jewels,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is consecrated by all the Tathagatas.

original: rigs ni bskyed pa'i gnas zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rigs ni bskyed pa'i gnas zhes pa'o //
translated: The “family” is the place of generation.

original: drang ba'i don to //🔽bsdus ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'od gsal las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems las skyes pa nyid kyis rta mgran  yang de las /
analyzed: drang ba'i don to // bsdus ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'od gsal las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems las skyes pa nyid kyis rta mgran  yang de las /
translated: It is interpretable in meaning.

original: skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽nyon mongs pa 'dod chags la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
analyzed: skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro // nyon mongs pa 'dod chags la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
translated: The “mandala of the assembly” is born from the bodhi-mind arisen from the clear light, and also because Hayagriva is born from that.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: It is interpretable in meaning.

original: dbang po gnyis ni bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: The “two organs” are the female and male organs.

original: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni bskyod @60b pa'o ;
analyzed: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni bskyod @60b pa'o ;
translated: Their “union” is their movement.

original: ; thabs des mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags bar ma'i mtshan nyid skyed par mdzad ces pa bskyed nas kyang de'i mthar 'od gsal ba mngon du byed do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ; thabs des mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags bar ma'i mtshan nyid skyed par mdzad ces pa bskyed nas kyang de'i mthar 'od gsal ba mngon du byed do zhes pa'o //
translated: Having generated that, he manifests clear light at the end of that.

original: nges pa'i don to //🔽thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes pa ni /
analyzed: nges pa'i don to // thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes pa ni /
translated: This is the definitive meaning explanation.

original: bya bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bya bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Everything, etc. The body, speech, and mind are the supreme body of all the tathagatas, whose nature is the gnosis of achieving activities.

original: de nyid rdo rje ste bla ma'o //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje ste bla ma'o //
translated: That is the vajra, which is the supreme.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning explanation.

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: Everything, etc.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni dgongs pa de'i ngo bo nyid rnams so //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni dgongs pa de'i ngo bo nyid rnams so //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are the entities of that intention.

original: de rnams par dag pa'i gnas ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de rnams par dag pa'i gnas ni rdo rje'o //
translated: The abode of their purification is the vajra.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning explanation.

original: lus gzir ba'i phyir ni dge ba'i dbang po'i lus las ma yin pa nyid 'byung ba'i phyir yang bgegs so //
analyzed: lus gzir ba'i phyir ni dge ba'i dbang po'i lus las ma yin pa nyid 'byung ba'i phyir yang bgegs so //
translated: Because of the body being oppressed, the body of the virtuous faculty does not arise, and so there is an obstruction.

original: thabs kyi ye shes shar bas ni /
analyzed: thabs kyi ye shes shar bas ni /
translated: By the arising of the gnosis of method,

original: don dam pa'i bden pa thob pa'i thabs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mthar 'jig pa ste /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa thob pa'i thabs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mthar 'jig pa ste /
translated: the method of attaining ultimate truth is the end of the enjoyment body,

original: 'od gsal du byed do zhes nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'od gsal du byed do zhes nges pa'i don to //
translated: which is made clear light. This is the definitive meaning.

original: dkyil 'khor ni rten dang brten pa'i bdag nyid can dang / yang dag par mnyes par byed pa ni sems rnam par g-yeng ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni rten dang brten pa'i bdag nyid can dang / yang dag par mnyes par byed pa ni sems rnam par g-yeng ba nyid kyis so //
translated: The maṇḍala is the nature of the support and the supported, and the complete satisfaction is by the distraction of the mind.

original: sems pa ni khro bo'o //
analyzed: sems pa ni khro bo'o //
translated: The mind is wrathful.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “all” and so on.

original: 'dir sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
analyzed: 'dir sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
translated: Here, following the method of practice,

original: khro bo bzhi po rigs kyi dbang por bshad do //
analyzed: khro bo bzhi po rigs kyi dbang por bshad do //
translated: the four wrathful ones are explained as the lords of the families.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa drug dang spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhin dang // gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo lnga dang / byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad do //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa drug dang spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhin dang // gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo lnga dang / byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad do //
translated: Likewise, the six Tathagatas, the goddesses Locana and so forth, the five goddesses Rupavajra and so forth, and the eight Bodhisattvas Maitreya and so forth.

original: bzhugs so zhes pa 'di la yang drug pa mngon par brjod pas drug pa'i rang bzhin 'di'i dkyil 'khor la lha nyi shu rtsa gnyis mngon par brjod par byas so //
analyzed: bzhugs so zhes pa 'di la yang drug pa mngon par brjod pas drug pa'i rang bzhin 'di'i dkyil 'khor la lha nyi shu rtsa gnyis mngon par brjod par byas so //
translated: The word abide here is in the sixth case, and so this mandala of twenty-two deities is expressed by the sixth case.

original: da ni dkyil 'khor 'di las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor pa gang yin pa 'dir ma gsungs pa rnams bshad pa'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba las kyang brjod la //🔽de rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni dkyil 'khor 'di las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor pa gang yin pa 'dir ma gsungs pa rnams bshad pa'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba las kyang brjod la // de rnams gsungs pa /
translated: Now, those deities of other mandalas who are not mentioned here are mentioned in the explanatory tantra, the Shriparamådya.

original: shar phyogs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: shar phyogs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Those are mentioned in the verse beginning with In the east.

original: rang gi rgyud nas yongs su bsdu ba'i don du 'dir gsungs pa rnams la 'jug par bya'o zhes rnam par bshad pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: rang gi rgyud nas yongs su bsdu ba'i don du 'dir gsungs pa rnams la 'jug par bya'o zhes rnam par bshad pas gsungs pa /
translated: In order to include those mentioned in the Shriparamådya, the commentary says, One should understand that those mentioned there are included in one's own tantra.

original: shar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: shar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The verse beginning with In the east is for that purpose.

original: thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras @61a * //
analyzed: thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras @61a * //
translated: By the words all and so forth,

original: phyag dang / zhal dang kha dog dang / mtshan ma la sogs pa gzur ngo //
analyzed: phyag dang / zhal dang kha dog dang / mtshan ma la sogs pa gzur ngo //
translated: the hands, faces, colors, emblems, and so forth are distinguished.

original: slar yang dgongs ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das 'dir yang dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par mi gsung zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: slar yang dgongs ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das 'dir yang dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par mi gsung zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Again, by what intention does the Lord not speak here of the complete maṇḍala? He says:

original: slob dpon med par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon med par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Without a master and so forth.

original: gzhan du zhes pa ni rgyud gzhan du'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes pa ni rgyud gzhan du'o //
translated: Elsewhere means in another tantra.

original: gal te gang slob dpon med par 'jug par gyur na nyes par cir 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te gang slob dpon med par 'jug par gyur na nyes par cir 'gyur /
translated: If one were to enter without a master, what would be the fault?

original: grub par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: grub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: There would be no accomplishment.

original: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir legs par byas pa ma yin gyi //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir legs par byas pa ma yin gyi //
translated: Because it would not be well done without relying on another,

original: 'dir gzhan lam ltos par 'jug pa ni dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //🔽yongs su rdzogs par brjod pa la rigs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dir gzhan lam ltos par 'jug pa ni dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro // yongs su rdzogs par brjod pa la rigs pa gsungs pa /
translated: here entering without relying on another would lead to hell.🔽The reasoning for expressing the complete [maṇḍala] is stated:

original: ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste dpe rigs pa dang ldan par byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste dpe rigs pa dang ldan par byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: The example is stated with reasoning: Just as... and so forth.

original: sku'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa brgal ba'o //🔽'di'i lan gsungs pa /
analyzed: sku'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa brgal ba'o // 'di'i lan gsungs pa /
translated: The objection is stated with “body,” etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The reply is stated with “the Bhagavān,” etc.

original: rdo rje slob dpon zhes pa ni drug pa'i 'o ;
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon zhes pa ni drug pa'i 'o ;
translated: “Vajra master” is the sixth.

original: / sku'i rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: / sku'i rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
translated: “Body vajra,” etc.,

original: rnam shes phung por yang dag bzhugs sa //
analyzed: rnam shes phung por yang dag bzhugs sa //
translated: up to “truly abides in the aggregate of consciousness.”

original: zhes pa'i mthar thug pas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po rnams kyang phung po'i bdag nyid kyis mngon par brjod do //
analyzed: zhes pa'i mthar thug pas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po rnams kyang phung po'i bdag nyid kyis mngon par brjod do //
translated: Thus the five transcendent lords are also expressed by the nature of the aggregates.

original: sha sogs zhes pa'i sogs kyi sgra las rus pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: sha sogs zhes pa'i sogs kyi sgra las rus pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: “Flesh, etc.,” etc., means that the term “etc.” includes bone, and so on.

original: khrag sogs zhes pa'i sogs kyi sgras bad kan la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: khrag sogs zhes pa'i sogs kyi sgras bad kan la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Blood, etc.,” etc., means that the term “etc.” includes phlegm, and so on.

original: dro ba la sogs zhes pa ni 'dir lto ba'i me la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dro ba la sogs zhes pa ni 'dir lto ba'i me la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Warmth, etc.,” etc., means that here the fire of the abdomen, and so on, is referred to.

original: bskyod pa la sogs zhes pa ni 'dir dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bskyod pa la sogs zhes pa ni 'dir dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Movement, etc.,” etc., means that here the exhalation and inhalation of breath, and so on, is referred to.

original: mig gi dbang gnyis la zhes pa ni /
analyzed: mig gi dbang gnyis la zhes pa ni /
translated: “The two eyes,” etc.,

original: spyod bsdus su /
analyzed: spyod bsdus su /
translated: is stated in the Compendium of Practice:

original: mig gi skye mched kyi tshogs ni sa'i snying bo'o zhes gsungs ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: mig gi skye mched kyi tshogs ni sa'i snying bo'o zhes gsungs ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is it not said that the collection of the eye-source is Kṣitigarbha?

original: dbang po skye mchad nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dbang po skye mchad nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the sense-faculty is the source itself,

original: mig la sogs pa'i tshogs kyang dbang po'i sgras brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i tshogs kyang dbang po'i sgras brjod par bya'o //
translated: the collection of eye, etc. should also be expressed by the word sense-faculty.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said,

original: sna la bzhugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sna la bzhugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Residing in the nose, etc.

original: khams bzhi'i rang bzhin zhes pa la sogs pas lus thams cad reg bya'i dbang po'i bdag nyid can nyid la /
analyzed: khams bzhi'i rang bzhin zhes pa la sogs pas lus thams cad reg bya'i dbang po'i bdag nyid can nyid la /
translated: By the nature of the four elements, etc., the entire body is the nature of the body sense-faculty.

original: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba mngon par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba mngon par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin should be expressed.

original: mdzod las ni gang yang pho'i dbang po mthe bo'i rnam ba gsang ba la gnas par gsungs so //
analyzed: mdzod las ni gang yang pho'i dbang po mthe bo'i rnam ba gsang ba la gnas par gsungs so //
translated: In the Abhidharmakośa, it is said that the male faculty is shaped like a thumb and resides in the secret place.

original: mo'i dbang po lam du gnas pa rnga'i sbubs @61b lta bur gsungs so //
analyzed: mo'i dbang po lam du gnas pa rnga'i sbubs @61b lta bur gsungs so //
translated: The female faculty, shaped like a drum, resides in the path.

original: sgrub pa'i thabs su yang skyes pa'i gnas gsum du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bskyed cing dgod do //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i thabs su yang skyes pa'i gnas gsum du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bskyed cing dgod do //
translated: In the sādhana, Sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin is generated and placed in the three places of the male.

original: bud med la yang reg bya rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: bud med la yang reg bya rdo rje ma'o //
translated: and Vajra Touch is also in the woman.

original: gtso bo 'di ni dbang po'i gnas la zhes mngon par mtshams sbyar bas 'dir sa bon dgod cing gnas gzhan la yang gtso bos khyab pa yin no zhes pa 'di 'gal ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtso bo 'di ni dbang po'i gnas la zhes mngon par mtshams sbyar bas 'dir sa bon dgod cing gnas gzhan la yang gtso bos khyab pa yin no zhes pa 'di 'gal ba ni ma yin no //
translated: This is the chief one, in the place of the sense organ, as the connection is made. Here the seed is planted, and the chief one pervades the other places. This is not a contradiction.

original: de bzhin du dbang po gzhan rnams la yang bshad pa ji ltar 'byung ba 'di'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang po gzhan rnams la yang bshad pa ji ltar 'byung ba 'di'o //
translated: In the same way, the other sense organs are explained as they occur.

original: rtsa rgyus ni mgo bo'i'o //
analyzed: rtsa rgyus ni mgo bo'i'o //
translated: The sinews are in the head.

original: dpung pa zhes pa ni nye ba'i dbang du byas nas bdun pa ste /
analyzed: dpung pa zhes pa ni nye ba'i dbang du byas nas bdun pa ste /
translated: The shoulders are the seventh, in proximity, as it were.

original: ji ltar ga ga na phyugs lhas ji lta bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar ga ga na phyugs lhas ji lta bzhin no //
translated: As in the case of the cow pen, as it were.

original: des na dpung pa dang nye bar 'jug pa'i gzhogs su mi g-yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po gnyis dgod do //
analyzed: des na dpung pa dang nye bar 'jug pa'i gzhogs su mi g-yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po gnyis dgod do //
translated: Thus, one should place Acala and Rāghavaja in the proximity of the shoulders.

original: 'og ces pa rkang pa gnyis kyi 'og tu'o //
analyzed: 'og ces pa rkang pa gnyis kyi 'og tu'o //
translated: The groin is below the two thighs.

original: de ltar byas nas kun la zhes pa la sogs pa dang / lus zhes pa la sogs pa ste /🔽tha dad pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar byas nas kun la zhes pa la sogs pa dang / lus zhes pa la sogs pa ste / tha dad pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Having done that, “in all” and so forth, and “the body” and so forth.🔽This is the order of the different [parts].

original: de dag ni gsungs pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: de dag ni gsungs pa'i rim pas so //
translated: They are in the order given.

original: sku'i dkyil 'khor du brjod do //
analyzed: sku'i dkyil 'khor du brjod do //
translated: is called the mandala of the body.🔽What is that?

original: ci zhen gsungs pa /🔽rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ci zhen gsungs pa / rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said:🔽The vajra master's body is the mandala.🔽The body is the mandala of the body,🔽the mandala of the vajra master's body is said.

original: rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus las brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa /
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus las brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa /
translated: The mandala of the body is the body of Vajradhara,🔽the wheel of deities, the aggregates and so forth, are said to be the bestowal of Buddhahood and so forth.

original: lus zhes pa ste rdo rje 'chang gi sku'i tha snyad du byed pa lha'i 'khor lo phung po la sogs pa la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs par rnam par gzhag pa mngon par gsungs pa ster bar byed do zhes pa lus can no //
analyzed: lus zhes pa ste rdo rje 'chang gi sku'i tha snyad du byed pa lha'i 'khor lo phung po la sogs pa la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs par rnam par gzhag pa mngon par gsungs pa ster bar byed do zhes pa lus can no //
translated: The body is the body of Vajradhara.

original: 'di rnams kyis dgos pa gzhan gsungs pa /🔽'di dag ces pa la sogs pa ste /🔽sprul par byed pa zhes pas sprul pa'i sku'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis dgos pa gzhan gsungs pa / 'di dag ces pa la sogs pa ste / sprul par byed pa zhes pas sprul pa'i sku'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: These are the other purposes that are said:🔽These are the mandalas,🔽the emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of emanation body,

original: rnam pa gnyis par kha cig tu mya ngan las 'das la zhes par klog ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis par kha cig tu mya ngan las 'das la zhes par klog ste /
translated: the two kinds of emanation body,🔽the two kinds of eman

original: phyogs 'di la mya ngan las 'das pa ni mi dang skal pa mnyam pa dang lha dang skal pa mnyam pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mya dan las 'das pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don gcig nyid do //
analyzed: phyogs 'di la mya ngan las 'das pa ni mi dang skal pa mnyam pa dang lha dang skal pa mnyam pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mya dan las 'das pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don gcig nyid do //
translated: In this regard, nirvana is to be understood as the nirvana of a human, the nirvana of a god, and the nirvana of the Complete Enjoyment Body.🔽The one who has the vajra is to be called the one who has the vajra.

original: rdo rje can ni rdo rje dang ldan pa brjod par bya'o zhes pa 'dis legs par sbyangs ba ni rgyu dang rkyen dag gis legs par 'dus byas pa las skyes pa'i khams gsum pa can no zhes bstan pa'i tshul gang yin pa de la de bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje can ni rdo rje dang ldan pa brjod par bya'o zhes pa 'dis legs par sbyangs ba ni rgyu dang rkyen dag gis legs par 'dus byas pa las skyes pa'i khams gsum pa can no zhes bstan pa'i tshul gang yin pa de la de bzhin no //
translated: This teaches that the one who is well trained is the one who is born from the well-cultivated elements of the three realms by means of causes and conditions.

original: 'jug pa'i don du gsol ba 'debs par byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i don du gsol ba 'debs par byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: The one who makes a request for the sake of engaging is stated:

original: myur du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: myur du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Quickly, etc.

original: myur du @62a * //
analyzed: myur du @62a * //
translated: Quickly

original: zhes pa skye ba 'di nyid la'o //
analyzed: zhes pa skye ba 'di nyid la'o //
translated: is in this very life.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes pa de rdzas kyi ngo bo med pa'i khyad par mya ngan las 'das pas nye bar bsags pa'i dge ba yongs su smin pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes pa de rdzas kyi ngo bo med pa'i khyad par mya ngan las 'das pas nye bar bsags pa'i dge ba yongs su smin pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur zhes gsungs pa /
translated: The so-called nirvana is a special non-existence of the entity of substance.  Nirvana is the full ripening of the virtue accumulated by nirvana.

original: khyod kyi dge pa yongs smin pa //
analyzed: khyod kyi dge pa yongs smin pa //
translated: Your virtue is fully ripened.

original: zhes so// de bas zhes pa la sogs pa nye bar sdud pa ste /
analyzed: zhes so// de bas zhes pa la sogs pa nye bar sdud pa ste /
translated: The line Therefore, etc. is a summary.

original: brjod pa'i dan yongs su shes pa dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa'i slob dpon mchog tu 'dzin pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: brjod pa'i dan yongs su shes pa dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa'i slob dpon mchog tu 'dzin pa gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that the teacher who fully understands the meaning of the expression time is the best.

original: ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The line Just as, etc. is about that.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa la ltas nas gsungs pa'i bshad pa 'di'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa la ltas nas gsungs pa'i bshad pa 'di'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: This is the explanation of the line having seen the creation stage.

original: dang po'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dang po'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The line The first, etc. is about that.
