original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ni dga' ba ni the tshom bsal bas ma 'ongs pa na 'dus pa'i don la lhag par mos ba rnams kyis the tshom bsal bar 'jug pa ston pa rnams kyis mgu ba yid la byas nas so //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ni dga' ba ni the tshom bsal bas ma 'ongs pa na 'dus pa'i don la lhag par mos ba rnams kyis the tshom bsal bar 'jug pa ston pa rnams kyis mgu ba yid la byas nas so //
translated: Joy is the removal of doubt, and those who are devoted to the future meaning of the assembly, having removed doubt, are shown to be engaged.

original: mgu bas ni 'jigs pas sbu zing zhes byed par gyur to //
analyzed: mgu bas ni 'jigs pas sbu zing zhes byed par gyur to //
translated: With joy, one's hair stands on end in fear.

original: 'jigs pa'i rgyu gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i rgyu gsungs pa /
translated: The cause of fear is stated:

original: phyag 'tshal zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: phyag 'tshal zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, etc.

original: rnam par gzhag pa'i rim par gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa'i rim par gsungs pa yang /
translated: The statement in the order of presentation:

original: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan ma lus pa'i tshogs 'dzin pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'dir so so'i skye bo'i lus la dgod pa ni /
analyzed: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan ma lus pa'i tshogs 'dzin pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'dir so so'i skye bo'i lus la dgod pa ni /
translated: The Buddhas, who hold the entire collection of qualities such as the ten powers and the four fearlessnesses, are placed here in the bodies of ordinary beings.

original: 'gal ba'i bshad pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i bshad pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: This is the explanation of the contradiction, etc.

original: 'gal ba'i bshad pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang / 'gal bar bshad pa bsgoms pas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes 'jigs pa dang du bdag gi rgyu'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i bshad pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang / 'gal bar bshad pa bsgoms pas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes 'jigs pa dang du bdag gi rgyu'o //
translated: The explanation of the contradiction is that one will go to hell through meditation on the explanation of the contradiction with what the Blessed One said. This is the cause of fear.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa yang 'dir rnam gzhag rim par gsungs pa gang yin pa de ji lta ba bzhin du gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas rtogs par bya'o zhes gsungs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa yang 'dir rnam gzhag rim par gsungs pa gang yin pa de ji lta ba bzhin du gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas rtogs par bya'o zhes gsungs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: And the equipoise should be understood just as it is taught in the sequence of the arrangement here.

original: rdo rje 'chad chen po so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chad chen po so //
translated: This is the great vajra explanation.

original: sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can yin pa nyid kyis phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can yin pa nyid kyis phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can nyid du gsungs so //
translated: By the very fact that this body mandala has the nature of thirty-two deities, it is taught that the extracted mandala also has the nature of thirty-two deities.

original: sku'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa nyid gang yin pa de phyung pa las phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sku'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa nyid gang yin pa de phyung pa las phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is the very state of abiding in the body mandala becomes the extracted mandala from the extraction.

original: da ni bri bar bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can nyid du bshad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni bri bar bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can nyid du bshad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, in order to explain that the mandala to be drawn also has the nature of thirty-two deities, it is said by this and so on.

original: @62b sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi gtan tshigs 'dis so //
analyzed: @62b sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi gtan tshigs 'dis so //
translated: By this reason of the thirty-two natures.

original: phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas nas /
translated: With respect to the extracted maṇḍala,

original: rigs pa nye bar brjod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rigs pa nye bar brjod pa ma yin nam /
translated: is it not a statement of reasoning?

original: de ci ltar 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ci ltar 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How is it that this is stated by “thus”?

original: gleng gzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pas rigs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gleng gzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pas rigs pa gsungs te /
translated: The statement of reasoning is stated by “the nidāna,” and so on.

original: gleng gzhi ni dang po'i rgyu phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: gleng gzhi ni dang po'i rgyu phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The nidāna is the cause of the first, the extracted maṇḍala.

original: de'i dbang du byas pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i dbang du byas pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is taken as the basis of that.

original: sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid mtshon pa'o //
translated: The thirty-two natures are indicated.

original: de nyid du ni phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid du ni phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid do //
translated: That itself is the extracted maṇḍala.

original: rgyud kyi don ni bshad pa'i rgyud kyi don to //
analyzed: rgyud kyi don ni bshad pa'i rgyud kyi don to //
translated: The meaning of the tantra is the meaning of the explanatory tantra.

original: lhag ma zhes pa ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma zhes pa ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa'o //
translated: The remainder is the explanation of the maṇḍala of colored powder.

original: skabs su bab pa ma yin no ni skabs su 'ongs pa ni phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid de /
analyzed: skabs su bab pa ma yin no ni skabs su 'ongs pa ni phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid de /
translated: It is not the occasion, because the extracted maṇḍala is the occasion.

original: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyis mngon par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyis mngon par brjod par bya ste /
translated: The maṇḍala of colored particles itself is to be expressed.

original: de'i phyir phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa'i rigs pas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa skabs su bab pa'o//
analyzed: de'i phyir phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa'i rigs pas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa skabs su bab pa'o//
translated: Therefore, it is appropriate to say that the maṇḍala of colored particles is also entailed by the reasoning stated for the extracted maṇḍala.

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sems can rnams snod kyi bdag nyid can mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sems can rnams snod kyi bdag nyid can mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Everything, etc. All tathāgatas are sentient beings, the nature of a vessel, Akṣhobhya, etc.

original: de rnams kyi sku la sogs pa de nyid gsang ba ste gsang ba la zhes pa gsang ba la ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi sku la sogs pa de nyid gsang ba ste gsang ba la zhes pa gsang ba la ste /
translated: That very body, etc. of them is secret, i.e., the secret.

original: lag pa phyis pa la lnga pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa phyis pa la lnga pa'o //
translated: The fifth is the wiping of the hands.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa ;
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa ;
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: gzigs shing zhes pa 'di'i don 'chad par byed pa khong du chud nas zhes pa ni de'i bdag nyid du skyes par gyur nas so //
analyzed: gzigs shing zhes pa 'di'i don 'chad par byed pa khong du chud nas zhes pa ni de'i bdag nyid du skyes par gyur nas so //
translated: Having understood the meaning of this “seeing,” etc., “having understood” means having been born in that nature.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: mdzad de zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mdzad de zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Having done, etc.

original: ston pa po dang / bstan pa dang / bstan par bya ba'i bdag nyid gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la byed pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: ston pa po dang / bstan pa dang / bstan par bya ba'i bdag nyid gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la byed pa'i phyir ro//
translated: because of the activity in the mind-streams of the disciples, which has the nature of the teacher, the teaching, and the taught.

original: gsang ba 'dus pa zhes pa ni gsang ba rnams sbyor bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba 'dus pa zhes pa ni gsang ba rnams sbyor bar byed pa'o //
translated: The Guhyasamaja is the one who joins the secrets.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed bya'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang / bskyed par gsungs pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed bya'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang / bskyed par gsungs pa de de bzhin no //
translated: The consecration of the samadhi mandala is the teaching of the mandala to be generated by samadhi, and the generation is said to be just so.

original: drad ba'i don dang / des pa'i don gyi bshad pa ni 'dir blta bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: drad ba'i don dang / des pa'i don gyi bshad pa ni 'dir blta bar mi bya'o //
translated: The explanation of the literal meaning and the hidden meaning should not be seen here.

original: glegs bam las bsdu ba'i don gyi tshig rnam par dbye ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas rnam par bshad pas bcug par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: glegs bam las bsdu ba'i don gyi tshig rnam par dbye ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas rnam par bshad pas bcug par blta bar bya'o //
translated: The explanation should be seen as inserted following the analysis of the words of the collected meaning in the book.

original: 'di lta ste thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is like this: everything, etc.

original: gsang chen las zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gsang chen las zhes pa ste /
translated: From the great secret,

original: 'dir yang gsang chen ni kun rdzob ba dang / don dam pa'i bden @63a * //
analyzed: 'dir yang gsang chen ni kun rdzob ba dang / don dam pa'i bden @63a * //
translated: here also the great secret is the conventional and ultimate truths.

original: pa gnyis po'i mtshan nyid zung 'jug gi ngo por gzigs shing khong du chud nas de'i bdag nyid kyi mthar thug par bzhugs pa 'bras bu'i ngo bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: pa gnyis po'i mtshan nyid zung 'jug gi ngo por gzigs shing khong du chud nas de'i bdag nyid kyi mthar thug par bzhugs pa 'bras bu'i ngo bor gyur pa'o //
translated: Having seen and comprehended the nature of the two realities as the essence of union, he abides in the ultimate nature of that, which is the essence of the result.

original: phyung ba ni thugs la'o //
analyzed: phyung ba ni thugs la'o //
translated: He has drawn it into his mind.

original: 'dir zhes pa sdar bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dir zhes pa sdar bzhin no //
translated: Here means in the tantra.

original: yongs su dag pa dang yongs su ma dag pa'i zhes pa ni 'dir bshad pa la yongs su dag pa tsam bshad de /
analyzed: yongs su dag pa dang yongs su ma dag pa'i zhes pa ni 'dir bshad pa la yongs su dag pa tsam bshad de /
translated: Pure and impure means that here only the pure is explained.

original: drang ba'i don la ni yongs su ma dag pa'i bshad pa brjod pa ma yin nam zhen /
analyzed: drang ba'i don la ni yongs su ma dag pa'i bshad pa brjod pa ma yin nam zhen /
translated: But isn’t the impure also explained in the provisional meaning?

original: bden ta 'on kyang yongs su ma dag pa bsdus pa ston par byed pa'i don du'o //🔽rdzogs pa 'di nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ni bden te /
analyzed: bden ta 'on kyang yongs su ma dag pa bsdus pa ston par byed pa'i don du'o // rdzogs pa 'di nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ni bden te /
translated: That is true, but it is in order to show the teaching that includes the impure.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This very perfection is pure, because it is the nature of the complete.

original: thog mar gsungs pa yang /🔽sku gsum dag ni tha dad par //
analyzed: thog mar gsungs pa yang / sku gsum dag ni tha dad par //
translated: The first is taught:🔽The protector taught the three bodies

original: skyob ba yis ni gang bstan pa //
analyzed: skyob ba yis ni gang bstan pa //
translated: as distinct.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of the completion stage,

original: gcig tu yang ni 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: gcig tu yang ni 'gyur ba yin //
translated: It is also one.

original: zhes so // gang yang le'u'i don nyid la 'di de la ltos nas 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes so // gang yang le'u'i don nyid la 'di de la ltos nas 'di gsungs so //
translated: And also, in the very meaning of the chapter, this is said in dependence on that.

original: gang 'dir bshad pa ma yin pa de'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang 'dir bshad pa ma yin pa de'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: And that which is not explained here is said in dependence on that.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: gos ni ji ltar bdag nyid ni lus so //
analyzed: gos ni ji ltar bdag nyid ni lus so //
translated: Cloth is like the body.

original: ci byed ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci byed ce na gsungs pa /
translated: What does it do? It is said:

original: mchu sbrang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mchu sbrang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mouth is a bee, etc.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di zhes pa gal te yang sngar bshad pa'i don mchog tu 'dzin pa de bzhin du rgyud kyi don zhes mngon par brjod pa'i phyir zhes 'chad par 'gyur pa yang 'dir //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di zhes pa gal te yang sngar bshad pa'i don mchog tu 'dzin pa de bzhin du rgyud kyi don zhes mngon par brjod pa'i phyir zhes 'chad par 'gyur pa yang 'dir //
translated: And so on means that if one holds the previously explained meaning to be supreme, then the meaning of the tantra is also explained as the expression of that.

original: gsal bar byed pas yang dag par bdag nyid nye bar skyob bo //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pas yang dag par bdag nyid nye bar skyob bo //
translated: Here, it is clarified that the self is truly protected.

original: ci byed ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci byed ce na gsungs pa /
translated: What does it do? It is said:

original: nyon mongs pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Afflictions, etc.

original: 'dis de'i chos can 'dis so //
analyzed: 'dis de'i chos can 'dis so //
translated: By this, it has that attribute.

original: gos dang 'dra bas gos zhes pa ni rgyud kyi don to //
analyzed: gos dang 'dra bas gos zhes pa ni rgyud kyi don to //
translated: Cloth-like is cloth, the meaning of the tantra.

original: 'dzin par byed do //🔽sbyin par byed do zhes pa lam gyi bdag nyid can nam //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed do // sbyin par byed do zhes pa lam gyi bdag nyid can nam //
translated: It is the illuminator.🔽It is the giver.

original: 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can de dag gi rjod par byed pa'o zhes gsal bar ro //🔽sgron ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sgron ma dang 'dra bas sgron ma ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can de dag gi rjod par byed pa'o zhes gsal bar ro // sgron ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sgron ma dang 'dra bas sgron ma ste /
translated: It is the expounder of those which are of the nature of the path or of the result.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi don gyis gdul bya'i blo'i mun par gsang ba 'dus pa gsal bar byed pa po yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi don gyis gdul bya'i blo'i mun par gsang ba 'dus pa gsal bar byed pa po yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: In the Lamp Illuminating the Meaning of the Tantra, the Lamp is like a lamp because it illuminates the secret assembly for the darkness of the minds of the disciples by means of the meaning of the explanatory tantra.🔽The meaning of the explanatory tantra is the clear and connected teaching of the meaning of the assembly.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi don de ni 'dus pa'i don gsal zhing 'brel par rab tu ston par byed do zhes pas sgron ma gsal bar byed pa 'di rgya cher bshad pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi don de ni 'dus pa'i don gsal zhing 'brel par rab tu ston par byed do zhes pas sgron ma gsal bar byed pa 'di rgya cher bshad pa'o //
translated: Thus, this Lamp Illuminating the Meaning is the extensive explanation.

original: dang po'i sgra ni 'di gtso bo'i don to //
analyzed: dang po'i sgra ni 'di gtso bo'i don to //
translated: The word “first” has the meaning of primary.

original: mtha' drug gi @63b bshad pa zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi tshig gi don drug dang bshad pa rnam pa bzhi gsungs pa 'dis 'dir gsal bar byas so zhes 'brel ba ston par byed do //
analyzed: mtha' drug gi @63b bshad pa zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi tshig gi don drug dang bshad pa rnam pa bzhi gsungs pa 'dis 'dir gsal bar byas so zhes 'brel ba ston par byed do //
translated: The phrase the explanation of the six parameters indicates that the six topics of the Bhagavān and the four kinds of explanation are clarified here.

original: thams cad ces pa ni sngar gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces pa ni sngar gsungs pa'o //
translated: The word all refers to what was said previously.

original: bskyed nas zhes pa 'dis so sor bskyed pa'i sgo nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung mthar thug par byas pa la ltos pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: bskyed nas zhes pa 'dis so sor bskyed pa'i sgo nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung mthar thug par byas pa la ltos pa'i tshig go //
translated: The word having generated indicates that the Bhagavān's speech is dependent on the ultimate, in the sense of being generated individually.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid kyis gsal bar byed pa'i don du byang chub kyi sems skyed par byed pa'i le'u ni byang chub sems kyi le'u'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid kyis gsal bar byed pa'i don du byang chub kyi sems skyed par byed pa'i le'u ni byang chub sems kyi le'u'o //
translated: The chapter that generates the thought of awakening is the chapter on the thought of awakening, because it generates the thought of awakening, in the sense of clarifying the stage of completion by means of the stage of completion.

original: bcom ldan 'das la zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la'o //
translated: The word Bhagavān refers to Mahāvajradhara.

original: gsol to zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: gsol to zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: The word requested refers to Akṣobhya and the other tathāgatas.

original: ji ltar ci zhig gsol zhe na gsungs pa sku zhes pa la sogs pa ste mchod pa zhes pa la sogs pas ma 'ongs pa'i slob ma dang slob dpon gyi tha snyad kyi 'brel pa 'di bstan pas ston par byed do //
analyzed: ji ltar ci zhig gsol zhe na gsungs pa sku zhes pa la sogs pa ste mchod pa zhes pa la sogs pas ma 'ongs pa'i slob ma dang slob dpon gyi tha snyad kyi 'brel pa 'di bstan pas ston par byed do //
translated: How and what is it offered? It is said, “body, etc.” and by “worship” and so on, this connection of the terms disciple and teacher is taught.

original: snying po ni nyams pa med pa'o //
analyzed: snying po ni nyams pa med pa'o //
translated: The essence is the indestructible.

original: 'dir rgyu gsungs pa thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir rgyu gsungs pa thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Here the cause is stated: “all” and so on.

original: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dag las bskyed par bya ba dang / skyes pa gang yin pa ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dag las bskyed par bya ba dang / skyes pa gang yin pa ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever is produced from the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience is destroyed.

original: slar yang sgrib pa gnyis pho med pa gang yin pa de ni skyes pa dang 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: slar yang sgrib pa gnyis pho med pa gang yin pa de ni skyes pa dang 'gal ba med do //
translated: And again, whatever is produced from the two obstructions is not incompatible with production.

original: de'i phyir snying po brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir snying po brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the essence should be stated.

original: de yang byang chub kyi sems ni sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
analyzed: de yang byang chub kyi sems ni sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
translated: And that is the thought of enlightenment, which is body, speech, and mind.

original: 'dir rigs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dir rigs pa gsungs pa /
translated: Here the reasoning is stated:

original: mi phyed pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mi phyed pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “indivisible,” etc.

original: gal te kha nyid dam lus la brten nas sems dang tshig 'jug pa de'i tshe lus la sogs pa rnams mi phyed pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te kha nyid dam lus la brten nas sems dang tshig 'jug pa de'i tshe lus la sogs pa rnams mi phyed pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: If mind and speech were to engage in terms of just the mouth or the body, then the body and so forth would not be indivisible.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i gsung las ye shes kyi sku ni 'dir phyag gnyis pa zhal gcig pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i gsung las ye shes kyi sku ni 'dir phyag gnyis pa zhal gcig pa ste /
translated: Therefore, because of being the very essence of Akṣobhya, the gnosis body is here [described as] two-armed and one-faced.

original: de dang 'di dag byang chub kyi sems mchog ste /
analyzed: de dang 'di dag byang chub kyi sems mchog ste /
translated: Those and these are the supreme thought of enlightenment.

original: rgyu ni 'od gsal lo //
analyzed: rgyu ni 'od gsal lo //
translated: The cause is clear light.

original: 'bras bur nye bar gdags pa ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes kyi sku nye bar gdags pa la ste /
analyzed: 'bras bur nye bar gdags pa ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes kyi sku nye bar gdags pa la ste /
translated: The designation as the result is the designation of the completely pure gnosis body,

original: 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro zhes mngon par dgongs so //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro zhes mngon par dgongs so //
translated: because of being clear light.

original: bya ba la sogs zhes pa la /
analyzed: bya ba la sogs zhes pa la /
translated: With “action and so forth,”

original: sogs pa'i sgra las rtogs pa la sogs pa yongs su gzung ste /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgra las rtogs pa la sogs pa yongs su gzung ste /
translated: and so forth includes realization and so forth.

original: rnam par rtog pa sa bsams par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa sa bsams par gyur pa'o //
translated: It is imagined by conceptuality.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is just the sound.

original: sems zhes bya ba la sogs bas rtog pa'i rnal 'byor du gsungs pa'i zhal gsum @64a * //
analyzed: sems zhes bya ba la sogs bas rtog pa'i rnal 'byor du gsungs pa'i zhal gsum @64a * //
translated: With “mind” and so forth, it is said to be the yoga of imagination.

original: pa phyag drug pa'am /
analyzed: pa phyag drug pa'am /
translated: The six-armed Bhairava,

original: 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'am /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'am /
translated: or born in the continuum of migrating beings,

original: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje nyid kyis nges pa'am /
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje nyid kyis nges pa'am /
translated: or ascertained by the vajra of the body, etc.

original: sbrul pa'i skur mngon par brjod pa'o //
analyzed: sbrul pa'i skur mngon par brjod pa'o //
translated: , or expressed as the emanation body.

original: da ni mngon par brjod pa 'di'i sku la sogs pa rnams stod pa nyid kyi rnam pas dmigs par bya ba yongs su dag pa nyid bskyed pa'i don du gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni mngon par brjod pa 'di'i sku la sogs pa rnams stod pa nyid kyi rnam pas dmigs par bya ba yongs su dag pa nyid bskyed pa'i don du gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to generate the purity of the object of observation by the aspect of praising the body, etc. of this expression, he says:

original: sku zhes pa la sogs pa ste drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: sku zhes pa la sogs pa ste drang ba'i don to //
translated: body and so forth, which is interpretable in meaning.

original: ye shes kyi sku'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi sku'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: With respect to the exalted body of exalted wisdom, he says:

original: skyed cig pa ni /
analyzed: skyed cig pa ni /
translated: generate and so forth.

original: yid kyi rang bzhin gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems las byung pa rnams sems kyi gnas skabs kyi khyad par nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: yid kyi rang bzhin gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems las byung pa rnams sems kyi gnas skabs kyi khyad par nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Mental nature and so forth. Because the mental factors are just the special states of the mind,

original: sems byung yang sems kyi sgras brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: sems byung yang sems kyi sgras brjod par bya ste /
translated: the mental factors are also to be expressed by the word mind.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, he says:

original: sems gsum po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sems gsum po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: the three minds and so forth.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rnam pas ni yongs su dag pas so //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rnam pas ni yongs su dag pas so //
translated: By the aspect of the enjoyment body, it is pure.

original: sems nyid yin no zhes pa ni gang sems rang bzhin med pa dang / phung po'i rnam pa bzhin no zhes pa ni gang sems rang bzhin med pa dang / phung po'i rnam pa bzhin no zhes pa de'i phyir lus sems su 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sems nyid yin no zhes pa ni gang sems rang bzhin med pa dang / phung po'i rnam pa bzhin no zhes pa ni gang sems rang bzhin med pa dang / phung po'i rnam pa bzhin no zhes pa de'i phyir lus sems su 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: “The mind itself” is that which is the absence of intrinsic reality of the mind. “Like the form of the aggregates” is that which is the absence of intrinsic reality of the mind. “Therefore, the body is not the mind.”

original: lus sems kyi rnam pas zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku yang rus pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyis rnam rig tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus sems kyi rnam pas zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku yang rus pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyis rnam rig tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “By the form of the body and mind” is that the emanation body is also mere consciousness, because it is the result of consciousness, by the nature of bones, etc.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: med ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: med ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Non-existent” and so forth.

original: don bzhin du yul rnam par gnon pa la nye bar dmigs pa yang tshig tu brjod pa sems nyid de'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir sems so //
analyzed: don bzhin du yul rnam par gnon pa la nye bar dmigs pa yang tshig tu brjod pa sems nyid de'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir sems so //
translated: The mind is that which is the form of the mind, because it is the observation of the object in accordance with the meaning, and the verbal expression is the form of the mind.

original: dag pa'i rab tu sbyor ba 'di gsungs pa /
analyzed: dag pa'i rab tu sbyor ba 'di gsungs pa /
translated: This application of purity is stated:

original: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Thus” and so forth.

original: gcig tu byas nas zhes pa ni rtag tu de skye ba dang / 'gag par so sor brtag par byas pas sam /
analyzed: gcig tu byas nas zhes pa ni rtag tu de skye ba dang / 'gag par so sor brtag par byas pas sam /
translated: Having made them one means that one should always examine the arising and cessation of the mind.

original: bla ma'i man ngag las so //
analyzed: bla ma'i man ngag las so //
translated: Or, it is from the instructions of the guru.

original: khams gsum pa la ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na'am /
analyzed: khams gsum pa la ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na'am /
translated: The three realms are the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.

original: de'i bdag nyid can gyi sku la sogs pa na'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can gyi sku la sogs pa na'o //
translated: Or, it is the body, etc. that has that nature.

original: rang srog ni brjod ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rmi lam rnam shes so //
analyzed: rang srog ni brjod ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rmi lam rnam shes so //
translated: One's life is the consciousness of dreams that has the characteristic of expression.

original: mthong bar 'gyur zhes pa ni ting ting ma yin bar 'gyur ro zhes pas ting la aa bya ta+ya ya:'o //
analyzed: mthong bar 'gyur zhes pa ni ting ting ma yin bar 'gyur ro zhes pas ting la aa bya ta+ya ya:'o //
translated: One will see means that one will not be deluded.

original: rang grong ni rang gi phung po'o //
analyzed: rang grong ni rang gi phung po'o //
translated: One's town is one's own aggregates.

original: snang ba ni 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba ni 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Appearance is endowed with the five lights.

original: skyes bu zhes pa skyes bu'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu zhes pa skyes bu'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The person is the form of the person.

original: rlung zhes pa rlung gi khams cad ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rlung zhes pa rlung gi khams cad ldan pa'o //
translated: The winds are the elements of the winds.

original: khams gsum pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pa'i khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can nam /
analyzed: khams gsum pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pa'i khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can nam /
translated: The three realms are the desire realm, etc., which have the nature of the three realms.

original: lus la sogs pa'i bdag nyid @64b can no //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa'i bdag nyid @64b can no //
translated: Or, they have the nature of the body, etc.

original: khams gsum pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: khams gsum pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: The three realms, etc.

original: gzhan ni rnam shes las tha dad pa gzhan no //
analyzed: gzhan ni rnam shes las tha dad pa gzhan no //
translated: Other than consciousness, is different from consciousness.

original: mchog tu ni tshul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: mchog tu ni tshul du byung ba'o //
translated: Supremely, in the manner of arising.

original: de ni snying por gyur pa yongs su dag par yod do //
analyzed: de ni snying por gyur pa yongs su dag par yod do //
translated: That is the essence, existing as pure.

original: rmi lam ni rmi lam dang 'dra bas te rmi lam ni ji ltar rlung la brten nas rmi lam nas gzhan du song ste mi'i ris mthun pa'i phung po dang lha'i gnas dang yul gzhan du song ste /
analyzed: rmi lam ni rmi lam dang 'dra bas te rmi lam ni ji ltar rlung la brten nas rmi lam nas gzhan du song ste mi'i ris mthun pa'i phung po dang lha'i gnas dang yul gzhan du song ste /
translated: A dream is like a dream. Just as in a dream, based on the wind, one goes from a dream to another place, and sees oneself in the midst of a human realm, in a divine abode, or in another country,

original: rnam par bkra zhing rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i yul la sogs pa'i nang du mthong bar bdag nyid mthong bar byed do //
analyzed: rnam par bkra zhing rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i yul la sogs pa'i nang du mthong bar bdag nyid mthong bar byed do //
translated: with various colors and various objects, etc.

original: de bzhin nyid du rmi lam rlung ni rnam par shes pa rlung ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du rmi lam rlung ni rnam par shes pa rlung ngo //
translated: In the same way, the wind of a dream is the wind of consciousness.

original: khams gsum pa lus la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can du rnal 'byor pas mthong bar byed do //
analyzed: khams gsum pa lus la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can du rnal 'byor pas mthong bar byed do //
translated: The yogi sees the three realms as having the nature of the body, etc.

original: khams gsum pa las ni snang ba gsum pa las so //
analyzed: khams gsum pa las ni snang ba gsum pa las so //
translated: From the three realms, from the three appearances.

original: gzhan ni gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni gzhan pa'o //
translated: Other than that, is different from that.

original: de nyid ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: That itself is clear light.

original: gcig tu ste skad cig gcig tu'o //
analyzed: gcig tu ste skad cig gcig tu'o //
translated: In one way, that is, in one instant.

original: myur du ste de nyid kyi phyir bskal pa grangs med pa gsum la ltos pas so //
analyzed: myur du ste de nyid kyi phyir bskal pa grangs med pa gsum la ltos pas so //
translated: Swiftly, because it is in relation to three incalculable aeons.

original: dngos grub ni ldang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub ni ldang bar byed pa'o //
translated: The power is the arousal.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: The definitive meaning.

original: don 'di nyid byang chub sems kyi phan yon gyi sgo nas gsungs pa /🔽kun du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: don 'di nyid byang chub sems kyi phan yon gyi sgo nas gsungs pa / kun du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: This very meaning is stated by way of the benefit of the Thought of Enlightenment:

original: kun du ni 'khor ba dang myang ngan las 'das pa thams cad du'o //🔽de dag tu yang gnas pa dang / 'gro bar byas nas rab tu 'jug pa la tshar gcod pa dang rjes su 'dzin pa la sogs pa mdzes pas na bzang po'o //🔽dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: kun du ni 'khor ba dang myang ngan las 'das pa thams cad du'o // de dag tu yang gnas pa dang / 'gro bar byas nas rab tu 'jug pa la tshar gcod pa dang rjes su 'dzin pa la sogs pa mdzes pas na bzang po'o // dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The good, the all-pervading, the omnipresent, the all-embracing,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir bdag nyid kyi lus so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir bdag nyid kyi lus so //
translated: the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-pervading, the all-embracing, the all-perv

original: dngos po med ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyis ston par byed pa gang yin pa de'o //
analyzed: dngos po med ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyis ston par byed pa gang yin pa de'o //
translated: The one who teaches with the verses beginning with “non-entity” and so on.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid gsal bar byed do zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid gsal bar byed do zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The one who illuminates this very samādhi.

original: thog ma dang tha mar mngon par brjod pa'i gnas skabs kyi bshad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha mar mngon par brjod pa'i gnas skabs kyi bshad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the explanation of the state of verbal expression at the beginning and end.

original: slar yang dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Again, it is not the intended meaning.

original: brtan pa dang g-yo ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni dgongs pa ma yin pa'i don la bshad pa rnam pa bzhes 'chad par 'dod nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: brtan pa dang g-yo ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni dgongs pa ma yin pa'i don la bshad pa rnam pa bzhes 'chad par 'dod nas gsungs pa /
translated: The explanation of “the stable and the moving” and so on is the four types of explanations of the non-intended meaning.

original: dngos po med pa sgom pa med //
analyzed: dngos po med pa sgom pa med //
translated: Non-entity is not meditation.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: And so on.

original: 'jig pa'i dus bzhin du yod bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir dang / yongs su rdzogs par gnas pa'i dus lta bur de yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i dus bzhin du yod bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir dang / yongs su rdzogs par gnas pa'i dus lta bur de yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because of existing as it is at the time of destruction, and because it does not exist at the time of complete abiding.

original: de'i sgom pa @65a * //
analyzed: de'i sgom pa @65a * //
translated: Its meditation

original: ngo bo nyid kyis nye bar skyes par gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis nye bar skyes par gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: does not arise by its own nature.

original: yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the words.

original: bsal nas zhes pa ni rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes kyis sgom par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: bsal nas zhes pa ni rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes kyis sgom par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis kyang ngo //
translated: Having removed, by the wisdom of thorough differentiation, the nature of meditation.

original: 'dus byas ni rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa lam gsum pa can gyi phung po dang khams la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'dus byas ni rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa lam gsum pa can gyi phung po dang khams la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The compounded is the aggregates, elements, etc. of the three paths, which are born from causes and conditions.

original: 'dus ma byas ni nam mkha' dang 'gog pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas ni nam mkha' dang 'gog pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The uncompounded is space, cessation, etc.

original: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa lta ba yin no zhes pa ni /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa lta ba yin no zhes pa ni /
translated: The view is the adherence to emptiness.

original: rgyal ba rnams kyi stong ba nyid //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi stong ba nyid //
translated: The Victorious Ones have said that emptiness

original: lta kun nges par 'byung bar gsungs //
analyzed: lta kun nges par 'byung bar gsungs //
translated: is the departure from all views.

original: gang dag stong ba nyid lta ba //
analyzed: gang dag stong ba nyid lta ba //
translated: Those who hold emptiness as a view

original: de ni sgrub pa med par gsungs //
analyzed: de ni sgrub pa med par gsungs //
translated: have been called incurable.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de'i phyir 'di las mngon par zhen pa gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di las mngon par zhen pa gtang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should abandon adherence to this.

original: 'dis don dam pa'i bden pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis don dam pa'i bden pa gsungs so //
translated: This is the teaching of ultimate truth.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: The teaching of the stage of generation is as follows:

original: mtshan ma zhes pa la sogs pa se mtshan ma ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma zhes pa la sogs pa se mtshan ma ni rgyu'o //
translated: The so-called sign is the cause.

original: 'bras bu'i skyed par bed pa po ni rgyun don dam par gsungs pa las gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i skyed par bed pa po ni rgyun don dam par gsungs pa las gzhan ma yin no //
translated: The effect is not other than the producer of the effect, which is the cause.

original: 'bras bu ni gzugs dang lus gnyis so //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni gzugs dang lus gnyis so //
translated: The effect is the two, form and body.

original: de dag la mngon par zhen pa ni mngon par chags pa'o //
analyzed: de dag la mngon par zhen pa ni mngon par chags pa'o //
translated: Attachment to them is clinging.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro ni dngos po de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu dang tha dad du gyur ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro ni dngos po de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu dang tha dad du gyur ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the nonduality of cause and effect, the effect is not different from the cause.

original: 'dis bskyed pa'i rim pa la yang rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gnyis su med pa nyid du ston par byed do //
analyzed: 'dis bskyed pa'i rim pa la yang rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gnyis su med pa nyid du ston par byed do //
translated: This also shows the nonduality of cause and effect in the stage of generation.

original: smon lam ni lha mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas de'i mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'dod pa rnams kyi smon lam mo //
analyzed: smon lam ni lha mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas de'i mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'dod pa rnams kyi smon lam mo //
translated: Vow is the vow of those who desire the desired objects of the deity worship that precedes it.

original: sgom pa bems po'i khyad par mngon par 'dod pas 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: sgom pa bems po'i khyad par mngon par 'dod pas 'jug pa'am /
translated: Meditation is the engagement of the desire for the special inanimate objects.

original: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu khyad par mngon par 'dod pas 'jug pa yang rung ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu khyad par mngon par 'dod pas 'jug pa yang rung ste /
translated: Or else, one engages in generosity, etc. with the desire for a special result.

original: sbyin pa la sogs pa la smon par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs pa la smon par byed pa'o //
translated: One aspires to generosity, etc.

original: 'dir yang gang sbyin pa la sogs pa nye bar brjod pa gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang gang sbyin pa la sogs pa nye bar brjod pa gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Here, one should understand that generosity, etc. is taught because it is mentioned.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: And it is said:

original: nyi ma stong par mi bya bar /
analyzed: nyi ma stong par mi bya bar /
translated: One should not be a sun without light,

original: chung du can yang sbyin pa nyid //
analyzed: chung du can yang sbyin pa nyid //
translated: but rather a small light giving.

original: ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so on.

original: 'dis bskyed pa'i rim pa yang smon pa la sogs pa med par ston par byed do //
analyzed: 'dis bskyed pa'i rim pa yang smon pa la sogs pa med par ston par byed do //
translated: This also teaches that the stage generated is without aspiration, etc.

original: gang zhig mtshan ma la sogs ba mngon par zhen pa med pa des zhes pa la sogs pa'i ste /
analyzed: gang zhig mtshan ma la sogs ba mngon par zhen pa med pa des zhes pa la sogs pa'i ste /
translated: One who is without attachment to signs, etc. thinks that and so on.

original: bsags pa'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyi phyir sems te rnam par rtog pa tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir de bzhin du gang rang dang rang nyid stong par rtog par byed do //
analyzed: bsags pa'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyi phyir sems te rnam par rtog pa tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir de bzhin du gang rang dang rang nyid stong par rtog par byed do //
translated: The mind is only conceptual thought because it has the nature of accumulation. Thus, one should think that that is empty of itself.

original: @65b de'i phyir sa bon la sogs pa'i rim pas lha'i bdag nyid can gyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: @65b de'i phyir sa bon la sogs pa'i rim pas lha'i bdag nyid can gyi bdag nyid do //
translated: Therefore, by the sequence of seed, etc., it is the self which is the nature of the deity.

original: spyi'i don to //
analyzed: spyi'i don to //
translated: The general meaning.

original: sems tsam de dngos bo med de rnam par ma dag pa ni dngos por mngon par zhen pa yod pa nyid kyis rnam par ma dag pa ste /
analyzed: sems tsam de dngos bo med de rnam par ma dag pa ni dngos por mngon par zhen pa yod pa nyid kyis rnam par ma dag pa ste /
translated: That mind-only is unreal, because of the existence of the attachment to the reality of the impure.

original: kun du 'khor bar byed pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: kun du 'khor bar byed pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the cause of the production of the cycle of existence.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: rtag tu med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
analyzed: rtag tu med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
translated: Because it is always unreal.

original: gzhan du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan du yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said elsewhere:

original: ci'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa rnam pa ram dag pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa rnam pa ram dag pa lags /
translated: Why are form, etc. impure?

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the existence of subject and object.

original: de rnams kyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ci lags /
analyzed: de rnams kyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ci lags /
translated: What is the subject and object of those?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: mig gis gzung bar bya ba ni gzugs so //
analyzed: mig gis gzung bar bya ba ni gzugs so //
translated: Form is that which is grasped by the eye.

original: rna ba la sogs pa rnams kyis sgra la sogs pa la gzung bar bya /
analyzed: rna ba la sogs pa rnams kyis sgra la sogs pa la gzung bar bya /
translated: Sound, etc. are grasped by the ear, etc.

original: brten par bya'o //
analyzed: brten par bya'o //
translated: They are to be relied upon.

original: 'di dag dug med pa can du byas nas bsten pas dag par gyur ba'o zhes so //
analyzed: 'di dag dug med pa can du byas nas bsten pas dag par gyur ba'o zhes so //
translated: By relying on them without poison, they become pure.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba nyid rnam par shes par brjod par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba nyid rnam par shes par brjod par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t the absence of subject and object said to be consciousness?

original: de ci ltar gzung ba la sogs pa yod pas rnam par ma dag pa yin zhen bden te /
analyzed: de ci ltar gzung ba la sogs pa yod pas rnam par ma dag pa yin zhen bden te /
translated: How can it be impure because of the existence of subject and object?

original: 'on kyang de'ang snang ba gsum du snang bas mig la sogs pa lnga po la brten pa gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang de'ang snang ba gsum du snang bas mig la sogs pa lnga po la brten pa gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: It is true, but it is based on the five such as eye, and it has form, etc., as its object, because it appears in the three appearances.

original: de lta mod kyi snang ba gsum rnam par dag pas gzugs la sogs pa dang bral ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / mig la sogs pa lnga po rnams kyis bon ma yin par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi snang ba gsum rnam par dag pas gzugs la sogs pa dang bral ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / mig la sogs pa lnga po rnams kyis bon ma yin par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: However, it is free from form, etc., because the three appearances are pure, and it is not the object of the five such as eye, because it is not form, etc.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: ye shes gsum la lnga yang dag par bsten zhes so //
analyzed: ye shes gsum la lnga yang dag par bsten zhes so //
translated: The five are well-established in the three wisdoms.

original: de lta mod kyi gzung ba la sogs pa med pa nyid kyis rnam par dag go //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi gzung ba la sogs pa med pa nyid kyis rnam par dag go //
translated: However, it is pure because of the absence of subject and object, etc.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: rtsa ba srid pa'i rnam shes te //
analyzed: rtsa ba srid pa'i rnam shes te //
translated: The root is the consciousness of existence.

original: yul ni de yi spyod yul lo //
analyzed: yul ni de yi spyod yul lo //
translated: The object is its domain.

original: yul la bdag med de mthong la //
analyzed: yul la bdag med de mthong la //
translated: When the object is seen to be selfless,

original: srid pa'i sa bon dgag par bya //
analyzed: srid pa'i sa bon dgag par bya //
translated: The seed of existence is stopped.

original: zhes so // 'di'i don 'di yin te /
analyzed: zhes so // 'di'i don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: rang gi dang nyid kyis mig la sogs pa dang / snang ba yid la byed pa dang / yul phan tshun nye bar byas pa la ltos nas mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: rang gi dang nyid kyis mig la sogs pa dang / snang ba yid la byed pa dang / yul phan tshun nye bar byas pa la ltos nas mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ste /
translated: In dependence on the eye, etc., themselves, the appearance, the attention, and the mutual approximation of the object, the consciousness of the eye, etc., arises.🔽Therefore,

original: de'i phyir / gang rnams rten cing 'brel par 'byung //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gang rnams rten cing 'brel par 'byung //
translated: Whatever is dependently arisen

original: de rnams rang bzhin cung zad med //
analyzed: de rnams rang bzhin cung zad med //
translated: Is explained to be empty.

original: de'i phyir mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa med na /
analyzed: de'i phyir mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa med na /
translated: Therefore, if one is not attached to the consciousness of the eye, etc.,🔽there is no apprehended object, etc.

original: gzung ba la sogs pa med pa de'i phyir /🔽srid pa'i sa @66a* //
analyzed: gzung ba la sogs pa med pa de'i phyir / srid pa'i sa @66a* //
translated: Therefore,

original: bon 'gag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bon 'gag par 'gyur ro //
translated: the seed of existence is stopped.

original: gzung ba la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa med na /
analyzed: gzung ba la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa med na /
translated: If one is not attached to the apprehended object, etc.,

original: skye ba'i las nye bar len pa med pa'i phyir dang / byas pa yang zad pa'i phyir skye ba zad do zhes so //
analyzed: skye ba'i las nye bar len pa med pa'i phyir dang / byas pa yang zad pa'i phyir skye ba zad do zhes so //
translated: Because there is no appropriation of the karma of birth, and because the karma that has been done is exhausted, birth is exhausted.

original: nyer len med pa'i me bzhin du //
analyzed: nyer len med pa'i me bzhin du //
translated: Like a fire without fuel,

original: nyer len med par mya ngan 'da' //
analyzed: nyer len med par mya ngan 'da' //
translated: one passes into nirvāṇa without appropriation.🔽Now, in terms of the illusion-like consciousness that is the cause of impure appearances, it is said:🔽Because it is not pure,🔽because it is not meditation,🔽because it is illusion-like,

original: zhes so // da ni rnam par ma dag pa'i snang ba'i rgyur sgyu ma lta bu'i shes pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // da ni rnam par ma dag pa'i snang ba'i rgyur sgyu ma lta bu'i shes pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: because it is nondual,🔽because it is the ultimate,🔽because it is the basis of everything,🔽because it is the cause of everything,🔽because it is the result of everything,🔽because it is the nature of everything,🔽because it is the end of everything,

original: gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: because it is the beginning of everything,🔽because it is the middle of everything,🔽because it is the basis of everything,🔽because it is the cause of everything,🔽because it is the result of everything,🔽because it is the nature of everything,🔽because it is the end of everything,🔽because it is the beginning of everything,

original: rnam par ma dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ni the tshom gyi bag chags bsal ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par ma dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ni the tshom gyi bag chags bsal ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the middle of everything,🔽because it is the basis of everything,🔽because it is the cause of everything,🔽because it is the result of everything,

original: bsgom pa ma yin par 'gyur na don dam par rang bzhin brdzun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgom pa ma yin par 'gyur na don dam par rang bzhin brdzun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of everything,🔽because it is the end of everything,🔽because it is the beginning of everything,

original: sgyu ma lta bu de ni zhes pa don dam pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu de ni zhes pa don dam pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: because it is the middle of everything,🔽because it is the basis of everything,🔽because it is the cause of everything,🔽because it is the result of everything,🔽because it is the nature of everything,🔽because it is the end of everything,🔽because it is the beginning of everything,🔽because it is the middle of everything,🔽because it is the basis of everything,🔽because it is the cause of everything,🔽because it is the result of everything,

original: gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of everything,🔽because it is the end of everything,🔽because it is the beginning of everything,🔽because it is the middle of everything,🔽because it is the basis of everything,

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: because it is the cause of everything,🔽because it is the result of everything,🔽because it is the nature of everything,🔽because it is the end of everything,🔽because it is the beginning of everything,🔽because it is the middle of everything,🔽because it is the basis of everything,🔽because it is the cause of everything,🔽because it is the result of everything,🔽because

original: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, etc.

original: mtha' dag ces bya ba ni bla ma mnyes par thos pa dang / bsam pa la sogs pa bya dka' ba du ma la sogs pas lhag par rtogs par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' dag ces bya ba ni bla ma mnyes par thos pa dang / bsam pa la sogs pa bya dka' ba du ma la sogs pas lhag par rtogs par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The entire, i.e., the supreme knowledge which is to be realized by means of many difficult things such as pleasing the guru, listening, reflection, etc.

original: gang gi stobs rtsam nyid kyis kyang dpag tshad stong phrag kyang de lta bur rab tu rtogs pa ni 'od gsal dang zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi stobs rtsam nyid kyis kyang dpag tshad stong phrag kyang de lta bur rab tu rtogs pa ni 'od gsal dang zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed par bya ste /
translated: That which is to be realized by the power of the strength of the yogin, even though it is a thousand yojanas away, is to be generated by means of the samadhis of clear light and union.

original: de lta bu yang dpal bla ma rdo rje 'chang gi sprul pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub ba lhag par rtogs shing /
analyzed: de lta bu yang dpal bla ma rdo rje 'chang gi sprul pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub ba lhag par rtogs shing /
translated: Such a one is the glorious guru Vajradhara, the emanation of perfect enlightenment, who is realized as supreme.

original: lung bstan pa'i skyes bu'i khyad par gus par bsten pa'i zhabs kyi padma las kyang ngo //
analyzed: lung bstan pa'i skyes bu'i khyad par gus par bsten pa'i zhabs kyi padma las kyang ngo //
translated: And it is also from the lotus feet of the guru who is the special person prophesied by him, who is to be served with devotion.

original: da ni don dam pa'i bden pa la mngon par chags pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa dor bar bya ba'i don du gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni don dam pa'i bden pa la mngon par chags pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa dor bar bya ba'i don du gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to give up attachment for those who are attached to ultimate reality, it is said:

original: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Non-entity” and so on.

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa la mngon par zhen pa yongs su spang ba'i rgyu zhes pa bden pa gnyis su med pa sgrub par byed pa'i don du slar yang ku na rdzob kyi bden pa la 'jug par byed pa mngon par zhen pa yongs su spang ba'i rgyur
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa la mngon par zhen pa yongs su spang ba'i rgyu zhes pa bden pa gnyis su med pa sgrub par byed pa'i don du slar yang ku na rdzob kyi bden pa la 'jug par byed pa mngon par zhen pa yongs su spang ba'i rgyur
translated: The cause for the complete abandonment of attachment to the conventional truth is the non-duality of the two truths. The meaning of the establishment is to engage again in the conventional truth, the cause for the complete abandonment of attachment.

original: zhes bya'o ; ;'dis ni zhes pa la sogs pas bden pa gnyis kyi rgyu can zung 'jug la mngon par zhen pa yongs su spangs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya'o ; ;'dis ni zhes pa la sogs pas bden pa gnyis kyi rgyu can zung 'jug la mngon par zhen pa yongs su spangs pa'o //
translated: “By this” and so on refers to the complete abandonment of attachment to the union that is the cause of the two truths.

original: bden pa gnyis zhes pa la sogs pas mngon par zhen pa'i nyes pa zhar la kun du skyed par byed do //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis zhes pa la sogs pas mngon par zhen pa'i nyes pa zhar la kun du skyed par byed do //
translated: “The two truths” and so on refers to the production of the fault of attachment.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pas mngon par zhen pa'i @66b nyes pa zad pa'i zung 'jug bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pas mngon par zhen pa'i @66b nyes pa zad pa'i zung 'jug bshad pa'o //
translated: “Therefore” and so on explains the union that is the exhaustion of the fault of attachment.

original: mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: mthar thug pa'o //
translated: It is the ultimate.

original: snod du gyur pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas bden pa gnyis po de dag gnyis su med pas kyang de kho na nyid kyi rigs pa gsal bar bstan to //
analyzed: snod du gyur pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas bden pa gnyis po de dag gnyis su med pas kyang de kho na nyid kyi rigs pa gsal bar bstan to //
translated: By in a vessel and so on, he clarifies the reasoning of reality by way of the non-duality of those two truths.

original: mthar thug pa zhes pa thog ma don dam pa'i bden pa 'chad par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mthar thug pa zhes pa thog ma don dam pa'i bden pa 'chad par byed pa'o //
translated: The ultimate is the beginning, which is the explanation of ultimate truth.

original: thog ma'i rab tu dbye bas zung 'jug gis gnyis pa'i 'di'o //
analyzed: thog ma'i rab tu dbye bas zung 'jug gis gnyis pa'i 'di'o //
translated: The initial division is the second by way of union.

original: mig tsam gyi spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin no //
analyzed: mig tsam gyi spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin no //
translated: Because it is the domain of mere eyes, like a reflection in a mirror.

original: sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa'i me long du 'od zer lngas 'bar bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa'i me long du 'od zer lngas 'bar bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is blazing with the five lights in the mirror of illusory emanation.

original: chos nyid kyang med ces pa 'dis 'od gsal ba la mngon par zhen pa med par ston par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: chos nyid kyang med ces pa 'dis 'od gsal ba la mngon par zhen pa med par ston par byed pa yin no //
translated: By there is also no reality, he shows the absence of clinging to clear light.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bden pa gnyis la mngon par zhen pa med ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bden pa gnyis la mngon par zhen pa med ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the absence of clinging to the two truths.

original: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
translated: Now, by and so on, this is the mental state.

original: byang chub tshul ni bden pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub tshul ni bden pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The method of enlightenment is the characteristic of the non-duality of the two truths.

original: byang chub kyi thabs ni rdo rje 'chang chen po mngon du byed pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi thabs ni rdo rje 'chang chen po mngon du byed pa'i thabs so //
translated: The means of enlightenment is the means of actualizing Great Vajradhara.

original: brten pa ni mi phyed pa dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: brten pa ni mi phyed pa dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The support is endowed with indivisibility.

original: de nyid snying po ste bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid snying po ste bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: That itself is the essence, the nature of clear light, which is the characteristic of selflessness.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not the intended meaning.

original: mtshan ma med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is signlessness.

original: dngos po med pa'i rgyu yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i rgyu yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause of non-entity exists.

original: zag pa ni nyon mongs pas rab tu bskyed pa'i rgyu can gyi 'du byed do //
analyzed: zag pa ni nyon mongs pas rab tu bskyed pa'i rgyu can gyi 'du byed do //
translated: Contaminants are formations that are produced by afflictions.

original: de dang lhan cig 'jug go zhes pas zag pa dang bcas pa'o //🔽zag pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa bcom pa /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig 'jug go zhes pas zag pa dang bcas pa'o // zag pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa bcom pa /
translated: They are said to operate together with that, so they are contaminated.🔽The uncontaminated are formations that are destroyed by afflictions.

original: lhan ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lta bu'i 'du byed do //
analyzed: lhan ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lta bu'i 'du byed do //
translated: They are like those who abide in nirvana with remainder.

original: chos zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: chos zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: With dharma and so forth,

original: ma grub na ni dngos po zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: ma grub na ni dngos po zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: if it is not established, the remainder is called an entity.

original: 'di dag nyid kyi don dam pa'i bden pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di dag nyid kyi don dam pa'i bden pa gsungs so //
translated: This is the ultimate truth of these.🔽Now, how?

original: 'o na ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pas de las bzhengs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pas de las bzhengs pa gsungs pa /
translated: He declares the rising from that with “I, etc.”,

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas ni rim pa gsum par gsungs pas so //
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas ni rim pa gsum par gsungs pas so //
translated: because it is said in the third stage by the process of self-consecration.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: sngon gyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sngon gyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Previously, etc.”

original: 'phen pa ni rang byin gyis brlab pas gzhag pa'i 'du byed de /
analyzed: 'phen pa ni rang byin gyis brlab pas gzhag pa'i 'du byed de /
translated: The impetus is the formation placed by self-consecration,

original: gand'i' sgra byin gyis brlabs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gand'i' sgra byin gyis brlabs pa bzhin no //
translated: like the blessing of the sound of the Gandī.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: de nyid kyis ni thams cad du //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni thams cad du //
translated: “By that, everywhere

original: stong nyid mngon du mi bya'o //
analyzed: stong nyid mngon du mi bya'o //
translated: emptiness is not actualized.

original: sangs rgyas kun bdag rnal 'byor ldan //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun bdag rnal 'byor ldan //
translated: The yogi/nī who is the nature of all Buddhas🔽is not a nihilistic view.”

original: zhes so // dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //🔽ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ye shes @67a * //
analyzed: zhes so // dgongs pa ma yin pa'o // ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ye shes @67a * //
translated: This is not the intended meaning.🔽The light rays of intuition, etc.

original: kyi 'od zer ni 'od gsal ba'i ye shes ni gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: kyi 'od zer ni 'od gsal ba'i ye shes ni gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The light rays of intuition are the intuition of clear light, because it is the innate essence.

original: snang ba dang 'dra bas snang ba ste mi shes pa'i mun pa 'joms pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: snang ba dang 'dra bas snang ba ste mi shes pa'i mun pa 'joms pa nyid kyis so //
translated: It is light because it is like light, by virtue of destroying the darkness of ignorance.

original: 'dus byas zhes pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //🔽de ltar don dam pa'i bden pa mngon par brjod nas /
analyzed: 'dus byas zhes pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no // de ltar don dam pa'i bden pa mngon par brjod nas /
translated: The conditioned and so forth are as before.🔽Having thus expressed the ultimate truth,🔽he states the arising from it:🔽Now, the ultimate truth is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.

original: de las ldang bar byed pa gsungs pa /🔽'o na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de las ldang bar byed pa gsungs pa / 'o na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.

original: rang bzhin zhes pa la sogs pas bden pa gnyis mngon par sbyar ba'i ched du de dag gnyis su med pa phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can tshig gi don du gsungs nas /🔽gdod nas dag par ston par byed do //🔽gdod nas dag pa nyid la dpe gsungs pa /🔽nam mkha' bzhin zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes pa la sogs pas bden pa gnyis mngon par sbyar ba'i ched du de dag gnyis su med pa phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can tshig gi don du gsungs nas / gdod nas dag par ston par byed do // gdod nas dag pa nyid la dpe gsungs pa / nam mkha' bzhin zhes pa ste /
translated: It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.🔽It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.

original: ji ltar nam mkha' dang po nyid las sngar dag par ma gyur pa phyis kyang dag par gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha' dang po nyid las sngar dag par ma gyur pa phyis kyang dag par gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not the object of the intellect, because it is beyond the scope of the intellect.

original: zung 'jug gi bdag nyid la yang rnam pa de bzhin nyid du yang ngo //
analyzed: zung 'jug gi bdag nyid la yang rnam pa de bzhin nyid du yang ngo //
translated: The nature of union is also like that.

original: de ltar rang bzhin gyis gdod nas dag gi de bzhin nyid lam ma dag pa dag par 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rang bzhin gyis gdod nas dag gi de bzhin nyid lam ma dag pa dag par 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the suchness that is pure by nature from the beginning does not arise as pure from what is impure.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: yod ces pa dang med ces pa //
analyzed: yod ces pa dang med ces pa //
translated: Existence and nonexistence

original: gnyis ka yang ni mtha' yin te //
analyzed: gnyis ka yang ni mtha' yin te //
translated: are both extremes.

original: dag dang ma dag pa'ang mtha' //
analyzed: dag dang ma dag pa'ang mtha' //
translated: Purity and impurity are also extremes.

original: de phyir mtha' gnyis rnam spangs nas //
analyzed: de phyir mtha' gnyis rnam spangs nas //
translated: Therefore, having abandoned the two extremes,

original: mkhas pa bar la'ang gnas mi byed //
analyzed: mkhas pa bar la'ang gnas mi byed //
translated: the wise do not abide even in the middle.

original: ces so // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: ces so // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, it is said:

original: legs par yongs su zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: legs par yongs su zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: “Well-purified” and so on.

original: byang chub ni don dam pa'i bden ba 'bras bu'i ngo bo ste rang byin gyis brlab pa'i 'bras bu yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub ni don dam pa'i bden ba 'bras bu'i ngo bo ste rang byin gyis brlab pa'i 'bras bu yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Awakening is the essence of the result of ultimate truth because it is the result of self-consecration.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: mngon rtogs ni de thob par byed pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: mngon rtogs ni de thob par byed pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: Realization is the cause of attaining that.

original: bden pa gnyis la mngon par zhen pa med pas zung 'jug gsungs pa /
analyzed: bden pa gnyis la mngon par zhen pa med pas zung 'jug gsungs pa /
translated: Union is taught because there is no clinging to the two truths.

original: rgyu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The cause, etc.

original: 'di'i lam nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di'i lam nyid gsungs pa /
translated: The path itself is stated here:

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The cause and effect, etc.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is not the intended meaning.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pa la brten nas ngo mtshar ba dang rmad du byung ba brjod pa dag gis smra mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pas so //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pa la brten nas ngo mtshar ba dang rmad du byung ba brjod pa dag gis smra mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pas so //
translated: Based on the nonduality of cause and effect, the state of being wondrous and marvelous is inexpressible, and therefore the wondrous is due to conventional truth,

original: rmad du gyur pa ni don dam pa'i bden pas so //
analyzed: rmad du gyur pa ni don dam pa'i bden pas so //
translated: and the marvelous is due to ultimate truth.

original: bden pa gnyis la yang rang bzhin gyis med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis la yang rang bzhin gyis med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because both truths are essentially nonexistent,

original: rnam pa nyid kyis bstod pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa nyid kyis bstod pa'o //
translated: the praise is by way of the aspects.

original: zhes pa ni rnam pa nyid kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po la zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rnam pa nyid kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po la zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: This is the praise by way of the aspects of Great Vajradhara, the rest is self-evident.

original: bstod pa'o zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la'o @67b zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: bstod pa'o zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la'o @67b zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: The praise is to Great Vajradhara, this should be understood.

original: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ces pa ni bsod nams phun sum tshogs so zhes pa ste /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ces pa ni bsod nams phun sum tshogs so zhes pa ste /
translated: All perfections refers to the perfection of merit,

original: bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa ni sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
analyzed: bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa ni sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
translated: The perfection of merit is the nature of the perfection of generosity, the perfection of morality, and so on.

original: de'i phyir yongs su dag pa'i lha rdo rje 'chang chen po las sprul pa'i sku'i rim pas sam /
analyzed: de'i phyir yongs su dag pa'i lha rdo rje 'chang chen po las sprul pa'i sku'i rim pas sam /
translated: Therefore, from the completely pure Great Vajradhara, the emanation body, or

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo spros pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo spros pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the stage of completion, the wheel of Akṣobhya and so on is emanated.

original: byang chub sems ni rab bskor ba ni drug pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rab bskor ba ni drug pa ste /
translated: The sixth is the “turning of the mind of enlightenment,”

original: ye shes kyi rim pas sam ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa'i rim pas de bzhin nyid 'od gsal ba nyid du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rim pas sam ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa'i rim pas de bzhin nyid 'od gsal ba nyid du gyur pa'o //
translated: which is the transformation into the clear light of suchness by the stage of wisdom or the stage of retention and subsequent destruction.

original: de'i rang bzhin nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: One enters into meditative equipoise on that very nature.

original: de bzhin du rim pa des gshegs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rim pa des gshegs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: In the same way, one goes by that stage, and so one is a tathāgata.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dag pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dag pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: For that very reason, it is “pure,” and so on.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi rnam par shes pa ni lus la brten cing /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi rnam par shes pa ni lus la brten cing /
translated: The consciousness of the three vajras is based on the body,

original: yid la sems pa dang / tshig dag nye bar dmigs pa zhin pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yid la sems pa dang / tshig dag nye bar dmigs pa zhin pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and is the very observation of the mind in the mind and the words in the words.

original: sku'i rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa 'dis sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can zhes pa'i rjes su ste gcig gi tshig la mang po'i tshig go //
analyzed: sku'i rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa 'dis sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can zhes pa'i rjes su ste gcig gi tshig la mang po'i tshig go //
translated: By this, “vajra body” and so on, the one word “vajra” is a plural word, following “possessor of vajra body, speech, and mind.”

original: sus phyin ci log gang gis sgrub par byed do //
